Description:
DevOps can be a key enabler for achieving high-level agility and quality in development projects.

In this course, you’ll get an introduction to general DevOps approaches and key principles. The course will then outline the SAP offerings, such as best practices, services, and tools, that enable you to foster DevOps principles efficiently along the relevant phases of SAP development projects based on different programming languages and technologies. You’ll learn where to find more information and how to start using the outlined offerings, and you’ll understand why they are the right choice for on-premise, hybrid, and cloud-native DevOps projects in SAP enterprise environments.
Title: Efficient DevOps with SAP

Description: This certification verifies that you possess the ability to perform an SAP Solution Architect role with SAP BTP. SAP Solution Architects develop and implement solutions that meet business requirements; they ensure that the solutions are technically feasible and economically viable. SAP solution architects are responsible for the architectural design of a solution and translate requirements of an organization into technical solution designs that can be implemented by software architects and software developers. An SAP Solution Architect focuses on technical decisions that are made based on the proposed solution and their impact on business outcomes and interfaces.
Title: SAP Certified Professional - Solution Architect - SAP BTP

Description:
This LJ covers two important extensibility approaches for SAP S/4HANA that are available to customers and partners:

  • Key-User extensibility focuses on adaptations created by key users that have a deep business knowledge. Key-User extensibility comprises adding new fields or custom logic,  adapting the standard UIs, creating custom UIs, and creating custom business objects.
  • Side-by-side extensibility on SAP Business Technology Platform allows developers to build their own applications, enhancing and supplementing existing SAP S/4HANA (on premise) apps and SAP S/4HANA Cloud apps.

Description: In this Learning Journey, you will learn which scenarios exist to leverage current investment and modernize your data warehouse landscape. You will learn about use cases, value propositions, and steps for these approaches. The learning journey contains step-by-step procedures and videos explaining how you implement the connections and objects in a real system for each scenario.

Throughout this course, you will learn how to effectively utilize SAP tools and methodologies to create robust and scalable solutions.

Description: This learning journey is designed for you to discover and position the SAP External Workforce solution area.
Title: Positioning SAP Solutions for External Workforce
Learning_objectives: Upon completing this learning journey, you will be able to understand the potential of the SAP Solutions for External Workforce, build a comprehensive vision for its implementation, extend its value across various applications, and effectively position and sell the solution suite for maximum benefit to our customers.

Description: This learning journey is designed for you to discover the External Workforce solution area.
Title: Discovering External Workforce Solutions
Learning_objectives: Upon completing this learning journey, you will be able to understand the fundamental aspects of the External Workforce solutions and their potential. You will learn about SAP’s cloud strategy, the integrated portfolio, and how it connects to end-to-end business processes and industries.

Description: This learning journey is designed for you to discover and position the SAP SuccessFactors HCM solution area.
Title: Positioning SAP SuccessFactors HCM Solutions
Learning_objectives: Upon completing this learning journey, you will be able to understand the potential of SAP SuccessFactors HCM, build a comprehensive vision for its implementation, extend its value across various applications, and effectively position and sell the solution suite for maximum benefit to our customers.

Description: This Learning Journey introduces you into all important aspects to develop and run containerized apps and extensions on SAP BTP, Kyma runtime.
Title: Developing Applications in SAP BTP, Kyma Runtime
Learning_objectives:
After completing this learning journey, developers will be equipped with the knowledge and skills required to use the SAP BTP, Kyma runtime for building and running extensions with the SAP Business Technology Platform (SAP BTP). 

They will gain a comprehensive understanding of Kubernetes and how it works in the context of the SAP BTP, Kyma runtime. They will learn how to use Kubernetes to orchestrate the deployment of their applications in the cloud. 

Additionally, learners will understand the principles and additional components provided through project „Kyma“ and how to apply them. They will learn how to build scalable and resilient applications that can run on the SAP BTP, Kyma runtime. 

By the end of this learning journey, developers will be well-equipped to use the SAP BTP, Kyma runtime to build and run cloud-native applications with ease and efficiency and to use the SAP BTP, Kyma runtime to extend SAP- and non-SAP systems.

Description: This learning journey will guide you through the basic set up and administration of SAP Fieldglass, as well as the administrative and transactional aspects of Contingent Workforce Management.
Title: Discovering SAP Fieldglass Contingent Workforce Management
Learning_objectives: Upon completing this course, administrators will be able to manage and configure their workforce and job postings based on their needs to hire, manage, track analytics, and evaluate their external workforce.

Description: This learning journey will guide you through the configuration and administration of SAP Fieldglass Rates 2.0.
Title: Getting Started with SAP Fieldglass Rates 2.0
Learning_objectives:
Upon completing this course, administrators will be able to:

  • Examine the structure of a rate in the Rates 2.0 configuration
  • Learn the role of lookups when using Rates 2.0
  • Discover how Rates 2.0 provides greater flexibility and efficiency over Rates 1.0
  • Configure the Rates 2.0 structure, including creating a custom lookup
  • See how a Rates 2.0 configuration can co-exist with an existing Rates 1.0 configuration

Description: This learning journey will guide you through an introduction of SAP Fieldglass, explaining different functionalities of the solution and how it can be used to simplify the procuring and managing of your workforce.
Title: Introducing SAP Fieldglass
Learning_objectives: Upon completing this course, administrators will be able to understand and explain different functionalities of SAP Fieldglass, SAP's vendor management solution that simplifies the process of procuring, managing, and optimizing flexible workforces.

Description: This course is part of the overall training arc for beginner business users of SAP Commerce Cloud. The present course focuses on the Web Content Manager role, and explains how Web Content Managers use SAP Commerce Cloud tools, like SmartEdit, to create or edit the web content on the storefront.
Title: Creating and Configuring Web Content for SAP Commerce Cloud
Learning_objectives:
At the end of this course, beginner business users responsible for web content management will be able to: 

  • Breakdown the theoretical foundation for web content management in SAP Commerce Cloud.

  • Perform basic tasks in SmartEdit, like editing and synchronizing web pages, and collaborating in workflows.

  • Perform advanced web content management tasks in SmartEdit, such as using shared components and shared content slots, capturing version snapshots and managing storefront navigation options.
  • Construct a tailored user experience on the storefront by using personalization options in SmartEdit.

Title: Cross-Functional Customizing in SAP S/4HANA Materials Management

Description: Learn about the major enhancements of SAP Billing and Revenue Innovation Management (BRIM) - Usage to Cash to prepare for the assessment to stay certified.

Title: Configuring SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition, Sales
Learning_objectives:
After completing this learning journey, application consultants will be able to set-up SAP S/4HANA Sales and configure the essential functions.

  • Setting up the Enterprise Structures in Sales
  • Configuring Business Partner and Customer Master Data in SAP S/4HANA Sales
  • Customizing of Sales Documents: Setting up of a Sales Document Type, Item Categories and Schedule Line Categories
  • Data Flow – Setting up the Copying Control in Sales
  • Partner Functions in Sales
  • Customizing output control and text control
  • Incomplete Documents
  • Outline Agreements

Title: Configuration of SAP S/4HANA Cloud for group reporting

Description: This course teaches you how to use SAP Integration Suite to streamline B2B transactions and improve collaboration with trading partners. It covers Trading Partner Management, Integration Advisor, B2B monitoring, and cloud integration capabilities. It also covers customizing B2B scenarios, error message handling, lifecycle management, and exporting and importing in multi-tier systems. Additionally, it provides insights into the roadmap of SAP Integration Suite.
Title: Manage B2B Scenarios Effectively with SAP Integration Suite

LSC_product: SAP HANA Cloud,SAP HANA, platform edition
Description:
SQLScript is a programming language of SAP HANA to embed data-intensive application logic into the database. It supports imperative programming constructs like assignments, branches, loops, and exception handlers, as well as declarative Structured Query Language (SQL) queries. To run SQLScript efficiently and faster, the SQLScript engine uses the SQLScript optimizer.

In this course, you’ll learn how the SQLScript optimizer works. You’ll discover the general analysis strategy for SQLScript performance issues associated with SQL query performance and the SQLScript optimizer, explore the supportability features of SQLScript, and review case studies.
Title: Using the Optimizer for SQLScript Programming in SAP HANA
Profitability Analysis in SAP S/4HANA

Description: This course explains blockchain with examples, focusing on innovations, workings, and business uses like identity and privacy. It covers cryptocurrency, finance, and app development with demos and stories. Guest speakers from UNICEF and the European Commission provide insights.
Title: What Can Blockchain Do for You

Description: This course focuses on how to leverage SAP SuccessFactors Learning to help organizations who need to support employee skills development, learning, and developmental goals with agility and innovation. The course covers efficient product design and recommended configuration and implementation details to build a robust, secure, efficient, and sustainable SAP SuccessFactors Learning solution that will provide employees with virtual, self-directed learning experiences that empower and keep them engaged and fulfill their learning goals.
Title: SAP SuccessFactors Learning – Get Your Implementation Right

Description: This course introduces intelligent automation for SAP Business ByDesign and SAP Business One using tools like SAP Build Process Automation. These tools, combined with intelligent technologies like Document Information Extraction, help automate business processes. The course teaches you how to access, deploy, and customize these automation use cases, as well as gain knowledge of the technologies used. It also encourages you to think of your own use cases in the future.
Title: Intelligent Automation for SAP Business ByDesign and SAP Business One

LSC_product: SAP S/4HANA,SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition,SAP S/4HANA Cloud
Description: This course focuses on the new employee business partner model introduced with SAP S/4HANA 2020. It covers both system conversion and new implementation projects. The course provides an overview of the model, its structure, features, and use cases. It also explains the concept of external workers and the SAP S/4HANA business user concept. The course concludes with a description of the steps involved in transitioning to the new model.
Title: New Employee Business Partner Model in SAP S/4HANA
LSC_product_subcategory: Enterprise Resource Planning,Enterprise Resource Planning,Enterprise Resource Planning

LSC_product_category: Business Technology Platform,CRM and Customer Experience,Enterprise Management,Human Capital Management,Intelligent Spend Management,Supply Chain Management
Description: This course focuses on how companies can benefit from integrating their business processes using SAP solutions. The course covers the strategy and business value of intelligent, sustainable enterprises, as well as SAP's integration methodology. You’ll also learn about SAP Business Technology Platform solutions and how they enable a seamless experience across different business processes. The course includes deep dives into four main business processes, with demos and customer success stories to provide further insights. The goal is to help you make your company an intelligent, sustainable enterprise.
Title: Integration for the Intelligent Sustainable Enterprise

Description: This course teaches you how to adapt classic application screens in SAP S/4HANA Cloud. It covers the core editor functionality, combining information from multiple tabs, using templates, scripting, creating adaptive designs, integrating external content, and administering access to simplified screens. It also teaches you how to extend standard SAP Fiori apps using SAPUI5 flexibility. The course includes an optional section for on-premise SAP systems.
Title: Adapting the UI in SAP S/4HANA Cloud Using SAP Screen Personas
LSC_product_subcategory: Enterprise Resource Planning,Enterprise Resource Planning,Enterprise Resource Planning

LSC_product_category: Business Technology Platform,Business Technology Platform,Business Technology Platform
Description: This course teaches you how to develop SAP HANA calculation view models in SAP HANA Cloud. It includes basic concepts of working with the SAP HANA Deployment Infrastructure and covers various performance techniques. You will learn how to work in the SAP HANA Cloud development environment, use advanced features in calculation view modeling, create efficient calculation views, leverage optimization techniques, and analyze as well as troubleshoot performance issues.
Title: Working with Calculation Views in SAP HANA Cloud
LSC_product_subcategory: Data and Analytics,Application Development and Automation,Data and Analytics

Description:
SAP is committed to helping every customer become an intelligent and sustainable enterprise. As intelligent enterprises are integrated enterprises, a key part of SAP’s strategy is integrating end-to-end processes. This strategy is outlined in the 2022 strategy paper Intelligent Enterprises Are Integrated Enterprises.

In this course, you’ll gain an understanding of how the SAP Master Data Integration service enables consistent master data replication, together with an introduction to its guiding principles and features. In addition, based on demonstrations and hands-on sessions, you’ll learn how to set up the SAP Master Data Integration service on SAP Business Technology Platform and create distribution models with SAP Master Data Orchestration. You’ll also discover which protocol to use in which scenario.
Title: SAP Master Data Integration in the Intelligent Enterprise

Description: This course explores the value and capabilities of SAP Focused Run, a solution designed for businesses that need high-volume application and system monitoring, alerting, and analytics. It is a powerful solution for service providers who want to host their customers in one central, scalable, safe, and automated environment. It also addresses customers with advanced needs in system management, user and integration monitoring, as well as configuration and security analytics. In this course, you’ll learn more about the value and capabilities of SAP Focused Run. Based on use-case examples, you’ll explore features, functions, and processes of SAP Focused Run for operating hybrid landscapes.
Title: SAP Focused Run – Operations of Hybrid Landscapes

Description: This course covers the importance of transparency and measurement of environmental, social, and governance (ESG) impact. It focuses on the challenges of reporting against multiple frameworks and the need for meaningful data. The course also examines the concept of corporate sustainability and its relevance to business processes. Additionally, it explores how SAP Sustainability Control Tower helps organizations integrate and improve ESG performance.
Title: Getting Started with ESG Steering and Reporting

Description: This course covers the implementation of the Machine Learning Cockpit for SAP Business ByDesign. It teaches you how to create, train, and implement predictive scenarios using the tool. Topics include machine learning essentials, data sources, configuration, authorization, scenarios, models, and predictions.
Title: How to Use the Machine Learning Cockpit for SAP Business ByDesign

Description:
This course provides an overview of the SAP S/4HANA migration cockpit, the tool for initial data load to SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition.

It covers the features, functions, and best practices of the migration process, along with related apps. The course includes system demos based on SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2302.
Title: Migrating Data to SAP S/4HANA Cloud, Public Edition

LSC_product: SAP BW/4HANA,SAP Analytics Cloud,SAP Ariba Supplier Lifecycle and Performance,SAP Responsible Design and Production,SAP Environmental Compliance
LSC_product_category: Business Technology Platform,Business Technology Platform,Intelligent Spend Management,Supply Chain Management,Supply Chain Management
Description: This course delves into the creation of products in a sustainable, circular manner, emphasizing the critical role of initial design in determining a product's environmental impact. It explores how designing for recyclability, repairability, and reusability of components goes beyond mere material choice, requiring considerations of business models, recycling processes, and collaborative ecosystems. You’ll learn about circular and regenerative design principles, the importance of design in product and packaging development, and how nature and technology can inspire sustainable solutions. Featuring insights from design and biomimicry experts, along with speakers from the Ellen MacArthur Foundation, WRAP, packaging providers, and consumer goods companies, the course offers a comprehensive understanding of how to foster a circular economy through thoughtful design.
Title: Design for a Circular Economy
LSC_product_subcategory: Data and Analytics,Data and Analytics,Supplier Management,Product Lifecycle Management,Manufacturing

Description: This course introduces best practice business scenarios for using the Machine Learning Cockpit for SAP Business ByDesign. It aims to provide a quick start for implementing and deploying documented use cases, strengthen confidence working with the Cockpit, and inspire you to design your own use cases. Practical hands-on experience will be provided in using business analytics to prepare data sets, creating scenarios and models, and consuming predictions in the user interface or as reports.
Title: Use Cases for the Machine Learning Cockpit in SAP Business ByDesign

Description: SAP Business ByDesign is SAP’s cloud-based ERP solution for SMEs and enables you to manage your entire business with a single cloud ERP solution. This course will teach you how to develop add-ons and maintain business configurations to meet country/region-specific requirements using the localization toolkit guidelines for SAP Business ByDesign. It covers topics such as taxes, tax calculation, tax reporting, electronic submission of tax returns, generating custom electronic files, and language translation tools.
Title: Localization Toolkit for SAP Business ByDesign

Description: This course focuses on the benefits of SAP-tailored service virtualization in SAP S/4HANA projects. It explains how virtualizing electronic messages from external applications and partners can help avoid delays and break dependencies. The course also covers how service virtualization can make projects more sustainable by reducing their carbon footprint. You’ll learn how to use Int4 Suite to increase testing coverage and reduce effort. The course covers various testing scenarios and integration with UI testing tools. The course is hosted on the SAP Learning Site and provided by Int4 AG, an SAP Silver Partner company. SAP is not responsible for the course content.
Title: Avoid SAP S/4HANA Project Delays with Third-Party Systems Service Virtualization

Description:
With the rise in global crises, the ability to manage them and build resilience has become an important factor for organizations of all sizes. The COVID-19 pandemic, extreme weather events, and war are causing suffering for the people directly affected, but also have an indirect impact on the public infrastructure, health, and well-being of many other people around the world, for example, through dependence on global supply chains and transportation. The better prepared organizations are to manage crises, the sooner they can start reducing the negative impact on citizens, employees, and customers.

In this course, you’ll get an overview of the basics of crisis management and an introduction to a simple but useful framework outlining important activities connected to typical stages of a crisis. You’ll learn about the crisis management framework with examples from real crisis situations and discover how good crisis management and use of technology can foster resilience.
Title: Crisis Management and Resilience

Description: This course focuses on addressing the challenges of remote work and using technology to humanize meetings. It teaches you how to hold engaging and human-centric remote and hybrid sessions by building empathy and how to effectively prepare, plan, host, and finish a meeting. The course also covers strategies for remote collaboration when participants are located in different places or gathered in one location. While technology is important, this course emphasizes putting people at the center of remote collaboration.
Title: Facilitate Remote Collaboration Like a Pro

LSC_product: SAP S/4HANA Cloud,SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition
Description: This course covers the process of transitioning to SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition or starting new implementations directly in the cloud. The course examines the roles and responsibilities of SAP, partners, and customers, as well as communication planning. Topics such as migration, network security, tooling, SAP Fiori configuration, extension building, downtime optimization, go-live preparation, and system operation are also addressed.
Title: Gain Technical Knowledge on SAP S/4HANA Cloud, Private Edition

LSC_product: SAP S/4HANA,SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition,SAP S/4HANA Cloud
Description: This course focuses on new features and functions in the logistics area of SAP S/4HANA and is particularly relevant in the context of greenfield or brownfield SAP S/4HANA projects. The course covers innovations in sales, procurement with central procurement, and supply chain management, including material requirements planning, capacity planning, and Enterprise Asset Management. It also explores Extended Warehouse Management and integrated solutions.
Title: Insights into Selected Logistics Innovations in SAP S/4HANA
LSC_product_subcategory: Enterprise Resource Planning,Enterprise Resource Planning,Enterprise Resource Planning

LSC_product: SAP S/4HANA,SAP S/4HANA Cloud,SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition
Description:
This course focuses on new features and functions in the logistics area in SAP S/4HANA and is relevant in the context of both greenfield and brownfield SAP S/4HANA projects.

The course begins with new features and functions in the Order to Cash area, and you’ll get some insights into Settlement Management and preliminary billing documents. You’ll then be introduced to some of the changes in the Plan to Product area, with process examples around production planning and the embedded Extended Warehouse Management and SAP S/4HANA Transport Management. The course concludes with a look at new functionality in Procure to Pay. While the focus is on procurement, it’s important to understand that the same technical platform is used in other processes too, so you can use what you’ve learned here in other areas as well.
Title: Gain Experience with SAP S/4HANA – Logistics
LSC_product_subcategory: Enterprise Resource Planning,Enterprise Resource Planning,Enterprise Resource Planning

Description: This course provides an introduction to SAP S/4HANA for product compliance. It explains how this solution helps companies manage regulatory requirements, track substances, assess supplier materials, classify products, and manage and ship compliance documents. The course emphasizes the importance of understanding and complying with regulations to protect brand value and company revenue.
Title: Product Compliance in a Nutshell

Description: This course teaches the fundamentals of sketching. It offers practical tips and tricks to help you gain confidence in presenting ideas visually. The course covers topics such as basic shapes, handwriting, storyboards, and screen sketches, providing techniques for you to use at flipcharts, whiteboards, and desks.
Title: Be Visual! Sketching Basics for IT Business

You’ll learn how to turn ideas into innovative products, ensure compliance, manage the entire product development process, collaborate with stakeholders, simulate costs, and set up and monitor digital twins. Technical considerations will also be covered to help you get started.

Description: This course will teach you how to use intelligent tools to enhance product development processes and create better products in process industries. You’ll learn how to collaborate effectively from idea to market, with a particular focus on defining and developing products. The course will cover identifying requirements, mapping them to future products, and managing costs. It will also guide you through creating detailed product specifications, developing compliant recipes, and handing off to manufacturing.
Title: SAP PLM for Process Industries

LSC_product_category: Enterprise Management,Business Technology Platform,Business Technology Platform
Description: This course explores how SAP is taking action on sustainability goals and enabling customers to become intelligent, sustainable enterprises. SAP Business Technology Platform provides a foundation for application development, integration, data, analytics, and AI. SAP has also developed a sustainability portfolio for driving sustainable practices and encourages partners to embed sustainability into their solutions. Profitability and sustainability go hand in hand, and AI plays a critical role in achieving these goals. The course will guide you through a scenario where you help a manufacturer transform into a sustainable intelligent factory using SAP BTP components.
Title: Building AI and Sustainability Solutions on SAP BTP
LSC_product_subcategory: Enterprise Resource Planning,Data and Analytics,Application Development and Automation

Description: This course focuses on SAP Integration Suite and its role in enabling digitalization. It emphasizes the importance of having a defined enterprise-wide integration strategy for organizations looking to evolve their IT landscape. The suite offers a reliable, holistic, and best-in-class enterprise integration platform as a service (iPaaS) that supports any-to-any integration requirements. You will learn about the suite's capabilities, including integration, automation, and business process transformation across SAP and third-party landscapes. The course will cover use case scenarios and demonstrate the different capabilities of the suite. By the end of the course, you will understand how to leverage SAP's iPaaS to modernize and transform your enterprise into an intelligent and sustainable one.
Title: Modernize Integration with SAP Integration Suite

Description: This course introduces SAP Central Business Configuration, a tool that enables you to configure business processes across different SAP cloud solutions from one central location. It supports the implementation of SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition. The course covers the capabilities and customer value of SAP Central Business Configuration, key features, and its role in supporting the implementation of SAP S/4HANA Cloud. It includes units reflecting recent developments and UI changes, as well as a unit on the parallel project line feature. The course discusses how SAP Central Business Configuration reduces configuration efforts, increases flexibility, and expedites company rollouts. Key features such as Project Experience, scoping, organizational structure setup, and configuration activities are also explored.
Title: Leveraging SAP S/4HANA Cloud with SAP Central Business Configuration

LSC_product: SAP Emarsys,SAP Commerce Cloud,SAP Customer Data Cloud,SAP Service Cloud Version 2,SAP Cloud for Customer integration with SAP ERP,SAP Sales Cloud Version 2
LSC_product_category: CRM and Customer Experience,CRM and Customer Experience,CRM and Customer Experience,CRM and Customer Experience,CRM and Customer Experience,CRM and Customer Experience
Description: In this course, you’ll learn about the SAP Customer Experience solutions that help brands build long-term competitive differentiation and brand loyalty through customer experiences that are trusted, simple, personal, helpful, and connected. Walk with us on the customer journey by following the Lead to Cash business process as part of the Intelligent and Sustainable Enterprise. You’ll also get to know specific cloud offerings, like SAP Customer Data Cloud, SAP Commerce Cloud, SAP Sales Cloud, SAP Service Cloud, and SAP Emarsys Customer Engagement. At the end of this course, you’ll understand how to support and implement the customer journey using SAP Customer Experience solutions, as well as the specific cloud solutions which are part of the SAP Customer Experience portfolio to better connect with and serve your customers.
Title: Reimagine the Customer Journey with SAP Customer Experience Solutions

Description:
Now more than ever, SAP’s partners play a key strategic role in shaping our business.
Their expertise, deep knowledge, and competency are key components of SAP’s industry cloud, our innovative offering based on vertical cloud solutions, built or integrated on SAP Business Technology Platform.
In this course, you will get an introduction to industry cloud, going through the opportunity areas given for each partnership: BUILD, SERVICE, SELL, and learn how to get started. You´ll also discover the resources provided by SAP to our partners and see examples of proven success.
Title: Opportunities and Success for Partners in SAP’s Industry Cloud

LSC_product: SAP S/4HANA,SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition,SAP S/4HANA Cloud
Description: This course teaches you how to introduce the new business value of SAP Fiori for SAP S/4HANA. It provides quick win recommendations based on real-life experiences and helps develop skills in making common improvements. Tips on shifting mindsets, tailoring apps for easy adoption, and strategies for adopting more value over time are also covered.
Title: SAP S/4HANA UX for Business and Functional Experts
LSC_product_subcategory: Enterprise Resource Planning,Enterprise Resource Planning,Enterprise Resource Planning

Description:
Process automation in the intelligent enterprise transforms how businesses operate, enhancing efficiency, productivity, and cost savings. SAP Signavio allows businesses to analyze, improve, and demonstrate success in their processes, resulting in lower costs and higher profits. SAP Build is a low-code portfolio that enables easy creation of enterprise applications and automation content, empowering a broader range of users to develop without burdening professional developers.

In this course, you’ll learn how to utilize SAP Signavio solutions to analyze and improve business processes, how to build user applications using SAP Build Apps with a low-code/no-code approach, integrated with Graph, and deep dive into automating business processes with SAP Build Process Automation.
Title: Transform Your Business Processes with SAP Signavio and SAP Build

Description: This course provides an overview of SAP Profitability and Performance Management Cloud. It explains for which use cases you would use the application (typically in finance) and covers its specific advantages, such as state of the art no-code business process configuration, real-time data aggregation, and high-speed calculations. The course includes a profit allocation model and teaches you how to use the system for allocation, drilldown, auditability, and report creation. It also covers the application interface, system architecture, monitoring, and auditing. The final week focuses on practical application, including creating a profit share allocation model from start to finish.
Title: SAP Profitability and Performance Management Cloud

Description: This course is designed to help ERP HCM customers plan for the next evolution of HCM systems in the cloud. It outlines the benefits of SAP SuccessFactors HCM by highlighting the latest HR innovations and their relevance to organizations, and explains the tools, assets, and services that will make a move to the cloud as easy and smooth as possible. The course also provides practical details and short how-to demonstrations.
Title: Your HR Journey to the Cloud
LSC_product_subcategory: Cross Human Capital Management,Cross Human Capital Management

LSC_product_category: Supply Chain Management,Supply Chain Management,Enterprise Management
Description: This course is designed to help you understand the transition from SAP ERP to SAP S/4HANA for the Logistics Execution modules. It covers the new Transportation Management and Extended Warehouse Management modules in SAP S/4HANA, the transformation approach and tools, the differences between SAP ERP and SAP S/4HANA logistics modules, and the best practice process for Advanced Shipping and Receiving. The course does not provide details about implementation or specific functionalities. System demonstrations are performed on an SAP S/4HANA 2022 system with embedded TM and EWM.

It covers both the migration cockpit and the migration object modeler, including the Migrate Data Using Staging Tables and Migrate Data Directly from SAP System approaches.

The course includes system demos and covers topics such as adjusting migration objects, creating your own objects, and defining selection criteria. It also provides information sources for migration projects and future developments.

They will be able to plan and execute change management activities to professionally handle the people side of cloud deployments during all SAP Activate phases. In addition, they will be aware of the success factors for an effective change management delivery.

Description: Introducing Industry Concepts in Agricultural Origination and Trading, this course provides a comprehensive overview of SAP Agricultural Contract Management. It outlines its main components, supported processes, and master data. Delving deeper, it explores contracts, inventory handling, and fee frameworks within the system. It also covers prepayments, pricing, load data capture, settlement, revenue recognition, and the application process. Lastly, it sheds light on risk reporting in conjunction with SAP Commodity Risk Management, offering a holistic understanding of SAP Agricultural Contract Management.
Learning_objectives: After completing this learning journey, you will be equipped with the essential knowledge and skills to navigate the soft commodity business landscape and gain an understanding of the intricacies of the industry. Additionally, you'll delve into the components and functionalities of the SAP Agricultural Contract Management product. By the end of the course, you'll emerge proficient in both the conceptual framework of the soft commodity business and the practical application of SAP Agricultural Contract Management.
Title: Exploring SAP Agricultural Contract Management

Description: In this learning journey, you’ll discover the business roles, process steps, and system tasks associated with Asset Management in SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition.
Title: Implementing Asset Management processes in SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition
Learning_objectives:
After completing this learning journey, consultants will be able to:

  • Identify the business roles associated with asset management.
  • Describe how those roles collaborate to manage reactive, proactive, and overhead maintenance.
  • Identify the nine phases of asset management and the processes associated with each phase.
  • Perform system tasks related to those phases and processes.

Description:
SAP Intelligent Agriculture is a cloud-native solution designed to help agribusinesses and consumer goods companies digitalize their farming processes and services. By utilizing data science and machine learning, it aids in making more informed decisions.

In this Learning Journey, you will learn how to implement and configure the solution. The topics covered include system onboarding, understanding the farm data model, and using the APIs.
Learning_objectives:
This course will prepare you to:

  • Onboard the solution on the SAP Business Technology Platform cockpit and manage user authorizations.
  • Understand the data model and key entities.
  • Load data using the APIs.
Title: Implementing and Configuring SAP Intelligent Agriculture

Description:
SAP Intelligent Agriculture is a native cloud solution that enables agribusinesses and food companies to digitalize their farming processes and services, and to leverage data science and machine learning capabilities to support better decisions.

In this learning journey you will get an overview of the types of customers and business areas relevant for the solution, as well as the main capabilities and benefits of the solution.
Learning_objectives: After successfully finishing this learning journey, learners will have the ability to position SAP Intelligent Agriculture to the right audiences and explain how it makes modern, data-driven farming achievable. Additionally, learners will have a broad understanding of the key functionalities surrounding Farm Data Management, Farming Capabilities, and Farming Intelligence.
Title: Exploring SAP Intelligent Agriculture

Description: Sustainability is essential in today's economy and should be a primary focus of your business operations. Discover how SAP Green Ledger and Financial Accounting can monitor, evaluate, and report on the environmental impact of all your operations. Consultants and business professionals dedicated to advancing sustainability will find this learning opportunity to be valuable.
Title: Discovering Sustainability for SAP Finance
Learning_objectives: This course will provide you with an understanding of how SAP Green Ledger relates to Financial Accounting. It's especially important for those who are new to using SAP Sustainability solutions to grasp the business advantages of SAP Green Ledger and how it aligns with your financial data. You'll also dive into key features, integration aspects, analytic capabilities, and planning.
LSC_product_subcategory: Enterprise Resource Planning,Enterprise Resource Planning,Enterprise Resource Planning,Enterprise Resource Planning

Learning_objectives: Upon completing this course, administrators will be able to configure and manage their statement of works and SOW workers based on their needs to engage, manage, and evaluate their services procurement.

Description: This learning journey is designed to guide you through the transition to SAP S/4HANA for the Utilities industry. You'll explore the distinctive features of the SAP S/4HANA system, understand utilities processes, and engage with customer service operations. The course also covers the integration of artificial intelligence in optimizing business processes, using SAP Fiori for utility-based functions, asset management architecture, and the application of cloud solutions in the utilities sector. By the end of this course, you will have a comprehensive understanding of SAP S/4HANA's applications in the utilities industry, enabling you to harness its full potential for enhanced efficiency and customer engagement.
Title: Transitioning to SAP S/4HANA for Utilities
Learning_objectives:
• Identify the distinctive features of the SAP S/4HANA system and utilities processes.
  • Utilize Customer Engagement functions effectively to improve customer service operations.
  • Integrate Artificial Intelligence to optimize business processes within SAP S/4HANA Utilities.
  • Employ SAP Fiori for enhanced utility-based functions.
  • Understand and apply asset management (EAM) architecture within the utilities context.
  • Analyze and apply SAP Market Communication Architecture for utilities including cloud solutions.

Description: As a Real Estate contract manager transitioning to SAP S/4HANA, you stand to benefit from this learning journey, as it provides comprehensive knowledge on how to manage Real Estate contracts in an SAP system. The content of this learning journey is relevant for SAP S/4HANA deployment options in the public cloud, the private cloud and on-premise environments.
Title: Describing Contracts for Real Estate Management in SAP S/4HANA
Learning_objectives: After completing this learning journey, entry level users will be able to describe contract types and their attributes, contractual relationships, leasing services, contract conditions, posting parameters and periodic posting processes, validation of contracts and their cash flows, and reporting aspects when utilizing this solution for the first time.

Description:
This learning is designed for professionals looking to enhance their understanding of omnichannel strategies and pricing. 

This course is ideal for pricing managers, and IT professionals who want to learn how to leverage SAP Omnichannel Promotion Pricing to overcome market challenges and improve customer engagement. Participants will gain insights into market trends, explore various services and functionalities, and understand the integration and setup processes. The course includes practical simulations and quizzes to reinforce learning, ensuring participants can apply their knowledge effectively in real-world scenarios.
Learning_objectives:
1. Understand market trends and business challenges.
  2. Explore SAP Omnichannel Promotion Pricing services and functionalities.
  3. Evaluate the business value of SAP Omnichannel Promotion Pricing.
  4. Learn about integrations and setup.
Title: Exploring SAP Omnichannel Promotion Pricing

Description:
This learning journey, “Executing Business Processes in SAP S/4HANA Utilities,” covers the overview of SAP S/4HANA Utilities, introducing you to its primary processes and operations, basic functions, and master data.  The basics of the Device and Work Management and Meter Reading will be covered with deeper insight into Energy Data Management, Machine Learning applications, and more.

A few chapters cover the specifics of the German energy market, including SAP Market Communication and Master Data Updates. This course is designed to offer you a broad overview of SAP S/4HANA Utilities.​
Learning_objectives: After completing this learning journey, a learner will be able to navigate SAP S/4HANA Utilities, apply concepts of energy data management and financial accounting, use machine learning applications for meter reading and billing, and handle area-specific aspects, especially for the German energy sector. They will be equipped with skills in contract accounting, convergent invoicing, and intelligent metering. Additionally, they will gain experience in tailoring and using the software's key features for utility industries
Title: Executing Business Processes in SAP S/4HANA Utilities

Description:
Tax transformation is now a standard practice in business and is crucial for a successful digital transformation journey for enterprises. With rapidly evolving standards, legislation, and technologies, tax has become a crucial factor in making business decisions. Therefore, it is essential for businesses to onboard the right resources for a successful tax transformation.

This course aims to help you prepare for and become a valuable member of a tax transformation project. You’ll learn about the different tax types, such as indirect tax, direct tax, transfer pricing, and withholding tax. For each of these tax types you’ll learn about the global developments, the business relevance, and the importance of technology with a focus on SAP S/4HANA and SAP solutions for global tax management.

This course is brought to you in collaboration with Deloitte.
Title: Unlocking Tax Transformation with SAP

Description: This course focuses on the role of the 'S' in ESG reporting, emphasizing the impact of business decisions on human rights and societal expectations for social responsibility. It addresses the challenges and opportunities in addressing human rights and the societal impact of businesses, as well as best practices to tackle social responsibility. The course also covers upcoming regulations addressing human rights due diligence and highlights how technology, particularly SAP solutions, can enable social responsibility across critical business processes.
Title: Business and Human Rights - From Obligations to Positive Impact

Description:
In this course you’ll get an overview of what the SAP mobile experience is all about. In the first week, we’ll show you the big picture, and in the second we’ll showcase several concrete scenarios for some of the relevant user groups. Finally, in the last week of the course, we’ll emphasize all aspects which are crucial to develop, customize, deploy, and run mobile applications to ensure an intuitive, easy-to-use, and sustainable mobile experience for companies around the world.

At the end of the course, you’ll have a good understanding of SAP’s mobile vision and how it can be realized to create value for your business.
Title: Understanding and Implementing the SAP Mobile Experience

The course covers topics like working with JSON data, processing geo-referenced data, and analyzing connected data. Learning_objectives:
After completing this learning journey, administrators will be able to:

  • Identify the stakeholders who are involved in the set-up of SAP Signavio Process Insights and how they work together.
  • Explain which SAP systems can be connected as a source system.
  • Explain which system requirements must be met for a direct or intermediate system connection and how the handling of personal and monetary data can be configured,
  • Explain which steps are carried out on the Business Technology Platform (BTP) with the help of the Booster.
  • Learn about the authorization and user concept and explain which network settings need to be configured.
  • Explain how to connect an SAP source system directly or via an intermediate system to SAP Signavio Process Insights.

Title: Getting Started with SAP Fieldglass
SAP Ariba Sourcing: Creating Events

Description: This learning journey will introduce you to the various capabilities of AI in course development.
Title: Developing your Learning Journey with AI

Processes in SAP S/4HANA Extended Warehouse Management
