LSC_product: SAP Environment, Health, and Safety Management,component extension for SAP Environment, Health, and Safety Management,SAP Environmental Compliance,SAP S/4HANA,SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition,SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition,SAP ERP,SAP Management of Change
LSC_product_category: Supply Chain Management,Supply Chain Management,Supply Chain Management,Enterprise Management,Enterprise Management,Enterprise Management,Enterprise Management,Supply Chain Management
Description: This course focuses on the importance of environment, health, and safety management in sustainable businesses. It highlights the challenges faced in this area and how SAP solutions can help address them. The course covers topics such as business processes, the use of technology, and the impact of disruptions like COVID-19. Overall, it emphasizes the need for integrated and transparent management to mitigate risks and reduce harm.
Title: SAP Environment, Health, and Safety for Operational Sustainability
LSC_product_subcategory: Manufacturing,Manufacturing,Manufacturing,Enterprise Resource Planning,Enterprise Resource Planning,Enterprise Resource Planning,Enterprise Resource Planning,Product Lifecycle Management

Description:
This course introduces how SAP Commerce Cloud, composable storefront, also known as project “Spartacus”, utilizes the SAP Commerce Cloud CMS. This course covers setting up the storefront, its usage of the CMS, and extending the storefront with the CMS. The course also includes essential theoretical concepts regarding the functions of the SAP Commerce Cloud CMS and its effective utilization with composable storefront.
Note: This course was prepared using composable storefront (Spartacus) version 3.1. By the time you start the course, a new version of composable storefront will be available. All the information provided in this course should also be valid for the newer version of the storefront.
Title: CMS in Spartacus

Description: This course focuses on the B2B Commerce Organization feature in SAP Commerce Cloud presented in the composable storefront. It covers the concepts of Commerce Organization and provides detailed instructions on setting up units, users, cost centers, budgets, shipping addresses, and spending limits. The course also includes demonstrations of how purchasing is affected by B2B Commerce Organization and how it helps customers facilitate buyer purchases while maintaining control and tracking spending.
Title: Spartacus B2B Commerce Organization

LSC_product: SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition,SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition,SAP S/4HANA
Description:
While SAP provides a broad set of solutions for many business scenarios, most organizations also need additional apps to meet their unique requirements.

In the first part of this course, you’ll learn how to build SAP Fiori apps using the same technologies and tools that SAP uses for SAP Fiori app development in SAP S/4HANA: SAP Fiori elements, SAP Fiori tools, and SAPUI5. We’ll start with an OData service (if you don’t know what that is, you’ll learn) and build an SAP Fiori elements app from the ground up. We’ll generate the app to start the process, configure it without coding, enhance it with annotations, and extend it with custom SAPUI5 code.

In the second part, you’ll learn how to extend a standard SAP Fiori app to meet your specific needs using SAPUI5 flexibility.
Title: Developing and Extending SAP Fiori Elements Apps
LSC_product_subcategory: Enterprise Resource Planning,Enterprise Resource Planning,Enterprise Resource Planning

Description:
In 2012, Harvard Business Review named data science the "sexiest job of the 21st century." Why are data scientists in such demand these days? The answer is that over the past decade, there has been an explosion in the data generated and retained by companies, and they need to leverage and exploit it. Data scientists are the people who make sense out of all this data and figure out just what can be done with it. 

If you’re interested in learning about data science, this course will introduce you to the fundamentals of data preparation, predictive modeling, data science, and the deployment and maintenance of models in a business environment following a tried and tested project methodology. 

Data science is a complex subject to understand, but in this course, you’ll learn about the fundamental principles, look at how the algorithms can add value to your business, and complex processes will be demystified.
Title: Getting Started with Data Science

LSC_product: SAP S/4HANA,SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition,SAP S/4HANA Cloud
Description: This course aims to address common questions from customers considering a move to SAP S/4HANA. It covers the key differences between legacy SAP ERP and the new SAP S/4HANA Finance process, as well as the major change in the business partner concept. The course also highlights innovative options, such as implementing SAP Fiori launchpad and adopting embedded analytical reports. By showcasing the value and potential innovations of transitioning to SAP S/4HANA, the course helps customers understand the investment's worth. Demos and answers to frequently asked questions are provided to support your journey to SAP S/4HANA.
Title: Guide Your SAP S/4HANA Project to Success
LSC_product_subcategory: Enterprise Resource Planning,Enterprise Resource Planning,Enterprise Resource Planning

Description: This course is designed to guide you through the fundamentals of infrastructure as code (IaC) using Terraform on SAP Business Technology Platform (BTP). If you're new to Terraform and automating infrastructure on SAP BTP, this course will provide the essential skills to enable you to confidently start deploying and managing SAP BTP resources through Terraform. By the end of the course, you’ll have the foundational knowledge needed to automate infrastructure management and use the power of Terraform on SAP BTP.
Title: Getting Started with Terraform on SAP BTP
Learning_objectives:
After completing this course, you will be able to:

  • Explain the benefits of infrastructure as code and Terraform
  • Understand basic concepts of Terraform
  • Set up Terraform for SAP Business Technology Platform
  • Provision and manage a basic infrastructure setup on SAP BTP

Title: Integrating Systems with SAP Subscription Billing Using Events and APIs

Description: This learning journey provides an overview of the business processes in SAP ERP Payroll.
Title: Getting Started with SAP HCM and HCM Payroll
Learning_objectives: After completing this learning journey, users will be able to maintain the relevant master data, perform a payroll run, recognize typical errors in payroll and display execute the most important follow-up activities in payroll.

Description: SAP S/4HANA 2023
Title: Classification in SAP S/4HANA
Production Planning in SAP S/4HANA
SAP S/4HANA Asset Management - Functions and Innovations
SAP BusinessObjects Web Intelligence: Advanced Report Design
SAP BusinessObjects Web Intelligence: Report Design I

Description: SAP Master Data Governance on SAP S/4HANA
Title: SAP Master Data Governance on SAP S/4HANA

LSC_product: SAP S/4HANA Cloud,SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition
Description: Delve into the cutting-edge intersection of finance and artificial intelligence (AI) with SAP’s innovative solutions. Gain a deep understanding of the strategy behind SAP Business AI and how it revolutionizes financial management, empowering organizations to make data-driven decisions and optimize business processes.
Title: Discovering SAP Business AI Capabilities for SAP Finance
Learning_objectives:
• Understand SAP Business AI and its implications for financial operations
  • Explore the growing range of SAP Business AI offerings that cater to finance functions
  • Learn how SAP Business AI can be leveraged to address key challenges in finance

LSC_product: SAP S/4HANA Cloud,SAP S/4HANA,SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition,SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition
Description: This learning journey will help you use SAP S/4HANA Cloud for group reporting to perform consolidation and analyze the consolidated values. The content of this learning journey is also valid for SAP S/4HANA Finance for group reporting.
Title: Performing Consolidation with SAP S/4HANA Cloud for Group reporting
Learning_objectives:
After completing this learning journey, you will be able to:

  • Describe the end-to-end consolidation process with SAP S/4HANA for group reporting
  • Perform core consolidation processes with SAP S/4HANA for group reporting
  • Analyze consolidated values with standard reporting
LSC_product_subcategory: Enterprise Resource Planning,Enterprise Resource Planning,Enterprise Resource Planning,Enterprise Resource Planning

LSC_product: SAP Billing and Revenue Innovation Management, CRM and convergent charging components
Description: This learning journey will guide you through the generic billing, invoicing and accounting processes in SAP S/4HANA Cloud for Contract Accounting and Invoicing, within the context of SAP Solutions for Quote to Cash Management public cloud (BRIM and CPQ).
Title: Implementing SAP S/4HANA Cloud for Contract Accounting & Invoicing
Learning_objectives: After completing this learning journey, consultants will be able to execute the billing and invoicing process and gain an overview of the Revenue Sharing and Partner Settlement. In addition, you will learn to describe and execute the integration of Billing and Invoicing with Contract Accounts Receivable and Payable and General Ledger Accounting.The use of both transactional and, most importantly analytical Fiori Apps for Convergent Invoicing and Contract Accounting is covered.

LSC_product: SAP Billing and Revenue Innovation Management, CRM and convergent charging components,SAP Contract Accounts Receivable and Payable
Description:
This learning journey provides an overview of the SAP Cash Application, add-on for Financial Contract Accounting (FI-CA). 
The training gives an overview of the processes, the AI process automation capabilities as well as an insight in the configuration needed to use the solution.
It will also show the main differences between the SAP Cash Application for FI-CA and Financial Accounts Receivable (FI-AR).
Title: Managing Cash Application for FI-CA
Learning_objectives:
After completing this learning journey, consultants will be able to:

  • Identify the challenges of a Digital Economy
  • Understand the Cash Application Process and why it is needed
  • Describe the Cash Application Training Process
  • Configure the Cash Application
  • Execute the Cash Application Processes ​
  • Describe the differences between the Cash App for FI-CA and FI-AR

LSC_product: SAP Access Control for SAP S/4HANA,SAP Access Control
Description: This learning journey will introduce you to the Principles of SAP Access Control by exploring the functionalities for Access Governance.
Title: Discovering the Main Functionalities of SAP Access Control
Learning_objectives: After completing this learning journey, you will acquire an understanding of SAP Access Control. You will be able to explain how SAP Access Control helps to address business challenges and identify authorization risks in typical business processes by learning how to manage access risks, access requests, roles, emergency access and by learning how to periodically review user access.
LSC_product_subcategory: Governance, Risk, Compliance (GRC), and Cybersecurity,Governance, Risk, Compliance (GRC), and Cybersecurity

Description:
This learning journey offers a comprehensive look at SAP Entitlement Management, exploring how master data, basic configurations, and entitlement modeling can optimize and streamline entitlement processes.

The journey concludes with an examination of API and event monitoring, provisioning orchestration, and entitlement consumption, which tracks and records the usage of entitlements by customers to ensure compliance and accurate reporting.
Title: Implementing SAP Entitlement Management
Learning_objectives:
In this intermediate-level learning journey, Implementation Consultants will:

  • Discover the architecture of SAP Entitlement Management (SEM) and learn the processes for integrating and synchronizing with other SAP systems.
  • Explore the role of business categories, units of measurement, and entitlement generation rules in managing entitlements.
  • Learn how distribution channels deliver entitlements, how business events trigger entitlements, and how entitlement models define the rules and criteria for entitlements.
  • Discover how SAP Entitlement Management uses entitlement mapping to ensure consistent representation and management of entitlements from various sources; synchronizes entitlement-related master data with other systems; creates rule set definitions to generate entitlements; and sets up background jobs to automate routine tasks.

LSC_product: SAP Service and Asset Manager,SAP Asset Strategy and Performance Management
Description: This learning journey will introduce you to the business processes and capabilities of SAP Intelligent Asset Management which supports full digital representation of connected assets along their lifecycle delivering an embedded, collaborative and real-time set of next generation processes and systems.
Title: Discovering Business Processes in SAP Intelligent Asset Management
Learning_objectives: After completing this learning journey, Business Users and Consultants will be able to ​identify the key products of SAP Intelligent Asset Management (IAM), describe how each IAM product contributes to the next-generation asset management and discover how the IAM solution can enhance your maintenance strategy.

Description:
SAP Business ByDesign is a cloud-based ERP solution supporting end-to-end business processes across various application areas. 
This course teaches learners how to use SAP Cloud Applications Studio to develop add-ons for SAP Business ByDesign. Topics covered include creating and maintaining business objects, adding business logic and extensions, creating and enhancing analytical content, defining custom forms, and developing country-based localization, mashups, and mobile applications.
Title: SAP Cloud Applications Studio for SAP Business ByDesign

Description: Learn how to test your designs and design ideas with feedback from potential users. This course, taught by design research experts from SAP, introduces all the steps, from planning a test through moderating it, with a special focus on asking good questions and taking proper notes. You’ll also learn how to analyze the notes you collected to iterate your designs.
Title: Basics of Design Testing

Description: This course focuses on SAP Business ByDesign, SAP’s cloud-based ERP solution for small and mid-size companies. It highlights the Built-In Analytics feature, which provides integrated business processes and delivers contextual information for better decision-making. You’ll learn how to consume analytical insights, create and adapt analytical assets, and extend analytics through third-party integration.
Title: Built-In Analytics in SAP Business ByDesign

LSC_product: SAP S/4HANA,SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition,SAP S/4HANA Cloud
Description: This course focuses on the key topics to consider for system conversion projects to SAP S/4HANA. It covers the advantages of conversion, project planning, required roles and skills, and technical tools. It also provides best practices for adopting changes in Finance and the system landscape. Essential changes in user experience and Logistics are discussed, as well as preparing bespoke developments for the new architecture and UI innovations. Guidelines for testing, downtime optimization, and impact on analytics are also provided.
Title: System Conversion to SAP S/4HANA
LSC_product_subcategory: Enterprise Resource Planning,Enterprise Resource Planning,Enterprise Resource Planning

LSC_product_category: Business Technology Platform,Enterprise Management,Human Capital Management,Intelligent Spend Management,Supply Chain Management
Description: This course will teach you the importance of copywriting for user experience and how it fits into the design-led development process. You’ll learn about terminology, best practices, and tips for writing effective copy. Through exercises, you’ll gain practical experience in writing copy and see how it is implemented in SAP projects like Fiori.
Title: Copywriting: Improve User Experience One Word at a Time

LSC_product: SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition,SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition,SAP S/4HANA
Description: This course explains the concept of two-tier ERP and provides a detailed view of how organizations can get set for a journey towards digital transformation with two-tier ERP with SAP S/4HANA Cloud. It covers an overview of SAP S/4HANA Cloud and the different business use cases for two-tier ERP such as central handling of master data, integration concepts, finance, manufacturing, procurement, sales, and service processes. It also includes a perspective from Topcon Positioning Systems on successfully leveraging two-tier ERP with their on-premise ERP system and SAP S/4HANA Cloud.
Title: Two-Tier ERP with SAP S/4HANA Cloud
LSC_product_subcategory: Enterprise Resource Planning,Enterprise Resource Planning,Enterprise Resource Planning

Description:
This course provides an overview of SAP Intelligent RPA 2.0. You’ll discover the simplified, intuitive, and low-coded Cloud Studio and an updated runtime to create and execute your bots.

You’ll learn what’s new with the updated version of SAP Intelligent RPA and see how simple the bot-building experience has become, especially for citizen developers and business users.
Title: Enter Next-Level Bot Building with SAP Intelligent RPA 2.0

LSC_product: SAP S/4HANA,SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition,SAP S/4HANA Cloud
Description: This course focuses on the functional aspects of converting a system to SAP S/4HANA. It is brought to you by the SAP S/4HANA Regional Implementation Group and covers project management, finance-related conversion topics, business partner and customer/vendor integration, and logistics. Topics include SAP's methodology and tools, mandatory activities for a successful conversion, employee synchronization, MRP lists and areas, and output and settlement management.
Title: Key Functional Topics in a System Conversion to SAP S/4HANA
LSC_product_subcategory: Enterprise Resource Planning,Enterprise Resource Planning,Enterprise Resource Planning

Description: This course provides the latest trends, industry examples, predictions, and best practices for digital transformation. It aims to help companies reconsider their business models and become more resilient, profitable, and sustainable. The course covers the drivers of change and the value lever model for optimizing profitability. Experts from SAP, QUT University, and Deloitte LLP share their perspectives and customer experiences.
Title: The Business Opportunities of a Digitally Transformed Economy

LSC_product: SAP SuccessFactors Employee Central,integration add-on for SAP ERP HCM and SAP SuccessFactors HCM,SAP SuccessFactors HCM Suite,SAP SuccessFactors HCM Suite, integration for SAP ERP
LSC_product_category: Human Capital Management,Human Capital Management,Human Capital Management,Human Capital Management
Description: This course covers SAP's Intelligent Enterprise strategy, specifically focusing on the Human Capital Management (HCM) and the recruit-to-retire business process. It includes information on the three sub-processes of hire to retire, travel to reimburse, and external workforce management. The course also discusses the blueprint of the hire-to-retire process.
Title: Hire to Retire Process in the Intelligent Enterprise
LSC_product_subcategory: Cross Human Capital Management,Cross Human Capital Management,Cross Human Capital Management,Cross Human Capital Management

Description:
SAP Business ByDesign is SAP’s cloud-based ERP solution for SMEs and enables you to manage your entire business with a single cloud ERP solution. It is ideally suited for upper mid-market companies.
In this course you’ll learn how to get started with SAP Business ByDesign. The course offers a broad introduction to SAP Business ByDesign, including the SAP Business ByDesign architecture, as well as a solution demo of a complete end-to-end process.
It also explains SAP’s motivation to be a cloud player, introduces cloud computing, and illustrates the challenges involved in being a cloud provider.
Title: Getting Started with SAP Business ByDesign

Description: This course teaches basic statistical concepts and practices used in data science. It explores how data can be summarized, compared, and analyzed for patterns. The course also covers the misuse of statistics and how it can lead to misunderstandings or distortions. Overall, it aims to help you understand and apply statistics in your daily life.
Title: Introduction to Statistics for Data Science

Description: SAP Fiori helps enterprises to improve productivity, reduce costs, and enhance the user experience. This course discusses the things to consider from the early stages of an SAP S/4HANA transformation for implementing SAP Fiori. It follows a fictional company's journey in planning, realizing, and deploying SAP S/4HANA, and explores topics related to user experience. You’ll also learn how to deliver an intelligent experience through deploying intelligent technologies.
Title: How to Deliver a Great User Experience with SAP S/4HANA

Description: SAP Commerce Cloud, composable storefront, also known as project “Spartacus”, is a lean, Angular-based JavaScript storefront for SAP Commerce Cloud. It helps build single page application (SPA) and progressive web app (PWA) storefronts. SPAs and PWAs deliver an exceptional user experience because they behave like native apps. Although SPAs and PWAs provide a lot of benefits, they are not SEO-friendly by default. To address this, Spartacus includes several SEO features, one of which is configurable routing. The goal of this course is to introduce you to the routing capabilities of composable storefront. However, the course is also targeted at people who are new to the storefront, so you’ll learn how to set up a storefront from scratch and then how to extend it. You’ll also learn about the basic SEO guidelines for routing.
Title: Routing in Spartacus

LSC_product: SAP Build Process Automation,SAP Build Apps
Description:
Robotic process automation (RPA) helps reduce human error by automating business process-related manual tasks, increasing speed and lowering the total cost of ownership of software solutions. Adding intelligence means automated decision making, which leads to additional savings through the reduction of analytical effort.

This course will provide a solution overview, followed by practical SAP S/4HANA-based examples of how bots can be used to take over manual, repetitive task within SAP S/4HANA processes. You’ll learn how you can extend and modify bots accordingly to SAP Best Practices, how SAP Intelligent RPA technology works, how it can help you within SAP S/4HANA, and how you can adjust the bots according to your business needs.
Title: Business Process Automation in SAP S/4HANA with SAP Intelligent RPA
LSC_product_subcategory: Application Development and Automation,Application Development and Automation

Description: This course teaches media computation, a pedagogical idea which allows you to explore general purpose programming by playing with the building blocks of digital pictures, music, movies, and texts. You’ll learn how to analyze, manipulate, and create multimedia content using the visual programming language Snap!. The concepts and strategies learned for media can then be applied to other programming tasks and data sets from various sources. The course aims to bridge the gap between introductory programming and advanced computational skills.
Title: From Media Computation to Data Science

LSC_product: SAP S/4HANA,SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition,SAP S/4HANA Cloud
Description: This course provides a comprehensive overview of the technical aspects involved in converting a system to SAP S/4HANA. It covers new tools and changes made by SAP to support the transition. The course includes topics on authorization, upgrade strategy, user experience, adoption of custom code, and the impact on analytics and SAP BW. The content is based on project experiences and frequently asked questions.
Title: Key Technical Topics in a System Conversion to SAP S/4HANA
LSC_product_subcategory: Enterprise Resource Planning,Enterprise Resource Planning,Enterprise Resource Planning

LSC_product: SAP HANA Cloud,SAP HANA, platform edition
Description: This course focuses on optimizing query performance in SAP HANA. It covers analyzing and solving out-of-memory issues, understanding SQL processing, learning about the SAP HANA SQL optimizer, and improving SQL performance with SAP HANA-specific features. The course also explores performance analysis tools and includes demos and case studies.
Title: A First Step Towards SAP HANA Query Optimization

Description:
This course is designed to help you understand the core elements of innovation culture and enable you to apply these principles within your organization.
SAP AppHaus, a global network of customer-facing innovation teams, has designed and developed a framework of five key interconnected enablers of innovation culture: people, process, place, leadership, and technology. You’ll learn how people play a central role in innovation culture, where and how innovation happens, and be empowered with the skills and insights you need to drive and implement innovation as well as manage and sustain organizational change.
Title: Get Started with Innovation Culture

Description: This course focuses on the value of artificial intelligence technologies in the Intelligent Enterprise. It emphasizes that the value lies not in technical knowledge, but in adopting the solution and driving tangible results. The course teaches how to achieve defined business outcomes through an end-to-end business process view. It also explores how innovative technologies empower you to make better decisions with real-time contextual information. The course covers automating manual work in SAP S/4HANA and provides guidance on adopting AI in this system.
Title: Delivering Value with Intelligent Innovations in SAP S/4HANA

LSC_product: SAP Cloud Transport Management,SAP BTP, Cloud Foundry runtime and environment,SAP Automation Pilot,SAP Alert Notification service for SAP BTP,SAP Continuous Integration and Delivery,SAP Alert Notification service for SAP BTP
LSC_product_category: Business Technology Platform,Business Technology Platform,Business Technology Platform,Business Technology Platform,Business Technology Platform,Business Technology Platform
Description:
DevOps can be a key enabler for achieving high-level agility and quality in development projects.

In this course, you’ll get an introduction to general DevOps approaches and key principles. The course will then outline the SAP offerings, such as best practices, services, and tools, that enable you to foster DevOps principles efficiently along the relevant phases of SAP development projects based on different programming languages and technologies. You’ll learn where to find more information and how to start using the outlined offerings, and you’ll understand why they are the right choice for on-premise, hybrid, and cloud-native DevOps projects in SAP enterprise environments.
Title: Efficient DevOps with SAP
LSC_product_subcategory: Application Development and Automation,Application Development and Automation,Application Development and Automation,Integration,Application Development and Automation,Integration

Description: This course focuses on customer-facing and internal project-based services and their integration with sales, invoicing, purchasing, and financials in SAP Business ByDesign. The course explains the project management functionality, selling project-based services, time recording, resource management, procurement, and expense reporting. Demonstrations in the system help you apply the theory to daily work activities.
Title: SAP Business ByDesign Project-Based Services

Description: The business needs of small enterprises can be very specific and vary from company to company. This course teaches you how to develop add-ons with SAP Cloud Applications Studio to meet your specific business needs in SAP Business ByDesign. It also enables SAP partners and customers to increase their business by selling their add-ons to other companies interested in the same solution. The course includes many demonstrations and gives you access to SAP Cloud Applications Studio.
Title: Application Development for SAP Business ByDesign

Description:
We all use software practically every day, often without even realizing it! As our lives are transformed by the digital age, programming is becoming an important life skill. In this course, you’ll see how anyone can start building their own programs using Snap!, a block-based, open-source programming language. Its colorful, intuitive interface makes learning fast and fun, even for the most technically challenged! If you’ve already done some programming in Scratch, you’ll feel instantly at home. If not, don’t worry! Using animations, games, and artwork, this course will bring out the artist – and computer scientist – in you.
Learners young and old, experienced and novice alike, will soon discover why Snap! is becoming the programming language of choice for researchers and teachers of computer science around the world.
Title: Get Coding with Snap!

Description: This course teaches the basics of supply chain management and its integration with sales, purchasing, and financials in SAP Business ByDesign. It covers modeling your company, setting up the supply chain, and understanding planning, buying, and selling. It also explores product manufacturing, returns, repairs, and third-party processes. Additional topics include sales interfaces, product costing, and reporting capabilities. Demonstrations in the system are provided to connect theory to real-world work activities.
Title: SAP Business ByDesign Supply Chain Management

Description: This course explores the three pillars of Financials in SAP Business ByDesign: liquidity, controlling, and accounting. Experts will demonstrate the system and provide opportunities for hands-on exercises. The knowledge gained will help you understand the solution's capabilities and make implementation decisions.
Title: SAP Business ByDesign Financials

Description: This course provides an overview of the capabilities of the SAP Oil & Gas Secondary Distribution (OGSD) add-on. It covers topics such as OGSD Telesales, OGSD Data Collation, Integrated Dispatch Management, Retail Fuel Network Operations, and Continuous Product Replenishment.
Title: OGSD 7.0 – An Introduction to Oil & Gas Downstream Logistics

Description: This course focuses on Business Model Innovation (BMI) in the context of the digital economy. It covers the motivation and relevance of BMI and guides you through a full iteration cycle. You will analyze specific elements of your business model, challenge it, and test assumptions with customers. You will then select the most appropriate business model. The course includes an applied example from SAP and features guest speakers and experts from SAP explaining how they apply BMI in different areas.
Title: Designing Business Models for the Digital Economy

Description: This course focuses on the importance of design in creating quality products and delighting end users. You’ll learn the necessary skills and resources for designing and building quality products and how to integrate good design into your daily work.
Title: Software Design for Non-Designers

Description:
Agile methods like Scrum and Kanban aim to enable teams to deliver feature increments in short cycles. One of the key elements to achieving this efficiently and with high quality is the practice of test automation, which ensures that all functional and regression testing is automated. These tests are written by developers, ideally at the same time as the product code. The key to effective test automation is learning to write code which is easily testable. There are numerous benefits to following this development approach, including producing higher quality code in less time, reducing efforts for bug analysis and fixes, and being more responsive to changing requirements.

This course will teach you how to write testable code in ABAP and covers topics such as unit testing, test isolation, test-driven development, testing legacy code, and more.
Title: Writing Testable Code for ABAP

Description: In this course, you’ll get an overview of design research from SAP’s experts that will help you get the most out of your field research experience. From identifying users through conducting a field visit to developing points of view, this course will provide you with a foundation for conducting design research in a people-centric way.
Title: Basics of Design Research

Description: This course focuses on the importance of system integration and data automation in a growing business. It introduces SAP Business One as an ERP solution for small and midsize businesses, offering an integration framework for data transfer. The framework serves as a collaboration infrastructure and provides message-oriented middleware, a service bus, Business Process Management, and data integration for mobile solutions. The course allows you to explore the integration framework's capabilities and build your own integration scenarios using various data sources.
Title: In Action - Integration Framework for SAP Business One

Description: This course focuses on customer-engaging scenarios in marketing, sales, and service, including invoicing, pricing, and analytics in SAP Business ByDesign. The integration with project management, logistics, purchasing, and financials is also discussed. The course provides insights on managing teams, planning, and tracking marketing activities, order-to-cash scenarios, contract management, selling material products, selling and executing standardized services, field service and repair, invoicing, pricing, tax, organizational and master data setup, and cross-topics like mobility, customer analytics, and integration to 3rd party solutions. System demonstrations are provided to apply the learning to daily work activities.
Title: SAP Business ByDesign Customer Relationship Management

LSC_product: SAP Product Lifecycle Costing, cloud edition
Description: This course covers the essentials of SAP Product Lifecycle Costing, including use cases, capabilities, features, business processes, and best practices. It enables you to simulate and compare cost alternatives, calculate costs for new products, identify cost drivers, and optimize mid-term financial planning and supply chain. You'll learn how to create calculations, use master data, create reports and simulations, and enhance the tool.
Title: Freedom to Calculate with SAP Product Lifecycle Costing

Description: Learn about the major enhancements for certification SAP S/4HANA System Administration to prepare for the assessment to stay certified.
Title: SAP S/4HANA System Administration

Description: This course explains how to use Focused Build for SAP Solution Manager for SAP implementation projects. It covers the basic functionalities of Focused Build and its use throughout the project lifecycle. The course includes topics such as solution documentation, requirements management, test management, release management, and setting up SAP Solution Manager. By using guided project procedures, you can reduce the risk of deployment failures, enable real-time status views, and maintain a centralized source of truth for business processes and documentation.

Description: In this course, you’ll dive deeper into the key concepts of enterprise cloud computing. You don’t require much prior knowledge to attend the course and you’ll experience it like a student in the lecture hall. All sessions were recorded during Prof. Hasso Plattner’s Trends and Concepts lecture at the HPI in 2021 and 2022. This course is the successor to the course Enterprise Goes Cloud 1, building upon the foundations presented there and offering additional angles to challenges in, for example, data management. In this course, you’ll get a comprehensive overview of current developments in enterprise cloud computing.
Title: Enterprise Goes Cloud 2

Description: This learning journey will enable you to take your ERP transformation expertise to the next level with related advanced training session. Designed for Enterprise Architects and IT professionals, this Learning Journey focuses on aligning processes, applications, data, and people to ensure a smooth and successful transformation.

Upon completing this learning journey, you will be able to:

  • Engage in peer discussions to exchange insights, challenges, and solutions on key transformation topics.

Description: This learning journey discusses essential features and requirements for advanced production planning in SAP S/4HANA using Production Planning and Detailed Scheduling (PP/DS). Also referred to as embedded PP/DS or ePP/DS. You explore the master data requirements for advanced planning, and you work with the alert monitor. The core features of Demand Management and the various (groups of) planning strategies in embedded PP/DS in SAP S/4HANA are explored. Make-to-order production, make-to-stock production, and various related features and functions in embedded PP/DS are discussed. The concept and use of heuristics is explained, as well as various concepts and principles for detailed scheduling, like the finiteness level of a resource and the use of alternative modes. The detailed scheduling planning board is introduced, and you explore the functionality known as Supply Creation-Based Confirmation. Both scheduling optimization and an introduction to production planning optimization (PPO) are also covered.
Title: Exploring Advanced Production Planning with SAP S/4HANA PP/DS
Learning_objectives: By the end of this learning journey, you will be familiar with advanced planning in SAP S/4HANA using (embedded) PP/DS. You will know the master data requirements for PP/DS, and you will have worked with the product view and the alert monitor. You will have seen and executed various planning examples of both make-to-order and make-to-stock production. You will also have worked with detailed scheduling, and you will know about optimization in both DS and in production planning (using PPO).
LSC_product_subcategory: Enterprise Resource Planning,Enterprise Resource Planning,Enterprise Resource Planning

Description: This learning journey focuses on the SAP Business AI Commercial Model and its updated pricing structure. You will understand the rationale behind the changes, learn key components, and discover how to manage AI Unit usage effectively. The learning journey also prepares you to engage customers, highlight the benefits of SAP Business AI, and position it competitively in the market.
Learning_objectives: After completing this learning journey, you will be able to understand the motivations behind SAP's new AI pricing model and its limitations, describe the key components of the new commercial structure—including Base AI, Premium AI, Joule, and AI Foundation—and manage AI Unit usage effectively. You will also be able to identify the benefits of this pricing strategy to facilitate customer adoption and scaling of AI solutions, initiate impactful conversations that showcase the value of SAP Business AI while aligning with customer transformation goals, and confidently position SAP Business AI against competitors by utilizing strategic sales processes and tools.
Title: Selling SAP Business AI - 2025 Commercial Model Update

Description:
This learning journey explains in detail how to run two interactive sessions aimed at exploring and defining AI use cases based on business and user needs.

 Challenge: Spot the Differences and Win!  

Throughout the lessons of this training, our crafty speakers have made some sneaky changes in the set. Can you catch them?

 Your Mission: Watch closely all videos and note differences in the set between videos from different lessons (e.g. different plant between lesson 1 and 3). Note as many as possible and send your list to apphaus@sap.com. 

 What's in it for you?

The first 10 participants to send 20 differences will receive a printed set of the Opportunity, Limitation, and Ideation cards - perfect for your Business AI Explore and Design workshops!
Learning_objectives:
After completing this learning journey, you will be able to:

  • Prepare and run a Business AI Explore Workshop with strategic decision makers to ideate and identify AI use cases with business value.
  • Prepare and run a Business AI Design workshop with business and IT experts to understand user requirements for a use case idea or existing process, ideate valuable AI capabilities to improve it, and define a future user experience enriched with AI.
Title: Applying a Human-Centered Approach to Identify and Define Business AI Use Cases

Description: This course provides a comprehensive overview of SAP's strategic direction, key components, and execution plans. We will cover the why, what, and how of our strategy, ensuring a clear understanding of our goals and ambitions. This introduction sets the stage for a deep dive into the various aspects of our strategy, highlighting the importance of each component and how they interconnect to drive SAP's success. By the end of this presentation, you will have a thorough understanding of our strategic vision and the steps we are taking to achieve our ambitious goals.
Learning_objectives:
• Understand how an annual refresh keeps SAP’s strategy relevant 
  • Define SAP’s strategic priorities in 2025
  • Execute SAP’s strategy throughout the organization
Title: Exploring SAP’s Strategy for 2025

Description: This learning journey will guide you through the Lead to Cash business process in the Intelligent Enterprise, as well the way SAP Customer Experience and SAP S/4HANA solutions operate together to implement them and how AI leverages its use cases.
Title: Exploring the Lead to Cash Business Process in SAP Customer Experience
Learning_objectives: By the end of this learning journey, learners will be able to: comprehensively explore the SAP Lead to Cash business process, including its individual stages and the function of SAP Customer Experience Solutions during the process through practical application and examples. They will be able to explain how the Lead to Cash process goes from the first marketing contact to post-purchase service and every touchpoint in between, to describe the roles, business entities and operations of each stage, identify common variations, and explain how AI enhances the process in each solution.

Description: After completing this learning journey, as an SAP HANA database administrator, you will know the functions of SAP HANA Scale-Out and SAP HANA system replication. You will learn how to set up, configure and manage SAP HANA scale-out systems and understand what happens in the event of a worker and/or coordinator node failure. In the second part of this learning journey, you will learn how to set up and configure SAP HANA system replication. You will also configure the advanced system replication features such as active/active and time travel.
Title: Setting up High Availability and Disaster Recovery for SAP HANA
Learning_objectives:
• Understand how to use SAP HANA scale-out systems to increase the high availability.
  • Setup and configure SAP HANA scale-out systems.
  • Know how to use SAP HANA system replication to increase the disaster tolerance of the system.
  • Setup and configure SAP HANA system replication including the advanced features active/active and time travel.
  • Understand how to use tenant replication.

  • Identify the considerations for users when they are subject to FBT
  • Compare Attendee Status and Attendee Types
  • Configure the Attendee Types to support FBT
  • Configure FBT in the Tax Administration tool
  • Configure the Attendee Detail View to support FBT
  • Activate FBT on your Australia Policy
  • Activate the Travel Diary on your Australia Policy
  • Explain how FBT affects SAE

Description: This course is a beginner course designed to give consultants who are completely new to the procurement area an overview of how the basic procurement process generally works. LSC_product: SAP Portfolio and Project Management for SAP S/4HANA
Description: In this Learning Journey you will learn how to create, plan and execute investment projects in SAP S/4HANA EPPM Project System. You will experience the end-to-end business process, from creation of projects structures, planning of costs and budgeting, to period-end settlement of projects.
Title: Exploring Investment Projects in SAP S/4HANA
Learning_objectives:
After completing this Learning Journey you will be able to:

  • Create investment projects using templates.
  • Create and maintain Work Breakdown Structures (WBS).
  • Carry out cost planning of investment projects.
  • Carry out budgeting of investment projects.
  • Release and execute investment projects.
  • Run period-end closing activities and settle projects to asset accounting.
  • Use reporting features in SAP S/4HANA to analyzes structure and costs of investment projects.

Description:
This course will give you an introduction to the functions and features of SAP S/4HANA Project System.
It covers the whole project lifecycle of investment and logistics projects.

You will learn how to create projects from templates and how to carry out scheduling, cost planning, budgeting, resource planning and revenue planning for projects.
You will also learn how to carry out activities during the realization phase of projects such as recording confirmations, processing external procurement, posting actual revenues, results analysis an project settlement.
Reporting feature will help you track the project through the lifecycle.
Title: Discovering the Basics of SAP S/4HANA Project System
Learning_objectives:
• Understand the solutions in SAP S/4HANA Enterprise Portfolio and Project Management
  • Create an investment project using a template
  • Carry out cost planning and budgeting for investment projects
  • Record activities and costs to investment projects
  • Settle investment projects to asset accounting
  • Create a logistics project from a sales order using assembly processing
  • Carry out scheduling, capacity planning and revenue planning
  • Confirm activities, carry out billing and results analysis
  • Settle logistics project to profitability analysis

Description: In this course, you’ll learn the key concepts of enterprise cloud computing. You don’t require much prior knowledge to attend the course and you’ll experience it like a student in the lecture hall. All the sessions were recorded during Prof. Hasso Plattner’s Trends and Concepts lecture at the HPI, 2020. Starting with the fundamental difference between cloud models ranging from IaaS to SaaS, through technical concepts such as containerization and workflow engines, and ending with an outlook into possible future directions, you’ll get a comprehensive overview of current developments in enterprise cloud computing.
Title: Enterprise Goes Cloud
LSC_product_subcategory: Application Development and Automation,Application Development and Automation,Application Development and Automation,Technology Platform,Enterprise Resource Planning,Application Development and Automation

LSC_product: SAP S/4HANA,SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition,SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition
Description:
SAP S/4HANA supports business processes with embedded analytics to provide the right information in the right place to the right users. For this, SAP S/4HANA comes with a huge set of predefined analytical apps, no-code key user tools for analytics extensibility, and the APIs to cover use cases beyond embedded analytics that require enterprise analytics solutions from SAP such as SAP Analytics Cloud and SAP Datasphere.

This course explains the general concepts, strategies, and features around embedded analytics, including predefined business content and tools for business users as well as tools for analytics specialists. The course also provides an introduction to embedded predictive and machine learning features and detailed information about the integration of SAP S/4HANA data into SAP Analytics Cloud and SAP Datasphere.
Title: Going Deeper with SAP S/4HANA Embedded Analytics
LSC_product_subcategory: Enterprise Resource Planning,Enterprise Resource Planning,Enterprise Resource Planning

Description: This course introduces you to SAP Integration Suite, a collection of services that simplify integrations and create a harmonized environment for internal and external systems. It covers the end-to-end integration process, exposing processes as APIs and integrating heterogeneous systems. By the end of the course, you’ll know how to leverage the platform to accelerate integrations, reduce costs, improve customer experiences, and achieve process excellence.
Title: Accelerate Enterprise Integrations with SAP Integration Suite

Description:
SAP Business ByDesign is a cloud-based ERP solution supporting end-to-end business processes across various application areas. It supports various industry verticals and scenarios for small and mid-size enterprises.

This course covers how to manage SAP Business ByDesign, including setting up an organizational structure, extending the solution, and importing/exporting data. Topics include organizational management, task management, data import/export, solution extension, data protection, privacy, and information management from an administrator's perspective. System demonstrations are provided throughout the course for a clearer understanding of the solution.
Title: SAP Business ByDesign Administration

LSC_product: SAP S/4HANA,SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition
Description:
DevOps principles are becoming more and more relevant in all processes which involve software development. Many development languages and software management environments already follow these paradigms. If you want to set up DevOps for SAP S/4HANA ABAP development processes, the Git-enabled Change and Transport System (gCTS) is the way to go.

The aim of this course is to provide you with an understanding of gCTS in all its aspects. You’ll get to know the features and options that are part of the standard delivery and learn how you can extend gCTS to adapt it to your processes and needs. Exercise documents are provided for your reference if you want to set up gCTS in your system(s).
Title: DevOps for ABAP with gCTS in SAP S/4HANA

Description:
In today’s digital world, people want a fantastic user experience in all interactions with software. These interactions require users to understand what’s on the screen. SAP Translation Hub can help to translate content quickly and efficiently by leveraging SAP’s vast translation experience.

In this course, you’ll discover general concepts and features around SAP Translation Hub and learn more about machine translation. You’ll also learn how to use or integrate translation APIs, and the translation workflow to translate texts and documents.
Title: Enable Users in Multilingual Business with SAP Translation Hub

LSC_product: SAP SuccessFactors Employee Central,SAP SuccessFactors HCM Suite,SAP SuccessFactors HCM Suite, integration for SAP ERP,integration add-on for SAP ERP HCM and SAP SuccessFactors HCM

Description: This course focuses on SAP's holistic HR strategy and its relation to the Intelligent Enterprise suite, including SAP SuccessFactors HCM. It explores the end-to-end Hire to Retire business process and its sub-processes. Topics covered include digital workplace experience, people analytics, identity access management, workflow management, time management capabilities, payroll, and Master Data Integration. The course also provides tools and best practices for implementing and configuring the Hire to Retire process. You’ll be able to apply the learnings to your own company and strive towards becoming an Intelligent Enterprise.
Title: Hire to Retire – Strategy, Implementation, and Operations
LSC_product_subcategory: Cross Human Capital Management,Cross Human Capital Management,Cross Human Capital Management,Cross Human Capital Management

Description:
Robotic process automation (RPA) accelerates the digital transformation of business processes by automatically replicating tedious actions that have no added value. SAP Intelligent Robotic Process Automation is a complete automation suite where software robots are designed to mimic humans by replacing manual clicks and automate end-to-end scenarios for definable and repeatable business processes.  

This course provides an update on the solution since the course “Enter Next-Level Bot Building with SAP Intelligent RPA 2.0”. In the previous course, you learned how to create your own bots in the Cloud Studio, how to configure and monitor them with the Cloud Factory, and how to make them run as jobs sent to Desktop Agents in attended or unattended mode. In this course, you’ll learn what’s new in SAP Intelligent RPA 2.0 and discover how the solution makes it simpler to design, orchestrate, and monitor your bots. You can of course test the solution on SAP BTP trial.
Title: What's New with Bot Building in SAP Intelligent RPA 2.0

Description: This course provides an overview of SAP BTP, ABAP environment, focusing on the basic components of SAP Business Technology Platform and the ABAP development environment. It also covers the evolution of the ABAP programming model and the ABAP RESTful programming model (RAP). Additionally, it discusses extending SAP business applications with SAP Extension Suite, including the importance of extensibility, developer tools, use-cases, and extension types. An example scenario of implementing side-by-side extensions is also included.
Title: Introduction to ABAP in the Cloud

Description:
This course introduces the design thinking methodology and helps participants practice in-demand skills such as problem-solving, critical thinking, and creativity. The first section focuses on unpacking and framing problems using techniques such as Persona and Customer Journey Map.
The second section focuses on ideation, prototyping, and testing to create user-centric solutions.
Title: Design Thinking in a Nutshell

Description: This course provides insights into SAP HANA Cloud. It covers an introduction to in-memory database technology and deployment options. LSC_product: SAP S/4HANA,SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition,SAP S/4HANA Cloud
Description: This course covers important aspects of a system conversion to SAP S/4HANA and explains the technical activities needed before the conversion, including deploying tools and performing checks. It also discusses SAP Readiness Check and adapting custom code. The course then explains the process of executing the technical upgrade with tools like Maintenance Planner and Software Update Manager. After the upgrade, you’ll learn about the configuration required to benefit from innovation, such as activating SAP Fiori user experience and embedded analytics. The course concludes by explaining configuration and examples for activating Intelligent Enterprise scenarios in SAP S/4HANA.

Description: This learning journey introduces core business processes in Overhead Cost Accounting. This is an initial starting point to get some first experience with cost centers, projects, and (depending on deployment option) internal orders. This learning journey is valid for SAP S/4HANA Cloud, public and private editions as well as on premise.
Title: Performing Overhead Cost Controlling​ in SAP S/4HANA
Learning_objectives:
After completing this learning journey, employees responsible for overhead cost accounting operations and planning will be familiar with SAP S/4HANA with respect to:

  • Describing the components of management accounting
  • Managing master data in overhead cost accounting
  • Tracking and managing overhead costs
  • Allocating and settling costs
  • Entering plan data
  • Using embedded analytics to report on overhead costs.

This fundamental knowledge helps to provide reliable information to management and to ensure that actual, planning, and reporting processes are performed efficiently. Learners in the controller role will be able to help the different departments to monitor their expenses and revenues.

Description: In this learning journey, you will explore how to apply the machine learning workflow. The steps from feature extraction to model evaluation are illustrated to ensure a comprehensive understanding of the process. The scenario presented in this learning journey focuses on preventing employee churn, a key business problem addressed using SAP HANA Cloud Machine Learning.
Learning_objectives:
By the end of this learning journey, you will be able to:

  • Configure the Python Machine Learning Client for SAP HANA (hana-ml) and connect it to SAP HANA Cloud.
  • Access and visually explore SAP HANA data using HANA DataFrames in Python.
  • Train a classification model for predicting employee churn rate using hana-ml Predictive Analysis Library (PAL) functions.
  • Perform model evaluation to assess the accuracy and effectiveness of the trained model.
Title: Developing Classification Models with the Python Machine Learning Client for SAP HANA

Description:
SAP believes that artificial intelligence (AI) has the potential to unlock all kinds of opportunities for businesses, governments, and society. However, AI also has the potential to create economic, political, and social challenges. Many people are concerned about the impact of AI on their lives as well as the associated uncertainty and risks. SAP acknowledges AI’s profound impact on decisions, fairness, transparency, privacy, and human dignity. For this reason, the development, deployment, use, and sale of AI systems at SAP is governed by a clear, ethical set of rules that takes into account technological advancements and the evolving regulatory landscape.

In this free online course, you’ll learn the importance and principles of AI ethics, how SAP set up an ethics governance framework, and which rules SAP employees need to follow during the development, deployment, use, and sale of AI systems.
Learning_objectives:
After completing this course, developers, architects, data scientists and consultants will be able to:
•    Understand the importance and principles of AI ethics
•    Explain SAP’s AI ethics governance framework
•    Identify the rules that SAP employees need to follow during the development, deployment, use, and sale of AI systems
•    Name examples of how ethical requirements can be technically implemented in AI systems
Title: Putting AI Ethics into Practice at SAP

In this learning journey you will explore and learn how the managed gateway gives you a fast, simple way to connect your SAP Ariba solutions to back-end systems without the need for multiple adapters. Description: This course provides a comprehensive guide to configuring and implementing the SAP Batch Release Hub for Life Sciences. Learning_objectives:
Configure the SAP Batch Release Hub to meet specific business needs
Integrate the hub with various source systems such as RIMS, LIMS, DMS, QMS, MES, and GBT 
Utilize the hub to automate and simplify batch release processes, replacing paper-based methods

Title: Exploring Logistics Projects in SAP S/4HANA
Learning_objectives:
Upon completing this Learning Journey you will be able to:

  • Create logistics projects using templates.
  • Create and maintain networks and activities within Work Breakdown Structures (WBS).
  • Carry out cost and revenue planning of logistics projects.
  • Carry out material procurement for logistics projects.
  • Release and execute logistics projects.
  • Run period-end closing activities including results analysis and settle projects to profitability analysis.
  • Use reporting features in SAP S/4HANA to analyzes structure, revenues, costs and contribution margin of logistics projects.

Description:
In this video tutorial, Philip Mugglestone covers SAP Cloud Transport Management service. After subscribing to the service and configuring credentials, SAP BTP subaccounts are configured to host the QA and production nodes of the transport model. Philip also shows how to share an instance of SAP HANA Cloud between different subaccounts hosted in the same Cloud Foundry datacenter/region.

0:00 - Introduction
0:45 - Subscribe to SAP Cloud Transport Management
1:30 - Create role collection and add business user
2:40 - Create SAP Cloud Transport Management service instance and add service key
3:55 - Add credential with service key
5:00 - Create QA and PROD subaccount; enable Cloud Foundry (org); add space; add technical user as member
7:50 - Configure entitlements for qa and prod subaccounts
9:50 - Create mapping for SAP HANA Cloud instance sharing
11:30 - Recap

DevOps with SAP BTP: https://help.sap.com/viewer/product/DEVOPS_OVERVIEW

Please be aware that the UI of SAP Cloud Transport Management service might have changed since the time of recording, due to additional features that have been added to the service. 

Please note:
This video was originally published on the SAP HANA Academy YouTube Channel and therefore may contain references to SAP HANA Academy and YouTube. The tech world is always evolving and the SAP HANA Academy YouTube channel is set to close on December 31, 2023. At that time, references will no longer be valid and will gradually be removed when the videos are updated.
Also, this video includes automatically generated captions and therefore might misrepresent the spoken content or display incorrect product names
Title: SAP BTP DevOps: SAP Cloud Transport Management Pt 1

Description:
Learn how the Final Due Date (FDD) calculation works in SAP S/4HANA Maintenance Management - Proactive Maintenance.

The Final Due Date (FDD) enables the maintenance planners and maintenance supervisors to keep track of maintenance jobs that are time-critical and need to be completed before this deadline is reached.

Since SAP S/4HANA 2022 and in SAP S/4HANA Cloud, the Maintenance Management solution provides a flexible feature to define the final due date and adjust the basic start date and basic end date of maintenance call objects generated from the preventive maintenance plans.
Title: Introducing the Final Due Date Calculation in SAP S/4HANA Proactive Maintenance

Description: Low vision users can take advantage of personalization options in SAP Fiori to make the system more comfortable and easier to perceive. Meet one of SAP's low vision users and gain some suggestions on some useful personalization options to get you started.
Title: Navigating SAP Fiori for SAP S/4HANA as a Low Vision User - Accessibility

Description:
This video explains the user data permissions for Stock Models and how to set them up in embedded analytics for SAP SuccessFactors Incentive Management.

For more information about embedded analytics for SAP SuccessFactors Incentive Management videos, go to Working with Embedded Analytics for SAP Commissions.
Title: Setting Up User Data Access Permissions for Embedded Analytics - SAP SuccessFactors Incentive Management

Description: This video demonstrates how end users can edit their profile, including changing a profile picture, editing general information, and configuring notifications in SAP Advanced Workflow.
Title: Editing a Profile through SAP Advanced Workflow in SAP SuccessFactors Incentive Management

Description: This video defines Teams, discusses how to use Teams to expedite story distribution to users. It also discusses how to share a story and describes the various story permissions.
Title: Defining Teams and Story Permissions in Embedded Analytics for SAP SuccessFactors Incentive Management

LSC_product: SAP Ariba Supplier Lifecycle and Performance
Description:
In this video, you’ll learn how to unlink a supplier user's SAP Business Network account from your site and how to unlink a supplier's SAP Business Network account and ANID from your site in SAP Ariba.


Please note, the name Ariba Network was retired in April 2022. Ariba Network was split, and functionality from Ariba Network was made available in SAP Business Network for Procurement. However, the retired name still appears in the user interface and may be present in audio narrations.
Title: Managing Suppliers' SAP Business Network Account Links - SAP Ariba

Description: Learn how to source for direct materials in SAP Ariba Sourcing, create requests for proposals using the guided sourcing capabilities and receive bids from suppliers.
Title: Working with SAP Ariba Direct Spend Sourcing

Description: Learn how to import content into a brand new RFP event using Microsoft Excel. Streamline the process, recycle content, and add participants offline SAP Ariba Sourcing. Watch now!
Title: Creating Event Content via Microsoft Excel in SAP Ariba Sourcing

Description: This video explains how end users and administrators can update login names and passwords in Workflow.
Title: Updating Login Name and Password through SAP Advanced Workflow in SAP SuccessFactors Incentive Management

Description: This video will show end-users how to modify the date and time formats displayed on case details.
Title: Modifying Date and Time Format through SAP Advanced Workflow in SAP SuccessFactors Inventive Management

LSC_product: SAP Ariba Supplier Lifecycle and Performance
Description: At the end of this video, you will be able to add, edit, and delete a supplier contact from the supplier 360° profile in SAP Ariba Supplier Management.
Title: Managing Supplier Contacts in Supplier 360° Profiles in SAP Ariba Supplier Management

Description:
This video provides and overview of how to create a Request for Proposals within SAP Ariba Sourcing.

The overview provides common use cases and a demonstration of how to create a sourcing project with RFP as the event type.
Title: Creating Requests for Proposals in SAP Ariba Sourcing

Description: Learn how to set up pricing conditions within SAP Ariba sourcing events. Discover how to specify pricing for different validity periods and volume scales, leading to more accurate pricing.
Title: Creating Pricing Conditions within SAP Ariba Sourcing Events

Description: Learn how to add terms to an RFP using price breakdown in SAP Ariba Sourcing. Understand the benefits of price breakdown and how it helps in comparing supplier prices.
Title: Adding Terms to Events Using Price Breakdown in SAP Ariba Sourcing

Description:
Learn how to create event content such as sections, requirements, and questions. Discover how to add visibility conditions and make monitoring the event easier. Watch now!

# This description was auto-generated #
Title: Creating Sections, Requirements and Questions in SAP Ariba Sourcing Events

Description: This video provides an overview of how to set up bid transformation events within SAP Ariba sourcing. Learn how to collect additional cost components and compare vendors for better decision-making.
Title: Using Bid Transformation in SAP Ariba Sourcing Events

In this video series, we'll introduce some of the applications when using Data Intelligence. In this video, we'll go through using the Machine Learning Scenario Manager (MLSM) where you can complete your data science tasks. The MLSM helps you to organize your data science artifacts and manage all tasks related to your work in one central place. An ML scenario may contain datasets, pipelines, and Jupyter Notebooks. Within the scenario, you can also manage the model performance metrics and deployment history.

The SAP Data Intelligence ML Scenario Manager helps you to organize your data science artifacts and to manage your tasks in a central location. As a multi-faceted data science application, it is built around the key concept of the machine learning (ML) scenario, which may contain datasets, pipelines, and Jupyter notebooks.

Description:
SAP Data Intelligence helps manage your data across different systems by using the Metadata Explorer. The Metadata Explorer gathers information about the location, attributes, quality, and sensitivity of data. With this information, you can make informed decisions about which datasets to publish and determine who has access to use or view information about the datasets.

In this second of a nine part video series regarding the SAP Data Intelligence Machine Learning Scenario Manager, Tahir Hussain Babar (Bob) introduces the source data used in the series, by using Connection Management to show the connection to the SAP Semantic Data Lake and using the Metadata Explorer to profile the data.

Title: Understanding Progressive Profiling in SAP Customer Data Cloud

Description:
In this video, you'll learn all about Customer Data Cloud’s Accounts APIs. They're the core of the Registration-as-a-Service (RaaS) platform, providing the basic building blocks of functionality. 

The API gives you complete flexibility in terms of design and maintaining full control of the server-side integration. The Accounts API provides access to the user account data stored by Customer Data Cloud. The user data stored includes Customer Data Cloud's predefined fields, social graph, and site's specific custom fields.

The Accounts APIs are supported both for client-side (Web SDK) and server side (REST API). We encourage you to use server-side APIs whenever applicable. If you'd like to get more advanced with your RaaS CIAM solution, checkout these videos!
Title: Exploring Accounts API in SAP Customer Data Cloud

Description:
Part Four of this series gives you an overview of the features and functions of the app. You will learn how to navigate through the app and how you can perform the reconciliation process. You will also understand how a position closeout can be mirrored from a broker statement directly to a connected backend system.

Note: There is an error in the voiceover at 3:41. The mismatch is in the Contract Quantity field, not in the Price field as spoken.
Title: Features and Functions Demo - SAP Broker Reconciliation for Commodity Derivatives

Description:
This microlearning will showcase how to setup material determination by maintaining Project Billing profile in Billing Project - S/4HANA Cloud Professional services.

Check out the following links for additional learning:
  • help.sap.com/learningjourneys
Title: How to Set Up Material Determination for Project Billing - SAP S/4HANA Cloud Professional Services

Description: In this video, you will learn how to set up your local Composable Storefront environment by using the Composable Storefront libraries.
Title: Setting Up a Local SAP Commerce Cloud Composable Storefront Instance

Description: In this video, you will learn how to use and set-up SAP S/4HANA Output Management for Maintenance Notifications and Maintenance Orders as well as how to manage the output of multiple Maintenance Orders using Work Packs.
Title: Using SAP S/4HANA Output Management with Work Packs

Description:
This video demonstrates how to use Business Data Orchestration and the distribution models. Learn about SAP One Domain Model, SAP Master Data Integration Service, data providers and consumers, filters, distribution modes, and the role of the scheduler.

# This description was auto-generated #
Title: Introducing Business Data Orchestration and Distribution Models

Description: In this quick guide video, we will introduce SAP Customer Data Cloud’s Enterprise Consent and Preference Management Solution, or ECPM.
Title: Introducing SAP ECPM

Description: This microlearning explains how to adapt changes in business roles and make it in line with the upgraded business role templates.
Title: How to Adapt Changes in Business Role in SAP S/4HANA Cloud, Public Edition

Description: This microlearning demonstrates user creation in Central Business Configuration (CBC) in SAP S/4HANA Cloud, public edition along with a system demo.
Title: How to Create Users in CBC in SAP S/4HANA Cloud, Public Edition

Description: With the help of a system demo, this microlearning explains how to assign business users to user groups in Central Business Configuration (CBC) in SAP S/4HANA Cloud, public edition and introduces the different types of roles or user groups in CBC.
Title: How to Assign Business Users to User Groups in CBC in SAP S/4HANA Cloud, Public Edition

Description:
In this video, you'll learn how to manage deprecated catalogs in SAP S/4HANA Cloud, public edition and execute their replacement with new ones. 

As there is an ongoing development of new features and new apps in every release of SAP S/4HANA Cloud, public edition, some business catalogs might be redesigned or deprecated and replaced by new ones. In that case, customers need to periodically revise the existing business catalogs and make the necessary changes to remove the deprecated ones from the business roles and replace it with new catalogs. Within this microlearning video, a system demo will show you the replacement process.
Title: How to Manage Deprecated Business Catalogs in SAP S/4HANA Cloud, Public Edition

Description: SAP S/4HANA Cloud is provisioned to customers, through 3 distinct landscapes. In this video, the topology of these 3 systems, their line up along the SAP Activate phases and the quarterly upgrade process will all be explained. Understanding the upgrade process, in conjunction with the quarterly releases, is crucial in ensuring a smooth go-live process.
Title: System Landscaping and Provisioning - SAP S/4HANA Deployment

Description:
In this microlearning, you'll receive a concise overview on the Manage Workforce App. 

First off, there will be general information on the app along with the prerequisites that have to be performed. After that, a system demo will demonstrate the functions navigation, worker creation and worker maintenance.
Title: Manage Workforce App - SAP S/4HANA Cloud, Public Edition

Description: In this video, you will learn how to create the perfect support case in SAP for Me. We'll walk you through a few essential steps to ensure your issue is clearly documented and efficiently routed to the appropriate support team. By following these guidelines, you can help speed up the resolution process and get the assistance you need more effectively.
Title: Creating a Support Case in SAP for Me

Description: Watch how John, a maintenance engineer, uses SAP Ariba Buying to search and buy products from catalogs that suppliers manage. Experience the seamless integration of SAP Ariba Buying with SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition.
Title: Showcasing SAP Ariba Buying with SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition

Description: This video introduces you to the Pipeline results data calculated and stored in SAP SuccessFactors Incentive Management user interface. It provides a few simple steps to trace the results from the final result such as Payments to Credits and vice-versa using the Related Search option. You can view examples of how data is populated from the input into the calculated results data and the options to display custom results.
Title: Understanding Pipeline Results in SAP SuccessFactors Incentive Management

Description:
In this microlearning, you will learn about sales rebate processing using the functionality of condition contracts and the corresponding settlement. 

The video will be divided into two main sections: First, we will have a look at a typical business process scenario and explain, based on real project implementation experience, how sales rebates are used and what kind of special requirements can occur. After the context has been given, the second part will show you directly in the system how to create the sales rebate agreement, highlight important price relevant information and finally triggers a settlement for a completed period.
Title: Settlement of Sales Rebate Agreements - SAP S/4HANA Cloud for Sales, Public Edition

Description: See how approval tasks can be created in a contract workspace for documents and the entire workspace in SAP Ariba.
Title: Working with Approval Tasks in SAP Ariba Contracts

Description: This video provides an overview of the 13 data models in embedded analytics for SAP SuccessFactors Incentive Management.  It also details how the data models retrieve data from the SAP SuccessFactors Incentive Management pipeline process and highlights Admin only models and Payee data models.
Title: Data Models Overview in Embedded Analytics for SAP SuccessFactors Incentive Management

Description: Learn what is verbose logging and how to use it.  Find a detailed demonstration on finding errors in the Pipeline Details section. Know how to trace the cause of error in the log files. Also, get to know a few best practices to review log files.
Title: Finding and Interpreting Pipeline Verbose Logs in SAP SuccessFactors Incentive Management

Title: Login Name and Mail ID in Central Business Configuration in SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition

Description:
In this video, you will learn about the Web Content Management System, or WCMS, in SAP Commerce Cloud.
After a brief introduction about the different kinds of catalogs in SAP Commerce Cloud, you will hear about the core CMS data model. Then, we 'll move on to focus on the Content Catalog. You will watch a walkthrough of the Backoffice UI of the WCMS, and then look at the page model with its pages, content slots and components.
Title: An overview of Web Content Management System - SAP Commerce Cloud

Description:
The bootcamp uses an end-to-end storyline about a Sustainable Smart Factory filled with Intelligence and Sustainability ;

* Building a deep learning Image Segmentation Model on product images with SAP AI Core for automatic Defeat Detection in production lines
* Building a deep learning Sound Anomaly Classification Model on acoustical sounds of machinery with SAP AI Core for condition monitoring based Predictive Maintenance
* Configure and Deploy the sustainable-smart-factory-app(CAP based) to your own SAP HANA Cloud
* Creating a Plant 360 story to analyze Production and Sustainability KPIs of plant such as production, defective rate, energy consumption and CO2 emission etc SAP Analytics Cloud.
* Maintenance Cost Planning with Predictive Planning of SAP Analytics Cloud for Planning.
* Sustainability Planning and Energy Rate Prediction with Predictive Planning of SAP Analytics Cloud for Planning.

https://sap.to/6058zAfGy

SAP AI GitHub ; https://sap.to/6059zAfGJ
