Description:
In this playlist by Tahir Hussain Babar (Bob), from the SAP HANA Academy, we use SAP Artificial Intelligence to build a Deep Learning Image Segmentation Model which will help us perform automated Defect Detection on images of products. In this video, we look at Inference by using Jupyter to look at a source image with our trained model to examine if there any defects (by using our training model). Base64 conversion is demonstrated, and we also look at analyzing Inference results and how the Endpoint URL works. We finish by testing if the outputted image file from our prediction is correct by decoding it from Base64. Lastly, we look at Input Masks, Ground Truths & Predicted Masks.

00:00 - Intro
00:51 - How to use a Deployed Model
03:05 - Analyzing local image files
03:46 - Converting images to base64 in Jupyter
04:57 - Preparing Model for Inference
07:09 - Analyzing Inference result & Endpoint URL
07:50 - Testing output image is encoded into Base64
09:23 - Analyzing Input Masks, Ground Truth & Predicted Mask in Jupyter Notebook

SAP AI in BTP: https://www.sap.com/products/artificial-intelligence.html

Description:
In this video, you will learn how to implement custom cross-application navigation for Fiori applications using the BAdI 'EAM_CROSS_APP_NAV_CONTROL'.

You can use this BAdI to display custom cross-app navigation links in the following SAP Fiori apps:
- Manage Maintenance Notifications and Orders (F4604)
- Find Maintenance Orders (F2175)
- Manage Inspection Checklists (F6607)

The custom cross-app navigation allows you to open selected items in other Fiori apps, including apps that are not part of SAP S/4HANA. Note that it is also possible to create links to WebDynpro or SAP GUI for HTML applications, but you can only open single items in such applications.
Title: Implementing Cross-App Navigation Control for Fiori Applications (“Open In” Capability) in SAP S/4HANA Asset Management

Description: In this video, you will learn how to enable cross-application navigation from a Maintenance Order to the Permit to Work solution in SAP S/4HANA. Permit to Work in Work Clearance Management (WCM) provides a systematic approach in controlling and executing the operational and maintenance activities safely and efficiently in a worksite. The Permit to Work solution helps to manage the risks inherent to hazardous tasks and ensure that the necessary precautions are put in place to improve the safety of personnel, plant, and the environment.
Title: Navigating from Maintenance Order Processing to Permit to Work in SAP S/4HANA Asset Management

LSC_product: SAP S/4HANA,SAP Fiori for SAP S/4HANA
Description:
In this video, you will learn how to set up Teams and Responsibilities in SAP S/4HANA Asset Management.

Using the Manage Teams and Responsibilities app, you can efficiently manage teams or individual team members associated with specific functions. This allows you to easily assign responsibilities, identifying which team member is responsible for performing each function. Teams and team members can also be mapped to specific activity types, such as process steps within a workflow scenario.

As a key user, you can access the Manage Teams and Responsibilities - Asset Management tile to handle teams and responsibilities related to the cost approval of maintenance orders. 

As a maintenance supervisor, you can use the Manage Teams and Responsibilities for Work Centers - Asset Management tile to manage work center teams.
Title: Setting Up Teams and Responsibilities in SAP S/4HANA Asset Management

Description: Batch Definitions determine when an Expense Pay batch closes and is sent to the processing engine. There are two types of batches; cash and credit card. In this training, you will see how to create a cash batch definition for an employee program
Title: Managing Batch Definitions in SAP Concur

Description: The Reimbursement Manager uses the Payment Manager Monitor Batches page to review batch status and payment demand details for all batches. In this video, you will see how to review an audit trail, reschedule a batch, and view funding amounts.
Title: Monitoring Batches in SAP Concur

Description: Report payees can be either employees or company card issuers. The Reimbursement Manager uses the Reports Payees and Cash Advance Payees lists to investigate the payment status of a specific expense report or report payee. In this training course, you will see how to monitor a payee, assign the payee to an open batch, remove a payee from a payment demand, and maintain employee reimbursement accounts.
Title: Monitoring Payees in SAP Concur

Description: In this video series, by Tahir Hussain Babar (Bob) from the SAP HANA Academy and Venkatesh Babu from SAP Concur Cloud Channel Sales, we will show you how to get started with various data integration aspects, by looking at authentication and authorization, when using SAP Concur APIs. Description: In this video series, by Tahir Hussain Babar (Bob) from the SAP HANA Academy and Venkatesh Babu from SAP Concur Cloud Channel Sales, we will show you how to get started with various data integration aspects, by looking at authentication and authorization, when using SAP Concur APIs. In this video, we'll go through the steps needed to create an application in the Administration tab in SAP Concur, which enables you to have the correct authentication needed to access SAP Concur APIs. We'll go over Production Sandbox Environments, Authentication Administration and how to create an "application" to give you authentication / authorization to begin using SAP Concur APIs.

Description: In this video series, by Tahir Hussain Babar (Bob) from the SAP HANA Academy and Venkatesh Babu from SAP Concur Cloud Channel Sales, we will show you how to get started with various data integration aspects, by looking at authentication and authorization, when using SAP Concur APIs. In this video, we'll go through a simple example of demonstrating that our authentication and authorization works by creating a user in SAP Concur using APIs (using a POST in Postman) and then retrieving that user's details (using a GET).
Title: Creating a User in SAP Concur Using APIs

Description: In this video series, by Tahir Hussain Babar (Bob) from the SAP HANA Academy and Venkatesh Babu from SAP Concur Cloud Channel Sales, we will show you how to get started with various data integration aspects, by looking at authentication and authorization, when using SAP Concur APIs. This video shows you how to create a SmartEdit extension for SAP Commerce Cloud and how to build the extension using Grunt. 

These are the environment variables you need to follow along:
  • NPM_ANCILLARY=$HYBRIS_BIN_DIR/modules/npm-ancillary/npmancillary
  • NODE_HOME=$NPM_ANCILLARY/resources/npm/node/node-v10.7.0-darwin-x64
  • GRUNT_HOME=$NPM_ANCILLARY/resources/npm/node_modules
  • export PATH=$NODE_HOME/bin:$GRUNT_HOME/.bin:$PATH

Description:
In this video, learn all about Profile Management (IDS). Profile Management is a cloud-hosted database that consolidates user data acquired from various sources – e.g., social and traditional registration, site activity, multiple domains, or mobile apps. It enables full control over your user database, allowing you to easily search, view, edit, update, delete, target, and export user segments. You can access the users' data using Web tools as well as API methods. 

Customer Data Cloud maintains database performance and security and offers an automated way to stay in compliance with social networks so you can be confident that your data will always be accessible, safe, and updated to meet social network policies.
Title: Exploring Profile Management in SAP Customer Data

Description: Learn how to set up bid transformation events in SAP Ariba Sourcing to compare vendor costs effectively.  Understand bid-to-beat adjustments, hidden components, and event creation steps. Enhance your sourcing strategy today.
Title: Using Bid Transformation in SAP Ariba Guided Sourcing Events

Description: Find out how to add events within full sourcing projects using guided sourcing in SAP Ariba. See how to use a document choice placeholder to draft an event, or how to add a new event to the full project, manually.
Title: Drafting Events within SAP Ariba Guided Sourcing Full Projects

Description: Find out how to set up project teams and groups within guided sourcing full projects in SAP Ariba. See how project owners can edit the existing team member assignments, and how new project groups can be created. See how project groups can assist with responsibilities through their tasks and role assignments.
Title: Managing Project Teams and Groups in SAP Ariba Guided Sourcing

Description: See which task types are available within SAP Ariba full projects in guided sourcing.  Find out how tasks can be executed and completed by their task owners.  All task types that a project owner can create within a full project will be covered in this video including To Do, Approval, Review, Notification, and how documents can be associated.
Title: Reviewing Task Types in SAP Ariba Guided Sourcing Full Projects

Description: Learn how to set competitive terms in SAP Ariba Guided Sourcing Events to enhance response ranking and decision-making. See how to configure competitive terms to optimize item competitiveness.
Title: Setting Competitive Terms in Guided Sourcing Events in SAP Ariba

Description: Find out how to create new terms within guided sourcing event line items in SAP Ariba. See how terms can be factored into cost calculations, and what standard terms are available by default. Watch for a demonstration on how to create a new term.
Title: Creating New Terms in Guided Sourcing Events in SAP Ariba

Description: Learn how cost components are added to total cost events in SAP Ariba Guided Sourcing. Understand the impact of terms like adders, multipliers, and discounts on supplier bids and total cost calculations.
Title: Adding Cost Components to Total Cost Events in SAP Ariba Guided Sourcing

Description: See how team graders can have weights assigned to them to change the overall impact of their scores.  See how event owners can add team graders to evaluate supplier responses, and how to change their weight to decrease or increase the overall worth of their feedback.
Title: Assigning Weights to Team Graders in Guided Sourcing Events in SAP Ariba

LSC_product: SAP Ariba Supplier Lifecycle and Performance,SAP Ariba Supplier Risk
Description: Discover how to manage and navigate supplier certificates within the Certificates area of supplier profiles. Learn to search, filter, and sort certificates, and view detailed information.
Title: Navigating the Certificates Area in Supplier Profiles in SAP Ariba Supplier Management

LSC_product: SAP Ariba Supplier Lifecycle and Performance,SAP Ariba Supplier Risk
Description: Discover the essentials of the Questionnaires area in supplier profiles. Learn to manage and interact with modular questionnaires using the Questionnaire and Task tabs. Explore how to view project details, submit forms, request updates, and complete tasks. Enhance your efficiency by utilizing search and filter functions.
Title: Navigating the Questionnaires Area in Supplier Profiles in SAP Ariba Supplier Management

Description: This video explores creating event content, including sections, requirements, and questions. Learn how to organize different read-only text and questions with various response types to solicit information from suppliers.
Title: Creating Event Content within Guided Sourcing Events in SAP Ariba

Description: Learn how to translate guided sourcing event content in SAP Ariba.  See how users that belong to the translator group can translate one field into all languages or translate all fields into a single language.
Title: Translating Guided Sourcing Event Content in SAP Ariba

Description: Learn how full sourcing projects are created in guided sourcing and navigate its components. Find out who can create full projects in the system, when full projects are more suitable than one-time events, and the required actions to draft a full project.
Title: Introducing Full Projects in Guided Sourcing in SAP Ariba

Description: Find out how to apply access control in SAP Ariba Sourcing.  See how access control settings can be used to restrict viewership, and which access control values are most helpful.
Title: Working with Access Control in SAP Ariba

Description: Find out how to set up pre-grading within guided sourcing events. See how to set pre-grades, including assigning weights, target grades, and values for response options to automate team grading evaluation.
Title: Setting Up Pre-grading in Guided Sourcing Events in SAP Ariba

Description: Find out how the Monitoring Page can help project owners monitor bids in guided sourcing events.  See how to navigate the Monitor Page, and how to view the data and filters within the Items that Need Quotes and the Questions, Requirements and Attachments panels.
Title: Navigating the Monitoring Page for Guided Sourcing Events in SAP Ariba

Description: Find out how which users have the ability to perform surrogate bidding in the system and how to perform the steps in guided sourcing events.  Watch how bids can be entered on behalf of participants and what support event owners have with their live events.
Title: Performing Surrogate Bidding in Guided Sourcing Events in SAP Ariba

Description: This video provides a demonstration on how to resend supplier invitation emails to participants that may not be able to locate the invite containing the link to the event.
Title: Resending Supplier Invitations in Guided Sourcing Events in SAP Ariba

Description: Find out how to unlock and lock participants from accessing guided sourcing events within SAP Ariba.
Title: Locking and Unlocking Participants from Guided Sourcing Events in SAP Ariba

Description: Learn how to add participants to an event within SAP Ariba Guided Sourcing. Discover how to invite suppliers to events by using the guided sourcing Supplier panel and its search filters.
Title: Adding Participants to Guided Sourcing Events in SAP Ariba

Description: Learn how to create and manage Requests for Information (RFIs) in SAP Ariba Guided Sourcing. Discover the steps involved in setting up RFIs and explore the various sections and features of the platform.
Title: Creating Requests for Information (RFI) in Guided Sourcing in SAP Ariba

Description: This video explores the various functionalities that impact access rights used in SAP Sales Cloud. You'll learn about Access Forwarding, Delegates, and Report Assignments to Business Roles functionalities.
Title: Understanding Access Management and Additional Functionalities in SAP Sales Cloud Part 1

Description: This video describes how an administrator can customize the look and feel of the user interface.
Title: Understanding Customer User Interface using Key User Adaptation in SAP Service Cloud Version 2

Description: See how SAP Sales Cloud empowers organizations to improve forecast accuracy, proactively identify at risk opportunities, and drive sales with intelligent recommendations.
Title: Exploring the Intelligent Solution in SAP Sales Cloud

Description: This video explores the various functionalities that impact access rights used in SAP Sales Cloud. You'll learn about Layouts, Queries and Field Rules functionalities that impact access rights.
Title: Understanding Access Management and Additional Functionalities in SAP Sales Cloud Part 2

Description:
In this video, you will learn how to use the account duplicate check feature in SAP Sales Cloud.

Please do not hesitate to contact us at cx-enablement@sap.com if you have any questions or want to send us your feedback.
Title: Using Account Duplicate Check in SAP Sales Cloud

Description: This video provides a comprehensive overview of the Workflow feature in SmartEdit. It details the process of orchestrating tasks related to content preparation.
Title: Working with Workflows in SmartEdit in SAP Commerce Cloud

Description: This video provides an overview of the main functionalities of the Backoffice Administration Cockpit.
Title: Managing System Data in Backoffice Administration Cockpit in SAP Commerce Cloud

Description: In this video, you will learn about content versioning in SmartEdit. The topics include creating, previewing, rolling back, editing and deleting a page version. It also covers some information about the garbage collection of page versions.
Title: Content Versioning in SmartEdit in SAP Commerce Cloud

Description: This video will explore the details of a promotion rule in Backoffice Administration Cockpit. You 'll see, how a rule can be created out of a promotion template; how to set up Conditions and actions of a rule; and how to customize the displayed message on the storefront and other things.
Title: Examining a Promotion Rule in Backoffice Administration Cockpit in SAP Commerce Cloud

Description: In this video you'll learn how to exclude a facet from your storefront using the Adaptive Search perspective in SAP Commerce Cloud.
Title: Excluding a Facet in Adaptive Search in SAP Commerce Cloud

Description: This video shows you how an administrator can define rules to dynamically assign products or product lists to a survey.
Title: Defining Product Determination Rules for Surveys in SAP Sales Cloud

Description: This video helps you learn about Order Details overview. Covering details like, the list of Order IDs which organizations have signed during the contract, key terms which are used in this view, system eligibility and license details.
Title: Exploring the Admin View of System Order Details in SAP Service Cloud Version 2

Description: In this video, you'll take a deep dive into the concept and usage of business roles and gain an understanding of applying in various settings.
Title: Deep Diving into Assignment of Business Roles in SAP Sales Cloud

Description: In this video, explore how the pipeline manager helps to see the health of the opportunity pipeline, use filters, learn about the bubble chart and its significance, see opportunity scores look at the monthly pipeline using a bar chart, see the territory roll up chart and more.
Title: Exploring the Pipeline Manager in SAP Sales Cloud Version 2

Description: You can upload documents from your client device directly into a folder using drag and drop.
Title: Uploading Documents into Folders with Drag and Drop in SAP Sales Cloud

Description: Validations help you, as an administrator, to implement a custom logic where you can prevent a save or issue a warning message to users during save based on certain conditions.
Title: Setting up Determinations in SAP Service Cloud Version 2

Description: This video shows you how to create extension fields in the SAP Sales Cloud solution UI. Targeted at administrators, this video shows a step by step process of adding a new field and the resulting screen that appears for end-users of the solution.
Title: Creating Extension Fields in the Fiori Client in SAP Sales Cloud

Description:
In this video, you will learn how to create an activity plan that adds an upsell task to an opportunity when a particular set of conditions in the associated routing rule are fulfilled.

Please do not hesitate to contact us at cx-enablement@sap.com if you have any questions or want to send us your feedback.
Title: Upselling an Opportunity using Activity Planning in SAP Sales Cloud

Description: Extension fields provide the means to store additional data for specific use cases beyond what is natively present in the solution. You can create these fields for a screen that has been enabled for extension.
Title: Creating Extension Fields in SAP Service Cloud Version 2

Description: In this video, you will see how an Administrator can create a Business user.
Title: Creating a Business User in SAP Service Cloud Version 2

Description: This video shows you how administrators can set up Survey branching to dynamically change the survey based on what answers are given by the end user.
Title: Skipping Survey Questions using Survey Branching in SAP Sales Cloud

Description: This video explains the concept of Access Context in SAP Sales Cloud and how it relates to Business Objects and Custom Business Objects.
Title: Understanding Access Context in SAP Sales Cloud

Description: This video talks about Data Disclosure. As an administrator responsible for data protection regulation compliance, you can disclose personal data of employees, individual customers, and contacts. You can display a summary of all data associated with these business partners.
Title: Implementing Data Disclosure in Service Cloud Version 2

Description: In this video you will learn about Output Management. Output Management comprises all activities related to the output of documents. Form-based documents can be output on an ad hoc basis or as an integrated part of a business process.
Title: Understanding Output Management in SAP Service Cloud Version 2

Description: The pipeline flow shows you a graphical representation of how opportunities have performed in a fiscal period. You can investigate pipeline changes with a few clicks and without lengthy reports
Title: Exploring Pipeline Flow in SAP Sales Cloud Version 2

Description: This video provides a thorough overview of the Assisted Service Mode (ASM). It explains how this Backoffice-agnostic overlay allows you to assist customers in real time, thereby enhancing their User Experience on your online shop!
Title: Improving the User Experience with the ASM in SAP Commerce Cloud

Description: This video gives you an overview of product modeling in SAP Commerce Cloud. We will look at the two product modeling systems in SAP Commerce Cloud: Typing and Classification and how they are best utilized.
Title: Product Modeling in SAP Commerce Cloud

Description: This video will give you a brief overview of Promotion Engine in Backoffice. We will take a look at Promotion templates, Promotion rules, Promotion planning, Promotion versions among other things.
Title: Working with Promotion Engine in Backoffice in SAP Commerce Cloud

Description: This video demonstrates a typical replenishment and order scheduling process in the B2B storefront.
Title: Replenishing and Scheduling Orders in SAP Commerce Cloud

Description:
In this video, you will learn how to create a promotion rule based on a promotion template in SAP Commerce Cloud. 

We will walk you through the process in the Backoffice.
Title: Creating a Promotion Rule Based on a Template in SAP Commerce Cloud

Description: This video shows how to boost a single item using the Adaptive Search Perspective.
Title: Boosting a Single Item in SAP Commerce Cloud

Description: In this video, we'll discuss the mechanics involved in merging search profiles. Subsequently, we will demonstrate the implementation of this process within the Adaptive Search Perspective of the SAP Commerce Cloud Backoffice.
Title: Merging Search Profiles in SAP Commerce Cloud

Description: This video demonstrates how to place an order on behalf of a customer using the Assisted Service Module.
Title: Placing an Order for a Calling Customer in SAP Commerce Cloud

Description: In this microlearning, you will learn about the fundamentals of work center groups by explaining the concept, master data, key features, and usage of work center groups.
Title: Introducing Work Center Groups - SAP S/4HANA Cloud for Manufacturing

Description:
This microlearning for SAP S/4HANA Cloud, public edition focuses on creating and managing work center groups for manufacturing. In this demo, we will explore the master data segment using the app Manage Work Center Groups and learn how to create and assign work centers to groups, navigate the details page, and unassign or delete work center groups.

This microlearning is presented by Subhashree Sahoo, a manufacturing consultant for SAP S/4HANA Cloud.
Title: How to Create and Manage Work Center Groups - SAP S/4HANA Cloud for Manufacturing

Description:
This microlearning on SAP S/4HANA Cloud, public edition focuses on how to leverage work center groups to plan production.

The demo flow and system demo will take you through the process of demand creation until capacity planning, using various apps such as Maintain PIRs, Schedule MRP runs, Manage Work Center Capacity, Capacity Scheduling Table, and Capacity Scheduling Board.
By the end of this microlearning, you will have learned how to use work center groups to manage capacity overload and schedule manufacturing orders.
Title: How to Leverage Work Center Groups - SAP S/4HANA Cloud for Manufacturing

LSC_product: SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition,SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition
Description: In this video you will learn how to create Model Product Specifications (MPS) in SAP S/4HANA. MPS are used to group items that are frequently ordered together to complete a particular task. You can then use (parts of) model product specifications as templates to create purchasing documents, such as purchase contracts.
Title: Service Procurement - using Lean Services - Model Product Specifications

LSC_product: SAP S/4HANA,SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition
Description: In this microlearning we will focus on Buffer Level Management for Demand Driven MRP.
Title: Demand Driven Buffer Level Management - SAP S/4HANA Cloud Manufacturing

LSC_product: SAP S/4HANA,SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition
Description: In this microlearning, we define what MRP is and how the MRP process flows. We will use PIR in a system demo, schedule MRP runs, and look at MRP master data issues and key figures.
Title: Demand Management and MRP - SAP S/4HANA Manufacturing

LSC_product: SAP S/4HANA,SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition
Description: In this microlearning, you'll find out how to implement the prerequisites for material exceptions and will learn to understand MRP situations.
Title: MRP Situations - SAP S/4HANA Manufacturing

LSC_product: SAP S/4HANA,SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition
Description:
In this microlearning, we cover the following topics: 
  • How to perform MRP rescheduling checks
  • How to create and manage MRP change requests 
  • How to evaluate change results
Title: MRP Change Management - SAP S/4HANA Manufacturing

LSC_product: SAP S/4HANA,SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition
Description:
This microlearning covers the following: 
  • How to maintain MRP safety stock method and material
  • How to maintain time-dependent safety stock
  • How to maintain time-dependent days of supply
Title: MRP Time-dependent Safety Stock Levels - SAP S/4HANA Manufacturing

Description: This video provides an overview of the capabilities and functionalities of the Order Management module within SAP Commerce Cloud, covering its key features and how it supports various standard business processes. It aims to educate viewers about the benefits and potential uses of this module for managing and optimizing their order processes.
Title: Introducing the Features and Business Processes of the Order Management Module in SAP Commerce Cloud

Description: You use the Expense Proxy Log-on feature to act as a proxy for another user to perform tasks for either centralized data entry or Helpdesk support.
Title: Using the Expense Proxy Log on Feature in SAP Concur

Description:
In this video, you will learn how to integrate the Backoffice Framework with third-party data layers by implementing Cockpit Data Integration abstraction layer.

For more information, visit Cockpit Data Integration Layer of the Backoffice Framework documentation.
Title: Integrating Data in Backoffice Framework in SAP Commerce Cloud

Description: In addition to some of the core features we looked at earlier, the Backoffice Framework provides you with a number of more advanced capabilities. These features allow for additional reusability, modularity, and dynamic configurability in your application. In this video, you will learn about some of the advanced widget features in the Backoffice framework, namely stubs, template widgets, virtual sockets, and role-based permissions.
Title: Working with Advanced Widget Features in Backoffice Framework in SAP Commerce Cloud

Description: In this video, you will be introduced to widget essentials, and learn what a widget is from a technical point of view.
Title: Introducing Widget Essentials in Backoffice Framework in SAP Commerce Cloud

Description:
In this video, you will learn about the following configuration files in Backoffice Framework in SAP Commerce Cloud:
  • Widgets.xml
  • Overriding widgets.xml
  • Cockpit-config.xml
  • Overriding cockpit-config.xml
Title: Working with Configuration Files in Backoffice Framework in SAP Commerce Cloud

Description: Account management capabilities offer a holistic view of the customer and allow you to capture, monitor, store, and track all critical business information about customers, prospects, and partners. In this video, you learn how to work with account management capabilities.
Title: Working with Account Management Capabilities in SAP Sales Cloud

Description: In this video, you'll learn about what OpenID Connect is and how it is used with SAP Customer Data Cloud.  You’ll first see how to configure Customer Data Cloud as an OpenID Connect Provider and then the end to end authentication flow.
Title: Implementing OIDC in SAP Customer Data Cloud

Description:
In this video, you will be introduced to widget folder structures. You will learn about 
  • the physical structure of a widget
  • definition.xml file, its setting options, and restrictions
  • two ways of declaring the visual elements of a widget
Title: Defining the Widget Structure in Backoffice Framework in SAP Commerce Cloud

Description:
In this video, you will learn about how to make runtime changes within Backoffice Framework.

To learn more about the configuration requirements and options for a specific widget,  you can visit that widget's wiki page under Available Widgets.
Title: Making Runtime Configuration Changes in Backoffice Framework in SAP Commerce Cloud

Description: In this video, you will learn about widget authority-based restrictions with an application orchestrator.
Title: Working with Authority-Based Restrictions in Backoffice Framework in SAP Commerce Cloud

Description: This video provides an overview of the SAP Commerce Integration Extension Pack. It defines the extension pack, discusses the compatibility chart, and discusses how it integrates with other applications.
Title: Introducing SAP Commerce Integration Extension Pack in SAP Commerce Cloud

Description: This video will guide you through the various view layer options for widgets and illustrate how to alter your widget's functionality by modifying the widget controller within the Backoffice Framework.
Title: Working with Widget Controllers in Backoffice Framework in SAP Commerce Cloud

Description: This demo explains the concept of actions in the Backoffice Framework and how you can utilize them in your application.
Title: Working with Backoffice Framework Actions in SAP Commerce Cloud

Description: This demo shows how to create an Eclipse workspace in order to develop in Backoffice Framework.
Title: Creating a Workspace in Eclipse in SAP Commerce Cloud

Description: You use Corporate Discounts to manage a variety of travel discounts for the global distribution system (GDS) and TripLInk vendors.
Title: Managing Corporate Discounts in SAP Concur

Description: During this video you will see how to use the Email Reminders feature to create emails that users receive to remind them to take certain actions on expense reports.
Title: Configuring Email Reminders in SAP Concur

Description: You use the Expense Processor role to perform a final review of expense reports once all the appropriate managers have approved them.
Title: Using Expense Processor to Review and Approve Expense Reports in SAP Concur

Description: In this video you will learn how to create your own corporate, customized form templates with SAP S/4HANA Cloud.
Title: Customization of Content Form Templates - SAP S/4HANA Finance

Description: In this video you will learn how to customize your own corporate master form template with SAP S/4HANA Cloud.
Title: Customization of Master Form Templates - SAP S/4HANA Finance

Description: In this video you will learn how to create new general ledger accounts by copying them from an existing general ledger account.
Title: Mass Creation of General Ledger Accounts - SAP S/4HANA Finance

Description: This video demonstrates how to set up and execute the workflow for payment approvals in SAP S/4HANA Cloud.
Title: Workflow for Payment Approval - SAP S/4HANA Cloud

Description: This Learning Journey is designed to guide you though the beginner workshop for Enterprise Architects. It helps you build fundamental skills in managing application landscapes and learn how to effectively scope, plan, and execute an application rationalization process using SAP LeanIX.
Title: Mastering the Application Rationalization with SAP LeanIX
Learning_objectives:
Upon completing this learning journey, you will be able to:

  • Understand key concepts of application landscape management.
  • Gain practical experience in running a rationalization assessment.
  • Learn how to optimize your IT portfolio with SAP LeanIX best practices.

Description: In this course you will learn about SAP Sales Cloud version 2 from a business user’s perspective. Learn how the solution is used by a sales representative as well as a sales manager in their daily tasks.
Title: Exploring SAP Sales Cloud Version 2
Learning_objectives:
• Introducing the solution and learning the basics of navigating it
  • Understanding features like guided selling, task management, visit management and more from a Sales Representative's perspective
  • Understanding features like KPI evaluation, forecasting, pipeline management and more from a Sales Managers perspective
  • Exploring Machine learning and Gen AI features like CX AI Toolkit.
  • Understanding features of MS teams integration and relationship Intelligence features
  • Exploring the features of the Mobile Application

Title: Planning with Advanced Planning Methods in ePPDS

Description: Build a strong foundation in SAP's strategy, portfolio, processes, and ecosystem.
Title: Discovering SAP
Learning_objectives:
• Describe SAP's corporate strategy for 2025, the buying center framework for SAP Business Suite, key industries, core business processes, and the broader SAP partner framework
  • Outline key SAP solution capabilities through innovative showcases

Description: This learning journey teaches administrators how to set up and configure the SAP BTP, set up services and environments, manage users and authorizations, understand the observability strategy, and review the cost and consumption of your BTP accounts.
Title: Administrating SAP Business Technology Platform
Learning_objectives: After completing this learning journey, you will understand how to set up and configure the SAP BTP, set up services and environments, manage users and authorizations, understand the observability strategy, and review the cost and consumption of BTP accounts.

Title: Additional Financial Accounting Configuration in SAP S/4HANA

Description: In Part Five of this series, see which steps are needed on BTP and S/4 HANA to technically connect the app with your backend system.
Title: Technical Setup in S/4 HANA and BTP - SAP Broker Reconciliation for Commodity Derivatives

Description: Learn how SAP Sales Cloud can accelerate sales growth with intelligent and productivity features. This video shows the business benefits and features of the SAP Sales Cloud solution.
Title: Introduction to SAP Sales Cloud

Description: This video demonstrates how to create three types of filters in embedded analytics for SAP SuccessFactors Incentive Management:  A Story Filter, a Page Filter and a Filter for specific visualizations.
Title: Filtering a Story in Embedded Analytics for SAP SuccessFactors Incentive Management

Description: In this video, you will learn how to implement Risk-Based Authentication, or RBA, Global Rules and Account Rule-Sets in the SAP Customer Data Cloud Console.
Title: Configuring Risk-Based Authentication in SAP Customer Data Cloud

Description: Explore the Qualifications area in supplier profiles. Learn to manage and view supplier qualifications, distinguish between legacy and process qualifications, and perform actions based on your role. Understand how to navigate tabs, filter and search the summary list, and interact with qualification processes and questionnaires.
Title: Navigating the Qualifications Area in Supplier Profiles in SAP Ariba Supplier Management

LSC_product: SAP Ariba Supplier Lifecycle and Performance
Description: Master the process of completing internal forms in modular questionnaire projects. Learn three different methods to access forms, either from the Questionnaires detail area or through associated tasks. Explore how to navigate, edit, and submit forms.
Title: Filling Out Internal Forms in Modular Questionnaire Projects in SAP Ariba Supplier Management

Description: This video describes step two in the onboarding for Search Service. See how to connect Search Service to your SAP Commerce Cloud environment.
Title: Connecting SAP Commerce Cloud to the New Search Service

Description: The Expense Payment Engine (EPE) generates payments to company card issuers, based on the payment batches in Payment Manager. The Reimbursement Manager uses the Payment Manager Card Programs page to enter the data required to correctly remit payment to the card issuer. In this training you you will see how to add a new card program using Expense Pay.
Title: Managing Card Programs in SAP Concur

Description: This video is a part of the series of videos which covers the SAML topic in detail. It covers how to debug a SAML connection and various tools you can use.
Title: Debugging a SAML Connection in SAP Customer Data Cloud

Description:
Testing SP Initiated SSO video is a part of the series of videos which covers the SAML topic in detail. This video covers how to test the SP Initiated SSO.

Watch the following video to know about SAML and IDP Configuration: 
Introduction to SAML and IdP Configuration - SAP Customer Data Cloud
Title: SAML: Testing SP Initiated SSO in SAP Customer Data Cloud

Description:
This video is a part of the series of videos which covers the SAML topic in detail. This video covers common missteps while setting up SAML in CDC.

Watch the following video to know about SAML and IDP Configuration.
Introduction to SAML and IdP Configuration - SAP Customer Data Cloud
Title: SAML: Identifying Common Missteps in SAP Customer Data Cloud

Description:
This video will teach you how to use the new Data File Load App to upload data such as contact information and marketing permissions to the SAP Marketing Cloud.

NOTE: Your SAP Marketing Cloud interface might look slightly different, but the overall process stays the same.
Title: Uploading Data Using Data File Load App in SAP Marketing Cloud

Description: In this video, you'll learn how to create, train, and publish Predictive Models in Predictive Studio in SAP Marketing Cloud. Predictive models use algorithms and historical data to calculate scores that give you insights about your customers' future behavior.
Title: Creating Predictive Scores and Models in Predictive Studio in SAP Marketing Cloud

Description: In this video, you will discover the role of value resolvers in SAP Commerce Cloud and learn how to develop a custom value resolver.
Title: Understanding Value Resolvers in SAP Commerce Cloud

Description: This video gives you an overview of import and export features in SAP Commerce Cloud.
Title: Introducing ImpEx in SAP Commerce Cloud

Description:
Dynatrace offers a mobile app which enables you to continuously monitor your SAP Commerce environments. In this video, you'll learn how to connect your Dynatrace subscription to a mobile app and how to use it.

Link: 
Dynatrace

If you're looking for further information on this topic, check out the:
  1. SAP Help article: Pushing Alert Notifications to your Mobile
  2. Official Dynatrace Documentation: Push notifications via the Dynatrace mobile app
  3. Dynatrace University: Webinars

Description: A foundational learning curriculum for aspiring and new SAP Enterprise Architects
Title: Discovering SAP Enterprise Architecture
Learning_objectives:
By the end of this Learning Journey, you will be able to:

  • Articulate the strategic role and mindset of an SAP Enterprise Architect.
  • Define foundational concepts of enterprise architecture within the SAP context.
  • Explain SAP’s Enterprise Architecture methodology and how it aligns with industry standards such as TOGAF.
  • Identify key SAP tools such as LeanIX, Signavio, Cloud ALM, WalkMe, and Tricentis and describe their primary functions.
  • Explain the lifecycle and relevance of business processes.

Description:
This Learning Journey provides an in-depth understanding of SAP Service and Asset Manager.

The SAP Service and Asset Manager mobile app provides access to all services and information that maintenance and field technicians need to efficiently and safely do their job, no matter where they are, using smartphones or tablets - even when they're offline.
Title: Implementing SAP Service and Asset Manager
Learning_objectives:
After completing this intermediate level learning journey, Implementation Consultants will obtain product knowledge and they will be able to understand the application architecture.

Also they will be prepared to install, setup OOB Service and Asset Manager and connect from client end-to end.

In addition they will learn how to setup backend Standard Configuration, Metadata Deployment and Basic and Advanced Extensions.

They will understand and know about how to utilize the support options available as well.

SAP Service Cloud Version 2 provides an integrated, cloud-based communication stack allowing multisession communication with customers in real time.

Description: This video provides an overview on supplier evaluation in SAP S/4HANA. In the standard procurement process, the Purchase Order is being created, then the supplier ships the goods and the goods receipt is initiated. Here we are already tracking time and quantity of the order against the actual delivery. Then, the quality of the goods is being inspected and last but not least, the invoice amount is compared to the Purchase Order amount. All those measures influence the supplier's evaluation score. In addition, SAP offers customers the possibility to define and apply user-specific evaluation criteria to improve their supply base. You will learn how to apply weighting factors and manage the scores next to analyzing evaluation scores using analytical applications.
Title: Evaluating suppliers with SAP S/4HANA

Description:
In this video you will see what are Applications in SAP Customer Data Cloud and how to create and manage applications.

Application Keys are credentials given to third-party applications to enable them to access the Customer Data Cloud platform and make system calls. An application key is, in fact, a special type of user key, which is not associated with a specific user. When you add a new application, you create a user key without requiring a user registration flow. Application keys have higher rate limits than standard user keys, but their actions are not audited. Most API requests to CDC should be made securely, using an authentication mechanism. The recommended method is to use a bearer token. The other option is to use an application key and secret. 

Signing Requests to SAP Customer Data Cloud:
https://developers.gigya.com/display/GD/Signing+Requests+to+SAP+Customer+Data+Cloud
Title: Creating and Managing Applications in SAP Customer Data Cloud

Description:
At SAP Customer Data Cloud, we recognize the importance of customer privacy and complying with the social networks' platform policies. SAP Customer Data Cloud includes built-in automatic support for staying in compliance with the terms of social networks. As social networks frequently change and update their policies, SAP Customer Data Cloud will automatically ensure your site or application’s compliance is up to date, saving you time and keeping your customer’s profiles up-to-date and full of social information.

Always be in compliance with:
  • COPPA
  • WCAG
  • Identity Compliance with Facebook
In complying with Data Localization laws, such as the Russian Federation’s Personal Data Protection Act or China’s Cybersecurity law, requires physically localizing data in relevant jurisdictions. We have data centers in the US, EU, AU, and Russia. To comply with Russia’s Personal Data Protection Act, we made the investment and commitment to own and operate our Russian data center because AWS is not available in the region.
Title: Exploring Global Data Residency in SAP Customer Data Cloud

In this video we'll explore the different methods of implementing SAP Customer Identity and the benefits of each of these methods. There are three main ways of implementing SAP Customer Identity. 
  • The first is Screen-Sets using the drag and drop UI builder in the console.
  • Second is Markup Extensions where you can do full customization for frontend designs and backend user registration flows. 
  • Third, is using the Accounts API. You’ll get full customization of frontend design and backend user registration flows. This is also the best route if you want to implement native mobile and desktop applications. 
You can view the documentation on the SAP Help Portal for more details: 
Screen-Sets | SAP Help Portal

Description: Rates 2.0 is a newly formed rate structure within SAP Fieldglass that reduces the overall complexity of rate management while maintaining the comprehensiveness and functional capabilities of the historical Rates 1.0 feature. Description:
The learning journey "Configuring Cross-Application Processes in SAP S/4HANA Sales and Procurement" will introduce you to the features and functionality provided for selected cross-application business processes in SAP S/4HANA Sales and Procurement.  You will also learn about the associated configuration settings for the selected cross-application business processes. The processes discussed are:

  • Third-Party Order Processing
  • Intercompany Sales Processing
  • Intra- and Cross-Company Stock Transfers
  • Subcontracting
  • Returns Processing
Title: Configuring Cross-Application Processes in SAP S/4HANA Sales and Procurement
Learning_objectives:
At the end of this learning journey, participants will be able to:

 

- Execute and configure third-party order processing in SAP S/4HANA

- Execute and configure intercompany sales processing in SAP S/4HANA

- Execute and configure intra- and cross-company stock transfers in SAP S/4HANA

- Execute and configure subcontracting in SAP S/4HANA

- Execute and configure returns processing in SAP S/4HANA

LSC_product: SAP Customer Data Platform,SAP Business Data Cloud
LSC_product_category: CRM and Customer Experience,Business Technology Platform
Description: Upon completion of this course, you will be able to successfully create and manage administrative credentials for accessing the SAP Customer Data Platform API, construct code to utilize the Query and Ingestion APIs, perform Event Metadata configuration, set up an Event Listener, and program and configure Events to enrich Customer Data.
Title: Developing with SAP Customer Data Platform
Learning_objectives:
In this course you will be able to:

  • Create and manage administrative credentials required for accessing the SAP Customer Data Platform (CDP) API
  • Construct code on how to utilize the Query API to effectively search and retrieve customer data
  • Develop code on how to use the Ingestion API to add and update customer data within the CDP
  • Perform Event Metadata configuration using the deduplication ID and partitioning event data with the timestamp field
  • Set up an Event Listener to Ingest Customer Data
  • Program and configure an Event to enrich Customer Data using Extensions

Description:
In this course you will gain a solid understanding of the SAP Supply Chain Control Tower business processes and supporting functionality. The self-paced e-learning training is supplemented with hands-on exercises using the most recently released version of the SAP IBP cloud solution.  
DO NOT attempt to take this course without first completing the recommended courses for SAP IBP for Supply Chain Overview (IBP1010, IBP1020, IBP2200, IBP2400, IBP2500, IBP2600, IBP2700 & IBP2800).  
If you attempt to take IBP3510 without first completing the mandatory prerequisite courses, you will not achieve the maximum benefits, and some concepts may be difficult to comprehend. ​
Learning_objectives:
This course will prepare you to: 

  • ​Describe the standard planning areas in SAP IBP 
  • ​Introduce analytic stories, dashboards, and custom alerts functionality 
  • ​Explain the concept of Procedure Playbooks
  • ​Explain the concept and usage of Cases 
  • ​Explain Intelligent Visibility and Intelligent Visibility Profiles 
  • ​Setup navigation to other systems 
  • ​Explain navigation/integration of SAP Supply Chain Control Tower with, for example, SAP Ariba and Logistics Business Network and integration with geographical content
Title: Mastering the main features and function in SAP Supply Chain Control Tower

LSC_product: SAP Customer Data Cloud,SAP BTP, private cloud edition
LSC_product_category: CRM and Customer Experience,Business Technology Platform
Description: By the end of this course, you will have learned how to use the CIAM’s B2B Organization Management feature to manage organizations, delegate administration tasks, and configure policy-based access control. After activating B2B Organization Management in the CIAM, you will use it to manage member attributes, configure organization approval workflows, manage member profiles, and control what they can do in the UI. You will also know how to onboard organizations using the registration request Web UI, delegate organization administration, and integrate SAP Content Data Cloud’s B2B capabilities with an external website.
Title: From Onboarding to Governance: Mastering SAP Customer Data Cloud for B2B
Learning_objectives:
• Describe the foundations and purpose of the B2B module available in the Customer Identity and Access Management (CIAM) of SAP Customer Data Cloud.
  • Identify key configuration workspaces in the console.
  • Adapt the organization and member's schema to your company’s structure.
  • Allow organization self-registration with an Organization Approval Workflow.
  • Describe the onboarding process for a new organization.
  • Manage member data and use the console to invite members and assign roles.
  • Help SAP Customer Data Cloud talk to an External ID Provider.
  • Configure policy building blocks and asset types.
  • Create a tailored access policy based on organization types, personas, and required access restrictions.
  • Describe use cases for Organizational Policies and automated assignment.
  • Verify credentials from an external website.
  • Embed organization registration screen using SDK.

LSC_product: SAP Customer Data Platform,SAP Business Data Cloud
LSC_product_category: CRM and Customer Experience,Business Technology Platform
Description: By the end of this course, learners will proficiently perform a variety of administrative tasks within the SAP Customer Data Platform Console, including managing console users, dividing business units, defining data retention rules, and utilizing the export/import package functionalities. They will also effectively leverage monitoring capabilities to ensure seamless ingestion and activation of customer data.
Title: Administrating SAP Customer Data Platform
Learning_objectives:
• Identify various common administrative tasks on the SAP Customer Data Platform using the Console.
  • Proficiently manage console users in the SAP Customer Data Platform Console, including adding new users, editing user permissions, and removing user access.
  • Configure and manage multiple business areas in the SAP Customer Data Platform to streamline data administration
  • Establish and implement data retention rules aligned with organizational policies and regulatory requirements to ensure proper data lifecycle management within the SAP Customer Data Platform.
  • Effectively utilize the Ingestion Monitoring Dashboard to track and analyze data ingestion processes.
  • Use the Activation Monitoring Dashboard to monitor and evaluate the customer data activation processes.
  • Export and import configuration packages within the Customer Data Platform for easier migration, backup, and replication of settings and rules.

For more details, you can checkout the following public links:
  • ​Checkout the related content on SAP Learning at https://learning.sap.com 
  • Checkout SAP Fiori help documentation at https://help.sap.com/docs/SAP_FIORI_OVERVIEW

Description: This practical exercise introduces you to the power of agentic AI through SAP Joule Agents – smart, context-aware applications that automate tasks, support decision-making, and collaborate with users across the enterprise. You’ll explore five example agents tailored to key business functions (Finance, Procurement, Supply Chain, Human Resources), learn how to build them, and understand how their embedded intelligence and tools drive efficiency, accuracy, and scale.
Title: Building Joule Agents across SAP Business Suite

Description: Accountants responsible for credit management must have a deep understanding of how to utilize and set up the relevant business processes in SAP Credit Management. This includes knowing the main features and configuration options to minimize credit risks and keep finances stable. This course will provide you with a thorough understanding of managing credit effectively and making informed decisions about new sales orders, ultimately improving overall financial stability.
Title: Detailing Credit Management Processes in Accounts Receivable
LSC_product_subcategory: Enterprise Resource Planning,Enterprise Resource Planning,Enterprise Resource Planning,Enterprise Resource Planning

LSC_product: SAP S/4HANA Cloud,SAP S/4HANA,SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition,SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition
Description: As a consultant in charge of Accounts Receivables processes, it's essential to have a strong grasp on digital payments in order to improve cash flow and operational efficiency. This course will provide you with the skills necessary to utilize SAP Digital Payments, from theory to real-world application.
Title: Detailing Digital Payments Collaboration
LSC_product_subcategory: Enterprise Resource Planning,Enterprise Resource Planning,Enterprise Resource Planning,Enterprise Resource Planning

Description: As a consultant specializing in Accounts Receivables, mastering special G/L transactions is essential for streamlined process efficiency. This course equips you with the knowledge to execute down payments, manage guarantees, and understand the integrated process with SAP S/4HANA Sales when setting up your receivables management process in any deployment of SAP S/4HANA.
Title: Detailing Special G/L Transactions in Accounts Receivable

LSC_product: SAP Ariba Supplier Lifecycle and Performance

Title: Managing Supplier Requests
Data Modelling in ABAP Dictionary and ABAP Core Data Services
Intermediate ABAP Programming
Basic ABAP Programming

Description: In combination with TADM10, users will study to become and get certified as an SAP System Administrator. Upon completion of these two courses, users will take the C_TADM_23 certification exam.
Title: Technical Implementation and Operation II of SAP S/4HANA and SAP Business Suite

LSC_product: SAP Signavio Process Manager,SAP LeanIX Application Portfolio Management
Description: This learning journey will guide you through the SAP business and solution transformation tools and methodologies.
Title: Exploring Business and Solution Transformation Tools and Methodology
Learning_objectives:
After completing this learning journey, consultants will be able to:

  • Explain the need and hurdles of Business transformation within an enterprise.
  • Understand SAP’s Business and Solution transformation methodologies and the associated solutions and offerings.
  • Learn the benefits of SAP Cloud ALM, SAP Signavio, SAP Lean IX and Tricentis and its integration

Description: This learning journey provides foundational knowledge and experience in how to use the trigger based real time data replication technology of the SAP Landscape Transformation Replication Server. You will learn how to use the basic and advanced option available SAP Landscape Transformation Replication Server.
Title: Using Real-Time Replication with SAP Landscape Transformation Replication Server
Learning_objectives:
• Comprehend and Communicate SAP Landscape Transformation Replication Server (SLT) Server Fundamentals.
  • Install, Configure, and Manage SAP Landscape Transformation Server.
  • Optimize and Monitor SAP Landscape Transformation Server.
  • Troubleshoot and Utilize Advanced Settings for Replication.

LSC_product: SAP Ariba Supplier Lifecycle and Performance
Description: Explore certificate management and the standalone modular questionnaire process in SAP Ariba Supplier Management.
Title: Managing Modular Questionnaires and Supplier Certificates

Description: This course will guide you through the fundamentals of the Media industry, including its value chain, industry specific business processes, and  trends. Additionally, you will explore how SAP’s solutions can enhance business value and streamline operations within the Media industry.
Learning_objectives:
After completing this learning journey, you, will be able to: 

  • Understand the industry-specific business processes, differentiators, and challenges.
  • Use the Media industry specific terminology.
  • Articulate the end-to-end solution story for the Media industry.
Title: Introducing the Media Industry

Description:
In this video, we’ll walk you through the customer schema features of the SAP Customer Data Platform. First, we’ll add new attributes to the Profile Entity and then create a new Activity schema.

You can view the documentation on the SAP Help Portal for more details:
Customer Schema | SAP Help Portal

Description:
In this video, we’ll walk you through the processing purpose feature of SAP Customer Data Cloud. We’re going to add a new processing purpose and then check existing processing purposes on customer profiles. 

You can view the documentation on the SAP Help Portal for more details:
Processing Purposes | SAP Help Portal
Title: Discovering Privacy and Trust Mechanisms in SAP Customer Data Platform

Description:
In this video, we’ll walk you through the application library feature of the SAP Customer Data Platform, and setup a source Application from scratch.

You can view the documentation on the SAP Help Portal for more details:

Title: Configuring Events Setup - SAP Customer Data Platform

Description:
In this video, we’ll walk you through the activity indicator features of SAP CDP. We’re going to create two new Activity Indicators and then see how they work in action when ingesting event data from a source application.

You can view the documentation on the SAP Help Portal for more details:
Setting Up Activity Indicators | SAP Help Portal

Before we  define a new segment, we will  first define the building blocks which make up the segments: the profile schema, activity schema and activity indicators.

Creating a Segment | SAP Help Portal

Description:

You can view the documentation on the SAP Help Portal for more details: Monitoring Dashboard | SAP Help Portal
Title: Fixing Errors Using the Monitoring Dashboards in SAP Customer Data Platform

Description: This playlist gets you acquainted with SAP CDP through console navigation, schema configuration, privacy settings, event setup, audience building, CX journey design, and error monitoring.
Title: Excelling in SAP Customer Data Platform

Description: This learning journey will guide you through the configurations necessary to implement SAP SuccessFactors Recruiting: Candidate Experience.
Title: Configuring SAP SuccessFactors Recruiting: Candidate Experience
Learning_objectives: After completing this learning journey, you will be able to perform and configure the core functionalities within SAP SuccessFactors Recruiting: Candidate Experience and access the resources and support available to configure additional features. You will learn how to configure career sites using Career Site Builder, enable customers to attract, organize, and engage their talent using Candidate Relationship Management, and implement source reporting in Recruiting Advanced Analytics.

Description:
This learning journey discusses essential features and requirements of advanced Available-to-Promise (aATP) in SAP S/4HANA.

It provides a detailed overview how to setup and use these functionalities.

Checking Methods in Detail and Advanced ATP in SAP S/4HANA are discussed.

Also the concept and use of Backorder Processing is explained.

In addition, both Supply Based Confirmation (SBC) and Business Process Scheduling (BPS) are covered.

With system demo recordings and extensive hands-on exercises, you will gain a thorough understanding of how aATP can support your logistics processes.
Title: Exploring aATP in SAP S/4HANA
Learning_objectives: By the end of this learning journey, you will be able to describe and execute business processes in SAP S/4HANA aATP.

LSC_product: SAP S/4HANA,SAP S/4HANA Cloud,SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition
Description: This learning journey discusses essential features and requirements for the various steps in a production planning process in SAP S/4HANA. You explore the core features of Demand Management and what the characteristics and benefits are of the various (groups of) planning strategies that SAP S/4HANA has to offer. Make-to-order production, make-to-stock production, and various related features and functions in SAP S/4HANA are discussed. You also execute a predictive material and resource planning (pMRP) scenario, and you work with MRP Live. The topics of demand-driven replenishment (DDR) and multi-step planning with SAP S/4HANA PP/DS are also covered.
Title: Exploring Production Planning in SAP S/4HANA
Learning_objectives: By the end of this learning journey, you will have been introduced to supply chain planning in SAP S/4HANA, where you will have seen and executed the various steps in a typical supply chain planning process. You will have seen various examples of both make-to-order and make-to-stock planning strategies in action. You will also have worked through an example of predictive material and resource planning (pMRP), and of MRP Live. You will have also been introduced to demand-driven replenishment (DDR) and a multi-step planning run in SAP S/4HANA PP/DS.
LSC_product_subcategory: Enterprise Resource Planning,Enterprise Resource Planning,Enterprise Resource Planning

Description: The course "Business Processes in SAP S/4HANA Production Planning" is designed to teach advanced planning techniques using SAP S/4HANA. It includes understanding the basics and detailed steps of supply chain planning, various demand management strategies like make-to-order and make-to-stock, material requirements planning and capacity evaluation. The course targets roles such as project managers, application consultants, and business process architects, offering practical exercises and comprehensive insights into production planning using SAP S/4HANA.
Title: Exploring Business Processes in SAP S/4HANA Production Planning
Learning_objectives:
• Understand the basics and detailed steps of supply chain planning.
  • Apply various demand management strategies, including make-to-order and make-to-stock.
  • Execute material requirements planning and capacity evaluation.
  • Optimize supply chain efficiency.

Description: This course will guide you through the fundamentals of the healthcare industry, including its value chain, industry specific business processes, and trends. Additionally, you will explore how SAP’s solutions can enhance business value and streamline operations within the healthcare industry.
Title: Introducing the Healthcare Industry

Description: This Learning journey will introduce you to the fundamental processes in SAP S/4HANA Sales.
Title: Exploring SAP S/4HANA Sales
Learning_objectives: At the end of this training, decision makers will be able to explain the SAP S/4HANA Sales process and discuss the applicability and utilization of SAP S/4HANA Sales with relevant stakeholders.

Description: This learning journey will guide you through the configurations necessary to implement SAP SuccessFactors Succession Management.
Title: Configuring SAP SuccessFactors Succession Management
Learning_objectives: After completing this learning journey, you will be able to perform and configure the core functionalities within SAP SuccessFactors Succession Management and access the resources and support available to configure additional features.

Description: This learning journey will guide you through the configurations necessary to implement SAP SuccessFactors Variable Pay.
Learning_objectives: After completing this learning journey, you will be able to perform and configure the core functionalities within SAP SuccessFactors Variable Pay and access the resources and support available to configure additional features.
Title: Configuring SAP SuccessFactors Variable Pay

Description: Unlock the full potential of SAP Profitability and Performance Management Cloud with our comprehensive course designed to equip you with the skills and knowledge to navigate, manage, and optimize application groups and modeling environments. Dive deep into the intricacies of Universal Modeling, learn to create and manage environments, and master the art of data processing and reporting. Whether you're a beginner or looking to enhance your expertise, this course offers a structured approach to mastering SAP's powerful tools for profitability and performance management.
Title: Modeling in SAP Profitability and Performance Management Cloud, Universal Model

Description: This course covers all of the functions of SAP Ariba Buying related to the creation of requisitions, the issuing of purchase orders, and receiving against purchase orders. The training material discusses the business processes automated by SAP Ariba Buying, and explains how to use each feature
Title: SAP Ariba Procurement: Buying

LSC_product: SAP S/4HANA,SAP S/4HANA Cloud,SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition,SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition
Description: This learning journey will introduce you to the key concepts and structures of Financial Accounting master data and postings in SAP S/4HANA in theory and practice. The content of this learning journey is relevant for SAP S/4HANA deployment options in the public cloud, the private cloud and on premise.
Title: Outlining the Record to Report Process in SAP S/4HANA
Learning_objectives:
After completing this learning journey, novice users will be able to describe SAP best practice related concepts and structures of the record to report area, taking into consideration:

  • Master data
  • General concepts of postings and posting scenarios
  • Close process and
  • Reporting possibilities.

This basic education provides a starting point for participants to effectively onboard in the record to report area and use the system.
LSC_product_subcategory: Enterprise Resource Planning,Enterprise Resource Planning,Enterprise Resource Planning,Enterprise Resource Planning

LSC_product: SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition,SAP S/4HANA Cloud,SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition,SAP S/4HANA
Description: This learning journey will guide business users through understanding and updating the standard price of a product, while familiarizing themselves with single level cost estimates. This learning journeys addresses learners who are interested in SAP S/4HANA Cloud and on premise deployment options.
Title: Introducing Product Cost Planning and Production Accounting in SAP S/HANA
Learning_objectives: Upon completing this learning journey, business users will be able to understand and apply various cost estimation techniques, including evaluating item categories and technical quantity structures, utilizing master data, and accurately valuating and releasing standard prices within a business environment.
LSC_product_subcategory: Enterprise Resource Planning,Enterprise Resource Planning,Enterprise Resource Planning,Enterprise Resource Planning

Description:
At the end of this learning journey, you will be able to use SAP's generative AI Hub to solve your business problems using LLMs, SAP AI Launchpad, and generative-ai-hub SDK.

You will be able to apply techniques for refining and evaluating prompts using different large language models in generative AI hub.
Learning_objectives:
•    Describe AI foundation and generative AI hub 
•    Learn how to access SAP's generative AI hub.
•    Identify the need of using SDKs for LLMs.
•    Describe SAP's Generative AI hub SDK.
•    Explain  advanced prompting methods.
•    Describe different models in generative AI hub.
•    Configure different models in generative AI hub.
•    Explain generative AI applications beyond chatbots, using software-driven input and output processing scenarios.
Title: Solving Your Business Problems Using Prompts and LLMs in SAP's Generative AI Hub

Description: This learning journey offers a comprehensive approach to understanding, configuring, and integrating Joule, SAP’s AI copilot, across various SAP platforms, including SAP SuccessFactors and SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition. It will guide you through both the functional aspects of leveraging Joule to boost productivity for your customers and the technical configurations needed to set it up effectively.
Learning_objectives:
After completing this learning journey, you will be able to:

  • Master fundamental functionalities of Joule in the SAP landscape
  • Set up Joule with SAP SuccessFactors and SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition 
  • Understand how to unlock the benefits of Joule for customers
  • Troubleshoot common setup issues 
  • Customize Joule to meet specific business needs
  • Stay updated with the developments in Joule through ongoing learning and community engagement
Title: Provisioning and Implementing Joule

Description:
The "SAP Certified Associate - Implementation Consultant - SAP SuccessFactors Performance and Goals" certification exam verifies that the candidate possesses fundamental knowledge and skills in the area of SAP SuccessFactors Performance and Goals. This certificate proves that the candidate can apply the knowledge and skills in projects under the guidance of an experienced consultant. It is recommended as an entry-level qualification to allow consultants to get acquainted with the fundamentals of SAP SuccessFactors Performance and Goals.

 

This certification is intended for SAP partner consultants implementing the solution. Only registered SAP partner consultants will be provided with provisioning rights once they have been certified. Customers and independent consultants, even if certified, will not be provided with provisioning rights. There are no exceptions to this policy.

 

NOTE: The next version of this exam should be available between December 8-12, 2025.
Title: SAP Certified Associate - SAP SuccessFactors Performance and Goals
Related_exams: SAP SuccessFactors Performance and Goals
