Description: This learning journey provides a comprehensive overview of SAP CX AI Toolkit for SAP Commerce Cloud persona. It seeks to empower learners to deploy intelligent automation with the SAP CX AI Toolkit and create an engaging smart shopping experience for customers.
Title: Utilizing SAP CX AI Toolkit for SAP Commerce Cloud
Learning_objectives:
Upon completing the learning journey, learners will be able to:

  • Describe the role of the SAP CX AI Toolkit within the SAP CX portfolio, its key features, and the associated business benefits in SAP Commerce Cloud.
  • Perform the essential steps to access the SAP CX AI Toolkit and establish a connection to SAP Commerce Cloud.
  • Utilize the essential features of SAP CX AI Toolkit within SAP Commerce Cloud for their business use cases.

Description: Learn how to set up an SAP Customer Data Cloud CIAM connector in this video. Discover the step-by-step process of connecting to an S3 bucket, setting up connectors, and mapping fields.
Title: Setting Up the CIAM Connector in SAP Customer Data Platform

Description: This learning journey provides deep insights into the digital adoption and the WalkMe platform.
Title: Starting your Digital Adoption Journey with WalkMe
Learning_objectives:
Upon completing this learning journey, you will be able to:

  • Define Digital Adoption and Digital Transformation.
  • Identify WalkMe’s value and uses and learn how to incorporate some of WalkMe’s more technical features.
  • Understand how to build content using various WalkMe apps.
  • Analyze WalkMe engagement metrics and engagement data.

LSC_product: SAP Billing and Revenue Innovation Management, CRM and convergent charging components
Description:
The course describes the processes in SAP CPQ and SAP Billing and Revenue Innovation Management (BRIM).  

The training gives a process overview about SAP CPQ, SAP Solution Quotation, SAP SOM Subscription Order Management, SAP Convergent Charging, SAP Convergent Mediation, SAP Convergent Invoicing and Financial Contract Accounting.  

Use cases in different industries (High Tech, Postal, Telecommunication) describe how business to customer processes (B2C) and business to business processes (B2B) for subscription and consumption business are implemented with SAP Billing and Revenue Innovation Management (BRIM).
Title: Discovering the capabilities of SAP Solutions for Quote-to-Cash Management private cloud (BRIM) for Business User
Learning_objectives:
After completing this beginner-level learning journey, Business Users will be able to:

  • Understand the Billing and Revenue Innovation Management Solution (BRIM) components.
  • Understand BRIM processes with help of one business example configurable cloud product.
  • Through system demo recordings, Business Users will learn how the BRIM process runs; starting from Solution quotation, rate usage, run dunning process and end with a credit note.
  • Identify Basic Objects in a BRIM Landscape.

LSC_product: SAP Integrated Business Planning for Supply Chain
Description:
In this course you will gain a solid understanding of the SAP Integrated Business Planning for Supply Chain solution, the components, and their associated business processes.
This course is mandatory foundational knowledge which is required for all follow-on SAP IBP courses.
Title: Exploring Planning Processes in SAP IBP
Learning_objectives:
This course will prepare you to:

  • Describe the key business processes in the supply chain management applications.
  • Provide an overview of the SAP IBP functionality.

LSC_product: SAP Integrated Business Planning for Supply Chain
Description: In this course you will be well-equipped to navigate the SAP Fiori Launchpad, efficiently utilize the SAP IBP, add-in Microsoft Excel, Planner Workspaces, and interpret fundamental KPIs using introductory analytics tools. Join us on this educational journey to enhance your SAP proficiency.
Title: Exploring the Tools and Features in SAP IBP
Learning_objectives: Upon completion of this introductory course, consultants will be able to navigate the basic features of the SAP Fiori Launchpad, experiment with the SAP IBP Microsoft Excel add-in and Planner Workspaces for simple data tasks and explore and interpret basic KPIs using introductory tools like Analytics & Dashboards, or Analytics Stories.

Description: This course is designed for advanced SAP Integrated Business Planning users, covering essential topics such as data integration techniques and planning area management. It delves into key figure functions, including disaggregation configuration, as well as advanced configurations like currency and unit of measurement conversions and simplified key figure calculations. Additionally, the course teaches planning operators, application jobs, and setting up alerts, equipping participants with the skills to exploit SAP IBP's advanced features fully.
Learning_objectives: Upon completing this course, you will have mastered data integration techniques and planning area management, including copying, merging, downloading, uploading, and comparing planning areas. They will proficiently manage key figure functions, such as disaggregation configuration and performing currency and unit of measurement conversions. Additionally, participants will acquire skills to utilize planning operators, create and manage application jobs, and set up alerts to monitor planning scenarios effectively, thereby fully exploiting SAP IBP's advanced features.
Title: Mastering the Advanced Configuration in SAP IBP

Description: This learning journey is designed for you to discover and position the SAP Procurement solution area.
Title: Positioning SAP Solutions for Procurement
Learning_objectives: Upon completing this learning journey, you will be able to understand the potential of the SAP Solutions for Procurement, build a comprehensive vision for its implementation, extend its value across various applications, and effectively position and sell the solution suite for maximum benefit to our customers.

LSC_product: SAP Integrated Business Planning for Supply Chain
Description: In this course, you will explore the essential features and functionalities of SAP Integrated Business Planning (IBP) add-in for Microsoft Excel and is designed to provide users with a deep understanding of how to use the Excel add-in to interact with SAP IBP functionalities. The objective of this course is to equip participants with advanced skills in using the SAP IBP Excel Add-In for business planning. The objective of this course is to equip participants with advanced skills in using the SAP IBP Excel Add-In for business planning.
Title: Evaluating the Planning Capabilities within SAP IBP, Add-In for Microsoft Excel
Learning_objectives: After completing this course, learners will be able to effectively use and adapt SAP sample planning views, create custom templates, and navigate the report editor. Participants will gain a comprehensive understanding of key figures, formatting options, and the use of local members for complex planning scenarios.

LSC_product: SAP Integrated Business Planning for Supply Chain
Description: In this course, you will explore the essential features and functionalities of the order-based planning business processes within SAP Integrated Business Planning (IBP) for response and supply. You will get an introduction, how to leverages historical and real-time order data to create accurate supply plans that are directly linked to customer orders and sales forecasts. This approach enables businesses to focus on fulfilling specific customer requirements, taking into account order priorities, inventory levels, lead times, and available supply resources.
Title: Discovering Response & Supply for SAP IBP – order-based planning
Learning_objectives: After completing this course, learners will be able to describe the key business processes and explain the benefits of the order-based planning in the SAP Integrated Business Planning (IBP) for response and supply planning business application.

LSC_product: SAP Business Network for Procurement and SAP Business Network for Supply Chain
Description: This learning journey is designed for you to discover the Business Network Solution area.
Title: Discovering the SAP Business Network for Procurement
Learning_objectives: Upon completing this learning journey, you will be able to understand the fundamental aspects of the Business Network solutions and their potential. You will learn about SAP’s cloud strategy, the integrated portfolio, and how it connects to end-to-end business processes and industries.

Description: This learning journey is designed for you to discover the Procurement Solution area.
Title: Discovering Procurement Solutions
Learning_objectives: Upon completing this learning journey, you will be able to understand the fundamental aspects of the Procurement solutions and their potential. You will learn about SAP’s cloud strategy, the integrated portfolio, and how it connects to end-to-end business processes and industries.

Description: This course explores the impact of the linear economy on the environment and society, and how a circular economy can address these issues. It discusses how circular business practices create value and how technology enables a circular economy. SAP technology is highlighted as a tool for systemic change. The course aims to inspire and provide a platform for exploring challenges in implementing circular business practices.
Title: Helping Business Thrive in a Circular Economy

Description: This course provides you with an introduction to SAP Business Technology Platform and the Intelligent Enterprise strategy.
Title: Exploring SAP Business Technology Platform

Description: This learning journey will guide you through core financial concepts and business processes in SAP S/4HANA.
Title: Overview of Financials in SAP S/4HANA
Learning_objectives: After completing this learning journey, business users will be able to describe the key functional areas of SAP S/4HANA Finance. You will  be able to perform selected business processes in Financial Accounting, Management Accounting, and Treasury Management, and describe the integration between these areas.

LSC_product: SAP Business Network for Procurement and SAP Business Network for Supply Chain
Description: This learning journey is designed for you to discover and position the SAP Business Network solution area.
Title: Positioning the SAP Business Network for Procurement
Learning_objectives: Upon completing this learning journey, you will be able to understand the potential of the SAP Solutions for Business Network, build a comprehensive vision for its implementation, extend its value across various applications, and effectively position and sell the solution suite for maximum benefit to our customers.

Description: This learning journey will provide you with an overview and practical introduction to the methodology and tools to develop a custom SQL-based data warehouse.
Title: Developing a Custom Data Warehouse on SAP HANA
Learning_objectives: After completing this learning journey, developers, data scientists, and architects will gain an overview of the SAP HANA for SQL data warehousing approach based on the SAP HANA platform. You will be able to design and build a modern, agile data warehouse using the advanced model of SAP HANA extended application services, and SAP solutions for enterprise information management.

Description: This learning is ideal for professionals requiring fundamental knowledge of the authorization concept for SAP Fiori on SAP S/4HANA. Managing SAP Fiori Authorizations, Implementing SAP Fiori Applications, and Role maintenance, as well as details about the elements, strategies, and tools of the authorization concept will be covered.
Learning_objectives:
• Understanding the SAP Fiori Concept
  • Describing SAP Fiori Authorization
  • Managing SAP Fiori Authorizations
  • Implementing SAP Fiori Applications
  • Maintaining Special Authorizations for SAP Fiori Launchpad
  • Understanding Authorization concept for ABAP Core Data Services (CDS)
  • Analyzing Authorizations in SAP Fiori Applications
  • Understanding Options for Transporting Authorizations
  • Describing Integration Scenarios
  • Defining Authorizations in SAP S/4HANA Projects
Title: Exploring the Authorization Concept for SAP Fiori on SAP S/4HANA

Description:
This learning journey is for business users or consultants experienced in SAP ERP Sourcing and Procurement that want to know what functions have been improved and what key innovations have been added in SAP S/4HANA Sourcing and Procurement. For both SAP S/4HANA and for SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition. 

Many functions are covered, like the changes to the data model in SAP S/4HANA, new options in Sourcing and Contract Management as well as the analytical features of SAP S/4HANA.
Title: Exploring Functions and Innovation in SAP S/4HANA Sourcing and Procurement
Learning_objectives:
• Get introduced to SAP S/4HANA Sourcing and Procurement

  • Execute an operational procurement process in SAP S/4HANA

  • Work with Sourcing and Contract Management in SAP S/4HANA

  • Discuss the analytical capabilities of SAP S/4HANA Sourcing and Procurement

  • Learn what other Procurement-related functionality SAP S/4HANA offers

Description:
This learning journey will provide business users or consultants with an overview of the different capabilities for Contract Management with SAP S4HANA.

You will gain a fundamental overview of the key business processes within Contract Management in SAP S/4 HANA Sourcing and Procurement.
Learning_objectives:
After completing this learning journey, business users and consultants will be able to:

  • Explain the different solutions provided by SAP for Contract Management.
  • Execute the different business processes in SAP S/4HANA Contract Management
Title: Exploring Contract Management in SAP S/4HANA Sourcing and Procurement

Description: SAP Cloud ALM is the Application Lifecycle Management offering for the implementation and operation of cloud-based and hybrid SAP system landscapes. Users benefit from a native cloud solution that was developed as a central entry point for the management and automated operation of SAP landscapes as well as for the implementation of SAP solutions. In this course, participants will gain a detailed and at the same time practical insight into the use of SAP Cloud ALM for Implementation. The focus here is on the possibilities for an accelerated introduction of SAP solutions. In the training, the methodology and functionalities of SAP Cloud ALM are presented, and their application is trained in numerous practical exercises. As a result of the training, participants will be able to apply SAP Cloud ALM for Implementations and will also be able to convey the benefits of the integrated methodology.
Title: Implementing with SAP Cloud ALM
Learning_objectives:
This course will enable you to:

  • Explain the core elements of SAP Cloud ALM.
  • Use SAP Cloud ALM in agile implementation projects.
  • Understand the connections to the SAP's implementation methodology SAP Activate.
  • Plan the transition from SAP Solution Manager to SAP Cloud ALM.

Description:
This course provides participants with an overview of the sources of supply available in SAP S/HANA, and presents the processes and tools necessary for effective sourcing within the SAP S/4HANA environment. 
 ​
Title: Exploring Sourcing in S/4HANA
Learning_objectives:
After completing this learning journey, Business Users will be able to use special purchasing information records, the source list, and quota arrangements, and describe the different options for determining the source of supply.
This course equips users with the skills needed to perform sourcing processes and drive organizational efficiency.

Description: This Learning Journey will guide you through the process of structuring, configuring, and optimizing SAP Build Work Zone capabilities which help empower business users across an organization. It provides comprehensive insight into its core functionalities, user interface customization, integration of applications, creation and management of workspaces, and strategies to enhance user engagement and streamline business processes.
Title: Designing SAP Build Work Zone
Learning_objectives: Understanding the core capabilities of SAP Build Work Zone to enhance user productivity and streamline business processes and mastering how to configure and manage its site menu for optimal user navigation. Furthermore, you will learn to create and manage work pages and workspaces, integrate apps using two key methods, and fine-tune the user settings in the header bar to enhance the overall user experience.

Description: This learning journey will introduce you to the fundamental processes in SAP S/4HANA Quality Management.
Title: Applying SAP S/4HANA Quality Management
Learning_objectives: At the end of this learning journey, SAP business users and administration consultants are able to process the basic Quality Management activities in SAP S/4HANA along the logistics supply chain and identify options to enhance the business processes with Quality Management functionalities.

LSC_product: SAP Business Network for Procurement and SAP Business Network for Supply Chain
Description: This learning journey covers the features and functions of SAP Business Network Supply Chain Collaboration for the Add-On solutions. It includes Planning Collaboration, Quality Collaboration, and Supplier Managed Inventory. This learning journey is designed for project managers, functional leads, consultants, technical leads, or anyone who wants to understand the basic capabilities and process flows of each Supply Chain Collaboration add-on modules.
Title: Discovering SAP Business Network Supply Chain Collaboration Add On Features and Functions
Learning_objectives: After completing this learning journey learners will be able to define planning collaboration and explain the business process for planning collaboration, describe quality collaboration and its business case, and describe supplier managed inventory and its business case.

Description: After completing this learning journey, warehouse management decision-makers will be able to assess the different solution and deployment options for warehouse management, and functions and processes of Extended Warehouse Management in SAP S/4HANA.
Title: Discovering Extended Warehouse Management with SAP S/4HANA
Learning_objectives:
• Understand the requirements for a warehouse management solution
  • Differentiate between available warehouse management solutions
  • Describe different possible steps during goods receipt and goods issues processes in the warehouse

Description:
After completing this learning journey, transportation management decision-makers will be able to assess 
capabilities of different transportation solutions using knowledge of supported processes, solution architecture, 
and process flow that can be deployed and configured in an SAP S/4HANA environment.
Title: Exploring SAP S/4HANA Supply Chain for Transportation Management
Learning_objectives:
• Summarize functions and features of SAP Transportation Management
  • Explain SAP Transportation Management deployment options
  • Understand functional differences between basic and advance Transportation Management
  • Describe day-to-day roles and responsibilities in the transportation domain

Description: This learning journey will introduce you to the advanced concepts of SAP S/4HANA Quality Management (QM) focusing on the creation and management of basic data, inspection planning, quality notifications, the complete quality inspection lifecycle, and quality management costs.
Title: Configuring SAP S/4HANA Quality Management
Learning_objectives:
At the end of this learning journey, consultants will be able to:

1. Create basic data, including setting up sample determination, dynamic modification, master inspection characteristics, and codes.

2. Develop and enhance comprehensive inspection plans using basic data.

3. Configure result recording, valuation, and usage decisions within SAP S/4HANA Quality Management.

4. Configure and process quality notifications across different operational processes, such as procurement, sales, and production, facilitating effective defect recording and cost management.

5. Record Quality Management costs using the QM order.

LSC_product: SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition,SAP S/4HANA Cloud
Description: ​​Delve into the cutting-edge intersection of finance and artificial intelligence (AI) with SAP’s innovative solutions. Gain a deep understanding of how SAP's AI strategy revolutionizes financial management, empowering organizations to make data-driven decisions and optimize business processes.​
Title: Infusing SAP Business AI into Finance Processes

Description: Learn about important aspects that are relevant for the SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition implementation certification and prepare for the assessment to stay certified.
Title: SAP S/4HANA Cloud, public edition implementation consultant

LSC_product: SAP Integrated Business Planning for Supply Chain
Description: In this course, you will explore the essential configuration settings to create a SAP Integrated Business Planning (IBP) planning model. A planning model describes the structure of a plan in terms of data and calculations. It defines how data is stored, calculated, and aggregated by SAP Integrated Business Planning (IBP). From a technical perspective, a planning model is a collection of master and time series data organized in dimensions and enhanced with specific calculations. Join us on this educational journey to improve your SAP proficiency in the main configuration of a Planning Model.
Title: Discovering the Main Configuration for SAP IBP
Learning_objectives: Upon completing this course, consultants can effectively utilize the essential configuration to create and understand the structure of a planning model in SAP Integrated Business Planning (IBP), such as Attributes, Master Data Types, Time Profiles, Key Figures, Planning Area, Planning Levels, Versions, and Planning Area Activation.

LSC_product: SAP Integrated Business Planning for Supply Chain
Description: In this course, you will explore the core functions and powerful tools of SAP IBP, with a special focus on Inventory Planning and Optimization. Discover how to leverage scenario simulations, custom alerts, case management, and business network collaboration to enhance your decision-making capabilities and optimize supply chain operations.
Title: Discovering SAP IBP for Inventory Planning and Optimization
Learning_objectives: After completing this course, you will be able to implement SAP IBP Inventory Optimization and utilize its key features to optimize inventory management processes within your organization.

LSC_product: SAP Integrated Business Planning for Supply Chain
Description:
SAP's Integrated Business Planning for Demand offers cutting-edge solutions that meets today's demand planning challenges. 

With our comprehensive course, you will learn how to apply SAP IBP to optimize supply chain functions and improve demand management processes.  

Discover how to generate statistical forecasts and adjust them based on intelligence, optimize daily forecasts through Demand Sensing and use key figures in planning. 

You will be introduced to the planning process of forecasting and related key figures, discovering the various forecasting algorithms, and much more.
Title: Discovering SAP IBP for Demand
Learning_objectives: Upon completion of this training, consultants will be able to effectively utilize SAP Integrated Business Planning for Demand to generate accurate forecasts, optimize supply chain functions, manage demand planning mechanisms, and effectively respond to changes in demand using the tool's predictive and demand sensing capabilities.

Description: This certification verifies that you possess the fundamental and core knowledge required of the SAP Build Work Zone implementation and administration profile and proves that you have an overall understanding and in?depth technical skills to participate as a member of a project team in a mentored role. This certificate builds on the basic knowledge gained through related SAP Business Technology Platform and SAP Build Work Zone training.
Title: SAP Certified Associate - SAP Build Work Zone - Implementation and Administration
Related_exams: SAP Certified Associate - SAP Build Work Zone - Implementation and Administration

LSC_product: SAP Build Work Zone, advanced edition
Description: This Learning Journey will guide you through the process and considerations of implementing SAP Build Work Zone, from initial deployment and system administration to integration setups and extensibility options.
Title: Implementing and Administering SAP Build Work Zone
Learning_objectives: After completing this learning journey, implementation IT administrators will be able to explain why SAP is offering ‘Digital Experience services’ – specifically SAP Build Work Zone – on SAP BTP. They will be able to explain the solution architecture and the involved default and optional system components. Furthermore, they will be able to implement and configure the solution according to business and functional requirements – both from a methodology and technology perspective. Apart from the technical and functional setup – for instance identity and access management or feature configuration – they will be able to articulate and apply the different available options of SAP integration and extensibility provided in SAP Build Work Zone. Lastly, they will be able to take the configured solution into a productive deployment and handover to [other] system administrators.

Description:
Auditing allows site administrators to view actions performed by users and administrators or by end users to their own accounts (e.g., changing a password). All actions performed from within the admin console are audited, as well as end-user actions involving a number of profile-related APIs.

Our Auditing service gives you vision and control over all changes to the accounts in your user database. This helps secure against data loss related to administrator error and makes it much easier to detect and fix problems with your system.
Title: Viewing the Audit Log in SAP Customer Data Cloud

Description:
This video introduces the SAP Customer Data Platform Console, detailing its functionality and layout. Explore features such as dashboards, analytics, customer profiles, segmentation, CX Journeys, audience activations, data access, connect menu group, customer schemas, processing purposes, and new monitoring capabilities for optimizing customer data management.

You can view the documentation on the SAP Help Portal for more details: Product Overview | SAP Help Portal
Title: Navigating the SAP Customer Data Platform  Console

Description:
As cyber threats become increasingly advanced, protecting business data has become more essential than ever. Join this learning journey on Architecting Security for SAP Business Technology Platform, designed for professionals who want a comprehensive understanding of security in a hybrid SAP environment.

Start by exploring identity and access management, learning to master role-based access controls and strong authentication methods. Uncover techniques for securing APIs and managing incident response, both crucial for safeguarding your application integrations and effectively dealing with breaches. Gain knowledge about network security and strategies for protecting cloud environments, whether they are public, private, or hybrid.

This learning journey provides valuable insights that will help you integrate security into your organization's digital strategy, enhancing your expertise in SAP security.
Title: Architecting Security for SAP Business Technology Platform
Learning_objectives:
• Understand SAP's cloud offerings—RISE with SAP and GROW with SAP—and their security frameworks, including shared responsibility models.
  • Describe SAP's approach to IAM, including the role of Cloud Identity Services and reference architectures for authorization and authentication.
  • Explain key aspects of SAP BTP security, such as connectivity services, API security, logging, monitoring, and UI strategies.
  • Identify strategies and tools for data protection, privacy, and maintaining code security, including SSDLC and code scanning.
  • Understand AI security concerns, including vulnerabilities, ethics, regulations, and customer responsibilities in SAP Business AI solutions.

Description: This learning journey provides a high-level introduction to digital adoption and the WalkMe platform. It’s a great starting point for all users, and gives an overview on WalkMe that is applicable to those focused on both strategy or technical implementation.
Title: Starting your Digital Adoption Journey: WalkMe Fundamentals

Description: This learning journey will show you how to implement extensions for SAP S/4HANA Cloud consistent with clean core principles and aligned with your business use cases.
Title: Practicing Clean Core Extensibility For SAP S/4HANA Cloud
Learning_objectives: After completing this learning journey, the learner will be able to build custom extensions in SAP S/4HANA Cloud using various tools and based on the concepts of consumer-grade user experience (UX), clean core, the SAP S/4HANA Cloud extensibility model and the ABAP Cloud development model.

Description: This course aims at business users and consultants, who want to execute shopfloor control processes in the discrete manufacturing area using SAP Digital Manufacturing.

Description: This learning journey introduces you to SAP Integration Suite, advanced event mesh which is an offering that complements SAP Event Mesh for more demanding scenarios. In your role as a developer, you will also get insights into the capabilities, tools and benefits of SAP Integration Suite, advanced event mesh, and will explore the differences and commonalities to SAP Event Mesh.

  • Understand the integration possibilities of SAP Digital Manufacturing with shop floor systems, contributing to more efficient and effective manufacturing operations.

Description:
The "SAP Certified Associate - Implementation Consultant - SAP SuccessFactors People Analytics: Reporting" certification exam verifies that the candidate possesses fundamental knowledge and skills in the area of SAP SuccessFactors People Analytics: Reporting. This certificate proves that the candidate can apply the knowledge and skills in projects under the guidance of an experienced consultant. It is recommended as an entry-level qualification to allow consultants to get acquainted with the fundamentals of SAP SuccessFactors People Analytics: Reporting.
 
This certification is intended for SAP partner consultants implementing the solution. Only registered SAP partner consultants will be provided with provisioning rights once they have been certified. Customers and independent consultants, even if certified, will not be provided with provisioning rights. There are no exceptions to this policy.
  
NOTE: The next version of this exam should be available between December 8-12, 2025.

Description:
In this comprehensive course you will gain a solid understanding of the SAP IBP Time Series Based Supply Planning business processes using Optimizer, and their associated configuration.

DO NOT attempt to take this course without first completing the recommended courses for SAP IBP for Supply Chain Overview (IBP1010, IBP1020, IBP2200, IBP2400, IBP2500, IBP2600, IBP2700 & IBP2800), for Discovering the Main Configuration for SAP IBP (IBP2300) AND for SAP IBP Platform Features and Time Series Based Heuristics Planning (IBP3210 & IBP3220). If you attempt to take IBP3710 without first completing the mandatory prerequisite courses, you will not achieve the maximum benefits, and some concepts may be difficult to comprehend.​
Learning_objectives:
This course will prepare you to: 

  • ​Outline the features of SAP IBP Time Series Based Constrained Supply Planning with Optimizer  
  • ​ Describe in detail: Modeling, Key Figures, and Parameters  
  • ​ Utilize Operators and Optimizers

Description: This class assumes that the Enhanced Contract Authoring feature has been enabled. You also learn how to create, use, and manage the Clause Library within the SAP Ariba Contracts solution. It equips consultants with the knowledge and skills necessary to effectively analyze production processes in SAP S/4HANA Cloud using different cost objects, such as production orders, process orders in joint production scenarios, and product cost collectors.

Learning_objectives:
• Explore the MTS production process from a management accounting perspective
  • Identify relevant master data needed in Production Accounting by Order and by Period
  • Evaluate event-based postings to cost objects from different production steps 
  • Learn to analyze production costs, event-based Work-In-Process (WIP) and variance calculation.
  • Explain the error handling process

  • Applying CDS-based contribution margin reports in Profitability Accounting to produce informed analysis and decision-making.

• Develop proficiency in using monitor and performance tools within SAP HANA Cockpit for effective system performance analysis.

  • Explain the benefits of using SAP Fiori elements.
  • Identify the advantages of OData V4 and SAP Fiori elements for OData V4.

  • Use SAP Fiori tools to create and develop SAP Fiori elements applications in a simple and efficient way.

  • Explain the concept of internal and external navigation in SAP Fiori elements applications.
  • Use the flexible programming model for the custom code.
  • Manually deploy your SAP Fiori elements app to your account on SAP BTP.

LSC_product: SAP S/4HANA,SAP S/4HANA Cloud,SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition,SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition
Description: As a newcomer to finance business processes on SAP S/4HANA, you will learn about the different parts of Financial Accounting, utilizing many demos and exercises. The content of this learning journey is relevant for SAP S/4HANA deployment options in the public cloud, the private cloud and on premise
Title: Outlining the Financial Accounting Overview in SAP S/4HANA
Learning_objectives: After completing this learning journey, entry level users will be able to evaluate features and automation aspects of SAP S/4HANA when utilizing this solution for the first time. The included learning content forms the basis of the record-to-report-, accounts payable-, accounts receivable- and asset accounting business processes as these are represented in SAP S/4HANA.
LSC_product_subcategory: Enterprise Resource Planning,Enterprise Resource Planning,Enterprise Resource Planning,Enterprise Resource Planning

LSC_product: SAP S/4HANA Cloud,SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition,SAP S/4HANA

You will learn to speed up and gain better control to plan, manage, and analyze the financial close process for your company.
LSC_product_subcategory: Enterprise Resource Planning,Enterprise Resource Planning,Enterprise Resource Planning

After completing this learning journey, you will be able to:

LSC_product: SAP S/4HANA Cloud,SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition

Related cross-process topics, like procuring materials and working with service contracts, are also included.

Description: In this course you will explore the role of an SAP system administrator by learning about many of their responsibilities and the skills needed to successfully manage an SAP system.

The objective of this course is to provide the learner with an introduction to the role of an SAP System Administrator.  The learner will gain an understanding of the typical tasks performed by a system administrator across various SAP systems.  Users will also gain an understanding of how this role varies by product. 

Upon completion of this learning journey, learners will be able to decide if this role is right for them and follow the appropriate learning path to gain the necessary expertise.

Learners will also be able to deploy an application using a continuous integration and delivery pipeline.

LSC_product: SAP Concur mobile app for Android, apk for Huawei,Concur Expense
Description:
ExpenseIt is an added solution to Concur Expense that aims to transform your receipt management experience. It boosts efficiency by automatically converting receipts into expense line items and seamlessly transferring them to Concur Expense. This advanced automation simplifies receipt submission, accelerates the expense reporting process, and ensures swift reimbursements.

With ExpenseIt, you can instantly capture images of your receipts with your iOS devices at the point of purchase. Employing sophisticated techniques such as advanced machine learning models, individual user history analysis, Optical Character Recognition (OCR), and SAP Business Artificial Intelligence, ExpenseIt accurately reads and extracts crucial information from your receipts. Based on these extracted details, ExpenseIt intelligently creates a comprehensive transaction, making expense tracking more effortless.
Title: Learning to use ExpenseIt on Android
Learning_objectives:
• Describe the ExpenseIt service.
  • List the features and benefits of using ExpenseIt to create expense line items.
  • Explain the best practices in using ExpenseIt.
  • Create expense line items with ExpenseIt.
  • Understand how ExpenseIt leverages integration with SAP business AI to improve hotel itemizations.

LSC_product: SAP Concur mobile app for iOS,Concur Expense

Title: Capturing Car Mileage with Drive on Android
Learning_objectives:
• Explain what Drive is, its features, and its benefits for mileage capture.
  • Identify the recommended phone and tablet settings for optimal use.
  • Demonstrate proficiency in capturing mileage using the different options offered by Drive.
  • Identify and follow the steps to expense car trips created with Drive.

Description:
The "SAP Certified Associate - Implementation Consultant - SAP SuccessFactors Succession Management" certification exam verifies that the candidate possesses fundamental knowledge and skills in the area of SAP SuccessFactors Succession Management. This certificate proves that the candidate can apply the knowledge and skills in projects under the guidance of an experienced consultant. It is recommended as an entry-level qualification to allow consultants to get acquainted with the fundamentals of SAP SuccessFactors Succession Management.

 

This certification is intended for SAP partner consultants implementing the solution. Only registered SAP partner consultants will be provided with provisioning rights once they have been certified. Customers and independent consultants, even if certified, will not be provided with provisioning rights. There are no exceptions to this policy.

 

NOTE: The next version of this exam should be available  between December 8-12, 2025.
Title: SAP Certified Associate - SAP SuccessFactors Succession Management
Related_exams: SAP SuccessFactors Succession Management

Description:
This course will help you to prepare for the implementation stage of your Transportation Management project or enable you to configure the system in your role as an application consultant. This course explains all necessary configuration and master data to enable manual and automatic transportation planning in SAP S/4HANA, Transportation Management. You will be able to set up the transportation network.

Furthermore, you will be able to configure transportation relevance for both, orders and deliveries, create freight units, and manage packaging. You will configure various planning scenarios (interactive and automatic) as well as explore subcontracting processes and load optimization. You will be able to facilitate transportation execution using Transportation Management including the integration with SAP Extended Warehouse Management, output management, and event tracking.
Title: Planning and Execution in SAP S/4HANA Transportation Management

Description:
• This course will help you to prepare for the implementation stage of your Transportation Management project or enable you to configure the system in your role as an application consultant. You will be able to create the necessary master data and configuration in SAP S/4HANA, Transportation Management to perform charge calculation.
  • Furthermore, the course explains how to set up Transportation Management as well as its integration into Materials Management (MM) to facilitate freight settlement processes. With this course you will be able to explain how to distribute costs to the originating delivery items. Furthermore, this course explains the Strategic Freight Procurement process and the necessary configuration steps to implement it.
Title: Charges and Settlement in SAP S/4HANA Transportation Management

• Acquire detailed knowledge on how to effectively manage, structure and customize technical objects.

  • Gain proficiency in customizing settings with a key focus on maintenance notifications, maintenance orders, order costing and order settlement.

Description:
This video explains what service order templates are, what they are used for and provides a short demo. 

Service Order Templates define reusable sets of service-related data that minimize the amount of time required to create a service transaction. In the service industry more often than you know you are creating service orders very similar to the ones created before. Example standard maintenance procedure of equipment, where you will need filter replacement, oil change, piston check to be done each time. To be more efficient in creating service orders for a standard maintenance procedure, templates are created. These templates are used to create service orders.
Title: Understanding Service Order Templates - SAP S/4HANA Service

Learning_objectives: After completing this learning journey, you will be able to map the relevant provisions of national or supranational export control legislation in SAP Global Trade Services. This includes product classification and export license management.

Description: This learning journey is designed to guide learners through the essential steps for successfully configuring and managing Concur Invoice Standard Edition. Whether setting up the system for the first time or optimizing an existing configuration, this journey will help develop the skills necessary to ensure a smooth and compliant Invoice management experience.
Title: Getting Started with Concur Invoice Standard Edition for Administrators
Learning_objectives:
By the end of this learning journey, learners will be able to:

  • Navigate, configure, and confidently manage various aspects of the Concur Invoice Standard Edition environment as an administrator.
  • Oversee the entire invoice lifecycle—submission, review, approval, and audits to ensure adherence to company policies.
  • Provide practical support to end users.

Description: With this Learning Journey, you will learn how to develop powerful analytical queries using ABAP Core Data Services, that can be consumed by analytical applications.

Learning_objectives: After completing this learning journey, developers, data engineers, and consultants will be able to create analytical data models in the SAP BTP, ABAP Environment, using CDS-based Analytical Projection Views.

Title: Validating the SAP Business Transformation by Applying the Integrated Toolchain

Description: This video provides a detailed walkthrough on configuring and managing business areas within SAP Customer Data Platform to improve data segmentation and user access control. You'll learn how to segregate data by designating area-defining attributes across different schemas, including Profile, Group, and Activity. The video demonstrates how to select and activate specific business areas, assign these areas to users, and apply them to configurations such as segments for more targeted data handling and analysis. Ideal for administrators and data managers, this video helps optimize data access and organization within business units.
Title: Working with Business Areas in SAP Customer Data Platform

Description: In this video, you'll learn how to map a refund request in Open Payment Framework Workbench, a crucial step for enhancing customer satisfaction through seamless refund processing. We’ll start by accessing the refund setup screen and configuring the necessary fields, such as the refund amount and payment intent, using guidelines from the PSP's documentation. Watch as we navigate through setting the request method, handling authentication, and mapping response fields to ensure efficient transaction management.
Title: Mapping a Refund Request in Open Payment Framework

Description: Using Concur Request, you can submit an authorization request with your expected trip expenses. In this video, you will see how to submit a request before booking a trip in Concur Travel.

Description: Stripe is an online payment processing and credit card processing platform for businesses. This video will show you how to create a Stripe account, which will be used Open Payment Framework integration with SAP Commerce Cloud.
Title: Creating a Stripe Account for Open Payment Framework and SAP Commerce Cloud Integration

Description: This video demonstrates how to create a payment integration using the Open Payment Framework Workbench, specifically for the Stripe Checkout solution.
Title: Creating a Payment Integration with Open Payment Framework Workbench

LSC_product_category: CRM and Customer Experience,CRM and Customer Experience
Description: This video demonstrates how to configure a payment authorization by initializing a payment form within Open Payment Framework.
Title: Configuring Payment Authorization By Initializing A Payment Form within Open Payment Framework

Description: This video demonstrates how to test and troubleshoot a checkout page to verify the payment integration configuration with the Open Payment Framework.
Title: Testing and Troubleshooting the Checkout Page in Payment Integration with the Open Payment Framework

Description: A payment authorization verification is required to initiate a payment and proceed with an order in SAP Commerce Cloud. This video demonstrates how to set up a payment authorization verification in the Open Payment Framework.
Title: Setting Up Payment Authorization Verification in Open Payment Framework

Description: In this video, you’ll learn how to capture and map the PSP (Payment Service Provider) reference during payment integration. Follow along as we update transaction mapping settings, verify successful payments, and ensure each order can be directly traced back to its Stripe transaction.
Title: Mapping PSP References in Open Payment Framework

LSC_product_category: CRM and Customer Experience,CRM and Customer Experience
Description: In this video, learn how to configure webhook notifications from Stripe to OPF to ensure reliable transaction updates based on service events. We walk through setting up webhook URLs, selecting appropriate event types, and testing the integration to keep your payment process seamless and secure, building on previous steps like transaction authorization and verification in SAP Commerce Cloud.
Title: Configuring Notifications in Open Payment Framework

LSC_product_category: CRM and Customer Experience,CRM and Customer Experience
Description: In this video, we'll walk you through configuring crucial notification mappings in Open Payment Framework. Starting with a review of existing mappings, we'll highlight the importance of mapping payment methods, request types, and transaction statuses, while introducing key fields like card expiry date and customer order links. You'll learn how to adjust webhook settings, utilize Stripe's client reference ID, and ensure accurate tracking of charge notifications, enabling precise association of transactions with customer orders.
Title: Configuring Additional Notification Mappings in Open Payment Framework

LSC_product_category: CRM and Customer Experience,CRM and Customer Experience
Description: In this video, you'll learn how to configure secure notification authentication in OPF using Stripe's Hash-based Message Authentication Code (HMAC) signature method. We'll walk through setting up a secret key, building the signing string for verification with FreeMarker, and updating your endpoint to ensure only authentic notifications are accepted.
Title: Configuring Notification Authentication in Open Payment Framework

LSC_product_category: CRM and Customer Experience,CRM and Customer Experience
Description: Variables are essential for building dynamic and adaptable configurations, and they are stored securely using encryption. In this video, you'll learn how to create and leverage variables in OPF to build dynamic and secure configurations.
Title: Managing Variables in Open Payment Framework for SAP Commerce Cloud

Description: Explore step-by-step videos guiding you through setting up, configuring, testing, and managing payment integrations, notifications, and authentication features within SAP Commerce Cloud using Open Payment Framework.

Description: SAP Cell and Gene Therapy Orchestration is a specialized cloud tool created by SAP specifically for the Life Science industry. It's designed to cater to companies dealing with cell and gene therapy products. That course is built upon the content provided in SAP Help Portal for SAP Cell and Gene Therapy Orchestration to create a more user-friendly guide and source of knowledge. We've added context and explanations to make the information easier to digest, even if you're not an expert in all things, buckle up and get ready to dive into the fascinating world of SAP Cell and Gene Therapy Orchestration!
Title: Exploring the Foundations of SAP Cell and Gene Therapy Orchestration
Learning_objectives:
This course will prepare you to: 

  • Outline how SAP Cell and Gene Therapy Orchestration integrates into your system landscape
  • Appreciate which business processes are supported and which business scenarios are the key focus of SAP Cell and Gene Therapy Orchestration
  • Execute key processes using SAP Cell and Gene Therapy Orchestration

Description: This course guides you through the intricate landscape of SAP Intelligent Clinical Supply Management. This advanced solution is designed to streamline and simplify the management of clinical supplies in the pharmaceutical and life sciences industries. In this course, you will explore the architecture of SAP Intelligent Clinical Supply Management, delve into its product components, master data setup, and configuration possibilities. You will also gain insights into integration aspects with other solutions, empowering you with the knowledge needed to optimize the clinical supply chain efficiently.
Title: Configuring SAP Intelligent Clinical Supply Management
Learning_objectives:
• Explain the SAP Intelligent Clinical Supply Management architecture and product components.
  • Describe the integration aspects of SAP Intelligent Clinical Supply Management with other solutions.
  • Set up and manage master data, including the creation of the three main material types.
  • Analyze and apply different configuration possibilities within SAP Intelligent Clinical Supply Management to meet specific business needs.

Description: This learning journey takes you through the comprehensive world of SAP Intelligent Clinical Supply Management. This innovative cloud solution is designed to streamline clinical supply processes, enhancing the management capabilities for various roles including administrators, trial managers, supply coordinators, and more. This learning journey equips you with the knowledge to understand the solution's foundational modules, business scenarios, and where to find additional resources, thereby optimizing clinical supply operations for your organization.
Learning_objectives:
• Discover the solution modules and business capabilities of SAP Intelligent Clinical Supply Management.
  • Describe the feature scope of SAP Intelligent Clinical Supply Management.
  • Explain business scenarios relevant to various roles including administrators, trial managers, supply coordinators, customer service representatives, supply chain planners, and warehouse clerks.
  • Understand technical terms through the provided glossary.
  • Experience the discussed business scenarios through a simulated demo environment.
  • Locate and utilize additional resources for further learning.
Title: Introducing SAP Intelligent Clinical Supply Management

Description: This learning journey helps to understand how to enable enterprises to efficiently manage governance, risk, and compliance (GRC) needs, and streamline compliance management and internal control processes using advanced features and functionalities of SAP Process Control.

Deep dives into the intricacies of control evaluations and discover the power of continuous control monitoring. Additionally, it explains the potential of standard reporting functionality to enhance your compliance and operational efficiency.

LSC_product: SAP Business ByDesign,SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition
Description:
Welcome to the first chapter of the microlearning series on the technical data migration from SAP Business ByDesign to SAP S/4HANA Cloud. In this series, we will provide a detailed overview of the motivation, approach, tools, and architecture involved in this migration process.

In this initial session, we'll delve into the fundamentals of the migration process, including the rationale behind it, the recommended approach by SAP, and the tools and accelerators utilized to streamline the migration. Specifically, we'll explore the Extract, Transform, Load approach advocated by SAP and the use of standard tools such as iFlows to facilitate a smooth transition.
Title: Overseeing the Transition from SAP Business ByDesign to SAP S/4HANA Cloud​  ​

LSC_product: SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition,SAP Business ByDesign
Description:
This is the second chapter of the microlearning series on the technical data migration from SAP Business ByDesign to SAP S/4HANA Cloud.

This video includes steps such as configuring SAP BTP, extracting data from SAP ByD, downloading iflows, and preparing an application for HTTPS requests. These steps provide essential insights for a successful data migration process.
Title: Preparing for Data Migration from SAP Business ByDesign to SAP S/4HANA Cloud

LSC_product: SAP Business ByDesign,SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition
Description:
This is the third chapter of the microlearning series on the Technical Data Migration from SAP Business ByDesign to SAP S/4HANA Cloud.

In this microlearning, you will explore the technical process of migrating data from SAP Business By Design to SAP S/4HANA Cloud. You'll discover how standardized flows, utilized through iflows and integration suite systems, can effectively facilitate data transformation, accelerating the migration process.
Title: Consuming Iflows for the Data Migration from SAP Business ByDesign to SAP S/4HANA Cloud

LSC_product: SAP Business ByDesign,SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition
Description:
This is the fourth chapter of the microlearning series on the Technical Data Migration from SAP Business ByDesign to SAP S/4HANA Cloud.

The video focuses on customizing standard mappings within iflows using the message mapping component, enabling efficient data transformation tailored to specific business requirements.
Title: Customizing Standard Iflows for the Data Migration from SAP Business ByDesign to SAP S/4HANA Cloud

LSC_product: SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition,SAP Business ByDesign
Description:
This is the fifth chapter of the microlearning series on the Technical Data Migration from SAP Business ByDesign to SAP S/4HANA Cloud. 

In this video, you will learn how to update data migration workflows with new data structures in SAP Integration Suite. The video provides a step-by-step guide on updating iflows with the latest data templates from the migration cockpit and demonstrating the process using a customer iflow as an example.
Title: Updating Data Structure in Iflows for the Data Migration from SAP Business ByDesign to SAP S/4HANA Cloud

LSC_product: SAP Business ByDesign,SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition
Description:
This is the sixth chapter of the microlearning series on the Technical Data Migration from SAP Business ByDesign to SAP S/4HANA Cloud.

Learn how to enhance your iflow to generate CSV output instead of XML in this micro learning session on technical data migration from SAP Business By Design to SAP S/4HANA Cloud. Explore the benefits of using CSV format for high data volumes and reduce file size and upload time in the SAP S/4HANA Migration Cockpit.
Title: Generating CSV Data Load for the Migration from SAP Busines ByDesign to SAP S/HANA Cloud

LSC_product: SAP Business ByDesign,SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition
Description:
This is the seventh chapter of the microlearning series on the Technical Data Migration from SAP Business ByDesign to SAP S/4HANA Cloud.
The session covers the setup and connection of On-Premise and Cloud SFTP servers, the enhancement of iflows, and the testing of automated data processing. Gain insights into the process and look forward to learning how to create your own iflow in future sessions.
Title: Automating Data Processing in Iflows for the Data Migration from SAP Business ByDesign to SAP S/4HANA Cloud

LSC_product: SAP S/4HANA Cloud,SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition,SAP Business ByDesign
Description:
This is the eighth chapter of the microlearning series on the Technical Data Migration from SAP Business ByDesign to SAP S/4HANA Cloud.

The session focuses on demonstrating how to create your own iflow for data migration. Sai Srinath walks you through the process of creating a new iflow using an existing one as a template, and provides step-by-step instructions on how to set up the new iflow for data migration.
Title: Creating Iflow for the Data Migration from SAP Business ByDesign to SAP S/4HANA Cloud
LSC_product_subcategory: Enterprise Resource Planning,Enterprise Resource Planning,Enterprise Resource Planning

Description: This ninth chapter in the video series on Technical Data Migration from SAP Business ByDesign to SAP S/4HANA Cloud provides practical insights into handling data load processes within the migration cockpit. It demonstrates how to monitor migration progress, interpret detailed logs and messages, and ensure data consistency. The chapter also highlights useful tips for troubleshooting and validating the migration results effectively.
Title: Updating Iflows to Fit with SAP S/4HANA Cloud Version for Data Migration from SAP Business ByDesign to SAP S/4HANA Cloud

Description:
This is the tenth chapter of the microlearning series on the Technical Data Migration from SAP Business ByDesign to SAP S/4HANA Cloud.

In this video, we explore key concepts and step-by-step instructions for using the SAP S/4HANA Migration Cockpit to facilitate seamless data migration from SAP Business ByDesign to SAP S/4HANA Cloud. You'll learn how to prepare your data, run simulations to preempt potential issues, and ensure a smooth transition by leveraging expert strategies and best practices. Whether you're a project lead or new to SAP systems, this comprehensive guide will equip you with the essential tools to optimize your migration process effectively.
Title: Uploading Data Using Migration Cockpit for Data Migration from SAP Business ByDesign to SAP S/4HANA Cloud

Description:
This is the eleventh chapter of the microlearning Playlist of the Technical Data Migration from SAP Business ByDesign to SAP S/4HANA Cloud.

The video focuses on how to consume standard Iflows from the SAP Business Accelerator Hub, providing an overview and system demo to support seamless integration during the migration process.
Title: Consuming Iflows from SAP Business Accelerator Hub for Data Migration from SAP Business ByDesign to  SAP S/4HANA Cloud

LSC_product: SAP Business ByDesign,SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition
Description: Get a complete understanding of end to end process of migrating data from SAP Business ByDesign to SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud along with the tools and accelerators and system requirements. Title: Migrating Data from SAP Business ByDesign to SAP S/4HANA Cloud

Description: This learning journey will introduce you to the functions and customizing settings of pricing within SAP S/4HANA Sales.
Title: Configuring Pricing in SAP S/4HANA Sales
Learning_objectives:
At the end of this learning journey, application consultants and business users will be able to customize and use pricing for SAP S/4HANA Sales, ensuring efficiency and accuracy in sales pricing mechanisms.

Participants will be able to  maintain condition records, will learn to exploit special pricing functions and condition types, including tax determination, and to analyze and adapt the configuration of pricing in their own SAP S/4HANA system.

They will also learn about other related topics like managing condition contracts effectively.

Description: In this learning journey, you can learn the basic configuration settings for billing documents in SAP S/4HANA. Different variants and ways of creating billing documents are also discussed. As well as special processes like working with down payments and installment payments.
Title: Configuring Billing in SAP S/4HANA Sales
Learning_objectives:
This learning journey will prepare you to:

  • Configure organizational units for billing
  • Configure billing types
  • Use special billing types
  • Configure the data flow for billing
  • Create billing documents in various ways
  • Configure account determination
  • Configure the interface between Sales and Distribution and Financial Accounting

LSC_product_category: CRM and Customer Experience,CRM and Customer Experience
Description: In this video, we will guide you through the process of configuring capture settings in OPF Workbench. Building on our previous setup of authorizing funds at checkout, we will demonstrate how to map the API call for payment capture, utilizing Stripe's payment intent. You’ll learn how to adjust the API request, incorporate authentication, and set the necessary parameters while ensuring your configuration is future-proof by replacing hardcoded endpoints.
Title: Configuring Capture Settings in Open Payment Framework

Description: This learning journey is designed for integration designers and developers with responsibilities for building business processes and integration scenarios with SAP Process Orchestration.
Title: Developing Business Processes with SAP Process Orchestration
Learning_objectives: After completing this learning journey, developers will be able to create business processes and integration scenarios using the required tools. You will understand how to work with SAP NetWeaver Developer Studio, to create iFlows and business processes and connect iFlows with your business processes.

LSC_product: SAP S/4HANA Cloud,SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition
Description: This learning journey will introduce you to the core features and activities for RISE with SAP S/4HANA Cloud, private edition, premium plus implementation and adoption.
Title: Discovering RISE with SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition, premium plus Implementation including Supplier Portal
Learning_objectives: After completing this learning journey, you will be equipped to drive and implement RISE with SAP S/4HANA Cloud, private edition, premium plus by applying the knowledge learned about integration between S/4HANA and SAP Business Network, buyer account management, transaction rules, and Trading Partner enablement.

Description: This learning journey focuses on the fundamental knowledge required to implement SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition in both system conversion and new implementation scenarios.
Title: Implementing SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition
Learning_objectives:
After completing this learning journey, you will be able to explain and execute core implementation project tasks to deploy, adopt, and extend SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition. This includes:

  • Building the implementation team, defining system landscapes, setting up systems for implementation, creating users and defining authorizations.
  • Gathering data in fit-to-standard workshops, validating and configuring business processes.
  • Working with the SAP Fiori Launchpad, applying extensibility tools and concepts, setting up integration scenarios, migrating data, and testing configured processes with automation.

LSC_product: SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition,SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition
Description: This learning journey enables learners to execute basic enterprise resource management (ERP) processes with SAP S/4HANA.
Title: Executing Basic ERP Processes with SAP S/4HANA
Learning_objectives: After completing this learning journey, you will be able to perform basic business processes in SAP S/4HANA for procure-to-pay, plan-to-produce, and order-to-cash.

Title: SAP S/4HANA Product Engineering Essentials

LSC_product: SAP S/4HANA,SAP Cloud for Customer integration with SAP ERP,SAP Cloud for Customer core applications,Cloud Integration
LSC_product_category: Enterprise Management,CRM and Customer Experience,CRM and Customer Experience,Business Technology Platform
Description: This learning journey will guide you through the process of integrating SAP Sales Cloud and SAP Service Cloud with SAP S/4HANA.
Title: Integrating SAP Sales Cloud and SAP Service Cloud with SAP S/4HANA
Learning_objectives: After completing this learning journey, architects and consultants will gain an overview of the fundamental technical aspects, architecture, and scenarios for the integration between SAP Sales Cloud, SAP Service Cloud, and SAP S/4HANA. You will be able to develop end-to-end integration between these systems based on an understanding of the master data replication procedure, the monitoring and troubleshooting techniques, and the transactional data integration process.
LSC_product_subcategory: Enterprise Resource Planning,Sales,Sales,Application Development and Automation

Description: This learning journey introduces you to typical tasks and foundational skills for various SAP Commerce Cloud business user interfaces.
Title: Understanding the Purpose of SAP Commerce Cloud, its Components and User Roles​
Learning_objectives: By the end of this training, Business Users and Consultants will be able to describe the purpose and basic elements of SAP Commerce Cloud. They will learn how key tasks are the responsibility of certain employee roles, and how these employees leverage the platform's powerful user interfaces to enhance the customer experience and increase sales.

Description: In this comprehensive course, participants will have the opportunity to delve deep into the configurations in  SAP Sales Cloud Version 2. Whether they are new administrators, functional consultants, or individuals seeking to learn how to use the solution, this course will be an essential guide. Features explained here include configuring basic features like lead, opportunities, quotes, orders, visits and other processes like configuring sales workflows, integrating MS teams, learning about ML and AI configurations and configuring the mobile application.
Title: Configuring SAP Sales Cloud Version 2
Learning_objectives:
• Exploring and Administrator's daily workflow
  • Configuring  Leads, Opportunities, Quotes, Sales Orders ,Visits and more
  • Configuring Sales Workflows and operations
  • Configuring MS trams integration and relationship intelligence
  • Configuring ML and AI features
  • Configuring the mobile application

Description: The course in this learning journey enables you to explain and demonstrate how to use and implement SAP Service Cloud Version 2 which is built using Cloud Native Stack. The course walks you through how the Administrator role can leverage the SAP Service Cloud Version 2 capabilities to both improve and scale up the service experience that a company can provide its customers. This perspective of the administrator role is also important for all other roles new to the solution, such as the business user, the solution consultant and the developer.
Title: Implementing and Using SAP Service Cloud Version 2
Learning_objectives:
After completing this course, you will be able to:

  • Make the case for SAP Service Cloud Version 2
  • Follow a day in the life of the service employee
  • Start the implementation
  • Perform master data setup
  • Create service objects
  • Set up case management
  • Configure service elements
  • Configure communication channels
  • Overview how SAP Service Cloud Version 2 can be integrated into the broader, SAP Cloud for Customer ecosystem

LSC_product: SAP Customer Data Platform,SAP Business Data Cloud
LSC_product_category: CRM and Customer Experience,Business Technology Platform
Description: This learning journey will guide you through the foundations of SAP Customer Data Platform and help you evaluate the functionalities for your implementation scenarios.
Title: Exploring SAP Customer Data Platform Essentials
Learning_objectives:
After completing this learning, you will be able to:

  • Define customer data and customer data platform.
  • Navigate the console to successfully configure SAP Customer Data Platform's functionalities.
  • Recognize and relate the four-step process: Data Ingestion, Identity Resolution, Insights, and Engagement and how this process helps to understand the customer.
  • Identify and outline the structure of a Customer Schema concept to create a new attribute in Profile Entity, followed by the creation of a new Activity with attributes.
  • Examine and determine how to integrate source and destination applications, using the repository of applications and platforms in the Application Library.
  • Configure events setup.
  • Configure matching and merging rules.
  • Create data insights to calculate metrics and classify customers.
  • Execute engagement and activation.
  • Design and implement CX Journeys and Flows.

Description: The course in this learning journey is targeted at the Integration Developer or Consultant role. The course enables you to explain and demonstrate how to implement an integration of SAP Commerce Cloud with a company's existing SAP ERP Cloud (SAP S/4HANA Cloud) backend, so that the company's customers can then browse, compare, and order products online, on the store front, with the resulting orders sent to the ERP backend automatically.
Title: Implement an Integration of SAP S/4HANA Cloud with SAP Commerce Cloud
Learning_objectives: After completing this learning journey, architects and consultants will be able to setup, configure and implement the integration between SAP Sales Cloud, SAP Service Cloud, and SAP S/4HANA using the Cloud Integration feature of SAP Integration Suite.

LSC_product: SAP S/4HANA Cloud,SAP Commerce Cloud,Cloud Integration
LSC_product_category: Enterprise Management,CRM and Customer Experience,Business Technology Platform
Description:
This learning journey aims to provide a comprehensive understanding of integrating SAP Commerce Cloud with SAP S/4HANA Cloud. You will explore the benefits and use cases of this integration, learn about various integration methods, and understand why Integration APIs and SAP Cloud Integration are preferred.

Additionally, you will receive a detailed outline of the integration scope and setup processes for each included solution. By completing this journey, you will be well-equipped to articulate the value and methods of these integrations, driving business efficiency and strategic goals.
Title: Discovering the Foundations of SAP Commerce Cloud and SAP S/4HANA Cloud Integrations
Learning_objectives:
After completing this learning journey, you’ll be able to:

  • Demonstrate a comprehensive understanding of the benefits, use cases, and common processes for integrating SAP Commerce Cloud with SAP S/4HANA Cloud.
  • Articulate the various methods available for integration and explain why utilizing Integration APIs and SAP Cloud Integration are the preferred methods.
  • Outline the comprehensive integration scope and describe the setup process for each included solution.
LSC_product_subcategory: Enterprise Resource Planning,Commerce,Application Development and Automation

Description: In this learning journey you will learn about the key features and benefits of SAP Marketing Cloud.
Title: Uncover Key Features and Benefits of SAP Marketing Cloud
Learning_objectives: After completing this learning journey, consultants, administrators, and business users will be able to describe the structure and benefits of SAP Marketing Cloud and the underlying data model, including extensibility, segmentation, and scoring capabilities. You will understand how to then use these key marketing features to target customers and build account relationships.

LSC_product: SAP Cloud for Customer core applications
Description: This learning journey will guide you through the development process and techniques for extending the SAP Sales Cloud and SAP Service Cloud using SAP Cloud Applications Studio.
Title: Extending SAP Sales and Service Cloud with SAP Cloud Applications Studio
Learning_objectives: After completing this learning journey, consultants and developers will understand how to develop their own solutions for SAP Sales and Service Cloud using new custom business objects, screens and/or extending the standard content repository using SAP Cloud Applications Studio.

LSC_product: SAP Cloud for Customer core applications
Description: The course in this learning journey is an introduction to SAP Service Cloud. It walks you through how it works, as if you were a business user (a service agent and a technician) using the solution on your first day on the job
Title: Using SAP Service Cloud
Learning_objectives:
In this course you will be able to:

  • Identify a use case and the features and processes
  • Navigate and personalize the user interface
  • Name the steps of the customer service and field service processes
  • Manage Customer interaction for the communication channels e-mail and phone
  • Explain the use of work distribution rules and service level agreements
  • Explain the use of maintenance plans to support the service process
  • Perform the daily tasks of a service agent and a technician including processing service tickets
  • Identify key built in reports

Description: In this video, you can explore the growing similarities and unique differences between B2B and B2C e-commerce experiences. Discover how features like personalized storefronts and seamless purchasing are now essential in both worlds, while factors such as complex pricing, account access, and dedicated sales support set B2B apart. Learn why platforms like SAP Commerce Cloud are designed to address these specific needs and help businesses succeed in both markets.
Title: Comparing E-Commerce in SAP Commerce Cloud for B2B and B2C

Description: This learning journey will guide you through the fundamental technical aspects of SAP Commerce Cloud.
Title: Exploring the Technical Essentials of SAP Commerce Cloud
Learning_objectives: After completing this learning journey, you will understand the fundamental technical aspects of SAP Commerce Cloud and be able to provide configuration into SAP Commerce Cloud. You will also be able to develop and code the basic modules of SAP Commerce Cloud.

Description: This learning journey will guide you through the essential features needed, as a developer, to complete your understanding of SAP Commerce Cloud capabilities.
Title: Mastering the Technical Essentials of SAP Commerce Cloud
Learning_objectives: After completing this learning journey, consultants and developers will be able to configure and extend advanced key features of SAP Commerce Cloud solution, such as the storefront, promotions & coupons, searching and web services.

Description: This learning journey will provide you with the proficiency-based knowledge required to help you plan new implementations of SAP Commerce Cloud.
Title: Expanding upon Technical Essentials of SAP Commerce Cloud
Learning_objectives: After completing this learning journey, consultants and developers will understand how to deploy their solutions to the cloud and how to configure and customize some of the essential parts of SAP Commerce Cloud.

Description: This learning journey will guide learners in building a bridge from theoretical knowledge to real-life business know-how focusing on end-to-end processes in SAP's intelligent suite.
Title: Discovering End-to-End Business Processes for the Intelligent Enterprise
Learning_objectives: After completing this learning journey, learners will be able to describe the fundamental aspects of the SAP Intelligent Enterprise strategy. You will be able to identify how SAP Business Technology Platform has redefined enterprise business and explain key end-to-end business processes in Accounting, Human Resources, Purchasing, Production, and Sales, and Service based on business examples of a sample company. You will also have gained an overview of the integration points between the different departments and the various SAP solutions.

Through a detailed walkthrough, we illustrate the process of performing a direct merge between existing customer profiles and incoming data, specifically updating the profile of John White with new data while maintaining consistent identity resolution using email identifiers.
Title: Configuring Identity Resolution Using Matching and Merge Rules in SAP CDP

Description: This learning journey introduces you to how SAP Responsible Design and Production helps you meet packaging compliance requirements for plastics.
Title: Administering and Using Responsible Design and Production for the Circular Economy
Learning_objectives: After completing this learning journey, administrators, consultants, and business users will understand the principles of the circular economy and how to incorporate them in circular business models. You will discover the role that technology plays in enabling circular business models and the capabilities of SAP's Circular Economy solution, SAP Responsible Design and Production. You will also explore how to track packaging elements and the composition of recycled plastics and create extended producer responsibility (EPR) reports in SAP Responsible Design and Production.
