Description:
This course provides a comprehensive description of the Quote-to-Cash process utilizing SAP CPQ and SAP Billing and Revenue Innovation Management (BRIM). The integrated suite offers an end-to-end flow for:

  • Configuring products and prices
  • Creating quotes and contracts
  • Managing rating, billing, and invoicing of subscription and usage-based revenue streams
  • Handling financial contract accounting and revenue accounting processes for high-volume business models

The training gives a deep drive about SAP CPQ, SAP Subscription Order Management, SAP Convergent Mediation, SAP Convergent Charging, SAP Convergent Invoicing, SAP Financial Contract Accounting and SAP Revenue Accounting and Reporting.

The focus of the training is on the integration of the SAP components across the end-to-end business process.

The course is designed for consultants and solution architects.
Title: Discovering the capabilities of SAP Solutions for Quote-to-Cash Management private cloud (BRIM) for Solution Architects
Learning_objectives:
After completing this lesson, you should be able to:

  • Get an overview about subscription and usage-based business model 
  • Know how SAP CPQ supports Quotation process with BRIM Integration
  • Understand the integration of the relevant SAP master data objects: Quote, Business Partner, Contract Account, Product, Solution Quotation
  • Understand Master Agreement process
  • Provide  an overview of the integration of Convergent Mediation
  • Determine the role of convergent charging in complex price modelling.
  • Understand process of Consumption Items in rating, billing and invoicing
  • Outline the document life cycle of an FI-CA document 
  • Understand how Revenue Accounting and Reporting is integrated in system landscape of BRIM

The course provides an overview of the features of SAP Convergent Charging for subscription and consumption management, in the context of the SAP Billing and Revenue Innovation Management (BRIM) solution.

In this training you will learn how to design and implement price models for subscription and consumption products.

How to model usage fees and recurring fees with logical components, model allowances and bring the design objects together in charge plans and allowance plans, is covered as well.

In addition, the integration of SAP Convergent Charging with SAP Convergent Invoicing and SAP Subscription Order Management will be explained in an architecture overview.
Title: Implementing SAP Convergent Charging
Learning_objectives:
After completing this intermediate level learning journey, consultants will be able to explain the major functional features of SAP Convergent Charging.

You will understand technical concepts of the solution, starting from its overall technical architecture up to the positioning of the module with the larger SAP BRIM (Billing and Revenue Innovation Management) solution.

Also you will learn how to configure SAP Convergent Charging for typical rating/pricing and charging scenarios and undertake other potential implementation activities such as designing and modelling business cases and integration with other SAP modules of the SAP BRIM solution.

Description: This course provides a comprehensive overview of in-house production processes using SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition. It covers all key stages, from the initial creation of requirements to the receipt of the finished product. The curriculum is designed to illuminate the essential steps and options in production planning and manufacturing execution. Participants will learn about various planning strategies such as make-to-stock and make-to-order production, which cater to products with differing demand patterns and production complexities. Additionally, the course delves into different types of manufacturing execution controls, including discrete manufacturing with production orders, process manufacturing with process orders, and repetitive manufacturing with planned orders, offering a complete understanding of modern manufacturing processes and strategies. The course also covers critical aspects of Kanban and capacity planning, providing participants with a comprehensive skill set for managing modern manufacturing environments.
Title: Implementing SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition for Manufacturing
Learning_objectives: After completing this learning journey, you will be able to carry out the end-to-end processes in production planning, capacity planning, production order execution, process order execution, repetitive manufacturing and Kanban. This includes maintaining the relevant master data, creating production requirements, carrying out requirements planning and performing the various steps in production.

Description: Learn how SAP Cloud ALM, as part of SAP's transformation approach, supports the entire solution transformation journey—from business and solution transformation methodology to agile implementation and efficient operations.
Title: Transforming for Success: Solution Transformation with SAP Cloud ALM
Learning_objectives: This learning journey aims to equip SAP professionals, project managers, IT specialists, and business process experts with the skills to leverage SAP Cloud ALM for comprehensive solution transformation. Participants will gain an overview of SAP's business transformation strategy, exploring an integrated tool chain and the journey from agile implementation to efficient operations. They will obtain hands-on experience in project planning, task management, solution documentation, test orchestration, and deployment using SAP Cloud ALM. Recapping their learnings, participants will get to know how SAP Cloud ALM supports the RISE with SAP methodology. Additionally, they will understand SAP’s transition strategy from SAP Solution Manager to SAP Cloud ALM.

It is particularly suited for individuals aspiring to advance their careers by taking on strategic, high-level roles in cloud-based project delivery and enterprise integration.

Within this Learning Journey, SAP project managers can deepen their expertise of managing SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition implementations, specifically focusing on SAP tools, methodologies, and SAP Business Suite portfolio.

This Learning Journey will lead to the certification "Managing SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition Projects", which includes courses on the following subjects:

1) Exploring SAP Activate - Implementation Tools and Methodology

2) Implementing SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition

3) Discovering Organizational Change Management for SAP Cloud Projects

4) Introducing the RISE with SAP Methodology for SAP Partners and Customers

Description:
​​This course will guide you through the Make-to-Stock production process for production and process orders from a Production Accounting perspective.  

​It covers the creation of master data, performing logistics and production steps leading to production costs, Work In Progress (WIP), and variances, including their analysis. Additionally, the course will address the reprocessing of posting errors.​
Title: Detailing Production Accounting by Order

Suitable for consultants and key business users, this course will enable you to effectively employ SAP S/4HANA Cloud for streamlining production accounting processes, thus enhancing your operational efficiency.
Title: Detailing Production Accounting by Period

Description: This course will guide learners through the Make-to-Order production process for production orders from a Production Accounting perspective in SAP S/4HANA Cloud. This comprises the creation of a sales order, the creation of a corresponding production order, the production order's use as a cost object as well as delivering and billing. Additionally, for the latter steps event-based analysis is included.
Title: Detailing Production Accounting by Order in Sales-Order-Related Production

Description: This learning journey will explain how to distribute Scope 1, 2 and 3 emissions to products using different methods. You will learn how to use the energy flow model and planned consumption rates to distribute scope 1 and 2 emissions, and how to apply further allocation schemes for scope 3 emissions.

Learning_objectives: Calculate and allocate Scope 1, 2, and 3 emissions from business activities, energy flows, and resources to manufactured products using specified models and production documents.

Description: This learning journey will explain how to integrate SAP Sustainability Footprint Management with ERP systems to calculate and report corporate carbon footprints. It explains advanced configuration, such as energy flow model, AI-based emission factor mapping, supplier emission data, waste and sold products footprints.

Learning_objectives: After completing this learning journey, learners will be able to use the advanced configuration concepts to calculate corporate carbon footprints and analyse hotspots to identify decarbonization levers.

Title: Provisioning and Administering Databases in SAP HANA Cloud

Description:
SAP Analytics Cloud Planning Technical Academy workshops present an overview of the SAP Analytics Cloud Planning and then utilize the most used features to solve common business-related questions. ​
Create a planning model to start using the various features of planning, get a glimpse of building visualisations and smart insights.​
Perform allocation of indirect expense, run machine learning algorithms to get better visibility on forecasts.​
Calculate rebates using data action, experience what if analysis using Value driver trees and collaborate with other Planning users.​
In this hands-on exercise, you will first gain an overview of SAP Analytics Cloud Planning and then utilize many of its most-used features to solve common business-related questions. ​
During the exercise, you will use SAP Analytics Cloud Planning to work on several typical business scenarios to increase engagement and accuracy when creating plans and budgets in different lines of business.​
Optimize planning by fully integrating strategy, finance, and expense into one consolidated solution to improve alignment and performance and maintain the integrity of each function to have an end-to-end view to confidently drive decision with one source of truth.​
Collaborate in real-time by breaking down data silos, unifying plans, and aligning processes.​
Title: Introduction to SAP Analytics Cloud Planning

Description: This course introduces you to the Joule Agent Discovery Workshop, a structured and collaborative method to identify high-value agentic use cases in your organization. You’ll learn how to inspire and guide participants, prioritize ideas, and describe the selected opportunities in detail. We’ll also cover how to adapt the workshop to different timeframes, team sizes, and virtual settings. By the end, you’ll be ready to run this workshop confidently, identify where AI agents can make the biggest impact, and lay the groundwork for your agentic journey.
Title: Discovering High-Value Opportunities for Agentic AI
Learning_objectives:
After completing this course, learners will be able to: 

  • Understand the purpose and structure of the Joule Agent Discovery Workshop and how it can be used to identify high-value agentic use cases. 
  • Facilitate the workshop exercises, guiding participants from idea generation to prioritization and a detailed description of agentic use cases.  
  • Adapt the workshop format to different team sizes, virtual environments, and timeframes to fit your organizational needs.

Description: SAP HANA Cloud embeds several machine learning libraries, designed and optimized for massive parallel in-memory processing. With the embedded machine learning in SAP HANA Cloud, it is possible to build comprehensive multi-model, in-database applications. You can develop embedded machine learning scenarios using trending ML (Machine Learning) algorithms processed with SAP HANA in-memory performance.

Description: Gain insight into environmental compliance and emission management processes within the SAP EHS Management, environment management module.  The learner will be able to successfully create and manage location data, compliance requirements, and compliance scenarios.
Title: Discovering SAP EHS Management, environment management
Learning_objectives:
• Explore the regulatory and permit compliance process.  
  • Explore the emission management process.  
  • Comprehend the Master Data Concept and the Master Data Creation in SAP EHS Management, environment management
  • Identify the creation process of compliance requirements. 
  • Create compliance requirements, environmental limits, regulatory lists, and equations. 
  • Create and setup the data collection process.  
  • Create and setup sampling, calculations, and location-aggregations.

Description: Welcome to a new era of Data Transformation! This Learning Journey introduces you to the SAP Business Transformation Center, a cloud-based SaaS solution designed to streamline and optimize data transformation projects. Fully integrated with SAP Cloud ALM and powered by the SAP Business Technology Platform, it supports organizations in their journey toward digital modernization. Develop a comprehensive understanding of the Lean Selective Data Transition to SAP S/4HANA approach and its benefits using SAP Business Transformation Center. Learn which prerequisites are necessary and finally, gain insights into scoping, modeling, cycle and monitoring phase of a Lean Selective Data Transition to SAP S/4HANA with SAP Business Transformation.
Title: Unlocking Change with SAP Business Transformation Center
Learning_objectives: After completing this learning journey, you will be able to evaluate the benefits of SAP Business Transformation Center for planning, analyzing and executing a Lean Selective Data Transition Project. You can define the necessary prerequisites and preparations steps that are needed to use SAP Business Transformation Center. In addition, you learn how to use SAP Business Transformation Center in the scoping, modeling, cycle and monitoring phase of a Lean Selective Data Transition to SAP S/4HANA.

LSC_product: SAP Environment, Health, and Safety Management,SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition, EHS environment management
Description: Learn how to configure and manage emission management processes within SAP EHS, including setting up master data, monitoring and tracking emission data, and ensuring compliance with environmental regulations and standards. Additionally, gain the skills to integrate SAP EHS Management, environment management data with SAP Reporting and Analytics solutions, such as SAP Analytics Cloud and SAP Sustainability Control Tower.
Title: Configuring, Managing, and Preparing Master Data for Reporting in SAP EHS Management, environment management
Learning_objectives:
• Comprehend the Emission Management Process in depth. 
  • Integrate SAP EHS Management, environment management with Reporting and Analytics Solutions. 
  • Prepare and Manage Master Data.

Description: SAP Integration Suite is an industry-leading and enterprise-grade integration platform-as-a-service that helps businesses seamlessly connect and integrate their applications, data, and processes within their organization and beyond. Description: This course is designed to equip participants with the skills necessary to effectively manage and administer SAP's Profitability and Performance Management Cloud using the Universal Model. This training provides a comprehensive understanding of the subscription process, role management, team restrictions, authorization, event logs, connection setups, and administration applications within the SAP Business Technology Platform. Participants will learn to navigate the complexities of SAP PaPM Cloud, ensuring efficient data management, security, and performance optimization.

Learning_objectives:
• Understand the subscription process and activation of the Universal Model in SAP Business Technology Platform.
  • Manage SAP Business Technology Platform roles and restrict application access based on client needs.
  • Set up and manage connections, including HANA, OData, SAC, and cross-environment connections.

You will create a sales order process, build an app, design a digital workspace, and more.

Trial - SAC SAP.com 
Use JustAsk to ask for charts in a natural language.  The charts can then be added to a story in SAP Analytics Cloud.

Description: This learning journey will guide developers, architects and consultants through the process of building and enhancing an application based on SAP Fiori elements, using SAP Fiori tools and the SAP Cloud Application Programming Model (CAP).
Title: Developing an SAP Fiori Elements App Based on a CAP OData V4 Service
Learning_objectives:
After completing this Learning Journey, developers will learn all about the key advantages of using SAP Fiori elements and experience the latest and greatest features available with SAP Fiori tools.
SAP Business Application Studio serves as the development environment where our exercises provide hands-on experience in creating your data model and OData service with CAP.
Step-by-step instructions show you how to configure advanced features in the list report and object page templates, such as adding micro charts to a table or to the object page header, or implementing application-specific actions. Other features that are developed during the training are multiple table views, side effects, and external navigation - to name only a few. the learner will get to know the benefits of using the flexible programming model if you need to extend your SAP Fiori elements application with some custom code.

Description: This learning journey will provide beginners with the basic ABAP programming knowledge to develop in on-premise and cloud system environments.
Title: Learning the Basics of ABAP Programming on SAP BTP
Learning_objectives:
After completing this learning journey, developers will be able to:

  • Create an ABAP Cloud project in ADT.
  • Implement conditional logic in a program to execute actions provided certain conditions are met.
  • Work with data types and variables to write basic ABAP code.
  • Analyze runtime errors.
  • Retrieve data from the database and use it in a program.
  • Debug an ABAP Program.

Title: Setting up an ABAP Environment on SAP BTP

After completing this learning journey on beginner level, administrators will be able to:

  • Set up an ABAP Environment in a productive SAP BTP Account

At the end of this session, you will be able to position and sell the optimal SAP Build and ABAP solutions to ensure that customers can rapidly extend their S/4HANA environment and maintain a clean core.

After completing this group, you will have your own engaging Workspace and learn how to create your own digital workplace.

SAP Business Application Studio is based on an open-source IDE – “Eclipse Theia”, which embraces the Microsoft Visual Studio Code experience. With that, you can enjoy a desktop-like experience in the cloud with terminal (CLI) access, optimized code editors, debugger, Git and local test run, providing more control over the environment
Title: Modelling Calculation View with SAP Business Application Studio

Description:
When developing user interfaces for SAP applications, you need to follow specific guidelines defined by the SAP Fiori standards.

Using the SAPUI5 framework to develop those user interfaces is not sufficient.

In this course, you’ll learn how to implement the SAP Fiori guidelines to create state of the art flexible user interfaces and provide your applications through the SAP Fiori Launchpad, implementing cross application navigation.

You’ll also learn how to extend existing SAP Fiori Applications.

  • Modify a screen and implement a screen-set in a website.

  • SAP SuccessFactors Role Based Permission Framework
  • SAP SuccessFactors General Data Protection & Regulation (GDPR)
  • SAP SuccessFactors People Analytics & Report Story
  • SAP SuccessFactors HR Lifecycle Processes

Description: Master the Why, What, and How of SAP Business Suite to confidently position SAP’s integrated solutions.

Learning_objectives:
By the end of this learning journey, you will be able to effectively position SAP Business Suite by applying SAP’s "AI-First, Suite-First" strategy, including SAP Business AI and SAP Business Data Cloud. You will develop the skills to articulate its value, conduct hands-on demonstrations, and demonstrate the impact of SAP solutions to key buying centers.

With this learning journey, you will be fully prepared to achieve certification in positioning of SAP Business Suite.

With this learning journey, you will be fully prepared to achieve certification in positioning of SAP Sustainability solutions as part of SAP Business Suite.

Description: In an era of accelerated innovation, SAP Business AI represents a powerful catalyst for delivering exceptional value to customers. However, realizing this value requires a clear and structured approach to adoption. This course introduces the SAP AI Adoption Framework, a comprehensive approach designed to streamline and scale customer adoption of AI solutions.

Description: This video introduces the basics of the SAP Emarsys Customer Engagement Platform and the key terminology. The use case of winning back churning customers is used to introduce products and functions.
Title: Kickstarting Your Journey with SAP Emarsys Customer Engagement

Description: In this video, you’ll learn how to customize the Emarsys Home page. We cover navigating the Home page, switching between accounts, using the shell bar menu for feedback and searches, managing notifications, and customizing widgets to track important metrics. This will help you optimize your Emarsys platform experience.
Title: Introducing SAP Emarsys  Home in SAP Emarsys Customer Engagement

Description: In this video, you'll learn about key account management features in Emarsys, including managing custom fields, configuring External Events, and using the Event Monitoring tool. Additionally, we'll cover settings for Smart Insight, SMS, and Email Domain Validation, as well as setting up Single Sign-On (SSO) for secure user authentication.
Title: Introducing SAP Emarsys Management Pages in SAP Emarsys Customer Engagement

Description: In this video, we explain different ways of importing data into Emarsys, Data Management and Data Export.
Title: Managing Contact Data (Contacts - Part 1) in SAP Emarsys Customer Engagement

Description: In this video, you'll learn about Personalization and combining different types of Segments.
Title: Using Personalization and Segmentation  (Contacts - Part 2) in SAP Emarsys Customer Engagement

Description: Learn to create email campaigns using SAP Emarsys Visual Content Editor. Use block-based templates, personalize with AI tools, and optimize sending for effective communication with your audience.
Title: Creating Emails with the Visual Content Editor in SAP Emarsys

Description: In this video, we explain the Triggered Email solution and the basics of the HTML Editor in SAP Emarsys Customer Engagement.
Title: Using HTML Editor and Triggered Email in SAP Emarsys Customer Engagement

Description: This video introduces SAP Emarsys’s Automation solutions, Automation Center and Interactions, which help create omnichannel customer journeys using multiple nodes to solve marketing challenges. It demonstrates setting up an Abandoned Cart program to encourage purchases with a free shipping voucher and explains the differences between real-time Interactions and lifecycle-focused Automation Center. Additionally, it covers reporting features for monitoring and analyzing program performance.
Title: Discovering Automation Solutions in SAP Emarsys

Description: In this video, we discuss how to create and manage forms in SAP Emarsys Customer Engagement.
Title: Creating SAP Emarsys Forms in SAP Emarsys Customer Engagement

Description: In this session, we explored the tracking of Contact Registrations and Email Analytics using a post-purchase upsell campaign. We examined the Registrations page for new sign-ups and analyzed email performance metrics such as open rates, click rates, and deliverability, offering a comprehensive view of campaign effectiveness and user engagement.
Title: Analyzing Contact Registrations and Email Performance in SAP Emarsys Customer Engagement

Description: Learn how to measure and optimize your marketing campaigns with strategic analytics. Discover revenue attribution, value measurement, audience reporting, event attribution, conversion reporting, and more. Watch now!
Title: Tracking Marketing Impact with Strategic Analytics in SAP Emarsys Customer Engagement

Description: In this video, you'll get an overview of how you can manage your deliverability using the Emarsys Platform. You'll learn how to manage sender reputation and about the Deliverability Advisor.
Title: Managing Deliverability in SAP Emarsys Customer Engagement

Description: This video introduces Web Extend and Predict Data Sources, essential tools within Emarsys for 1:1 personalization. It explains how Web Extend collects visitor interaction data on your website, how Predict Data Sources helps monitor data integration health, and provides a detailed overview of various data management features and tools available in Emarsys, such as the Product Data, Web Behavior data source, and sales data management.
Title: Introducing Web Extend and Predict Data Sources in SAP Emarsys Customer Engagement

Description: Begin your SAP Emarsys journey with essential tools and strategies. This playlist empowers you with foundational knowledge to effectively manage campaigns and optimize marketing success.

The SAP Certified Associate - Implementation Consultant - SAP SuccessFactors Compensation certification exam verifies that the candidate possesses fundamental knowledge and skills in the area of SAP SuccessFactors Compensation. It proves that the candidate can apply the knowledge and skills in projects under the guidance of an experienced consultant. It is recommended as an entry-level qualification to allow consultants to get acquainted with the fundamentals of SAP SuccessFactors Compensation.

This certification is intended for SAP partner consultants implementing the solution. Only registered SAP partner consultants will be provided with provisioning rights once they have been certified. Customers and independent consultants, even if certified, will not be provided with provisioning rights. There are no exceptions to this policy.

  • Formulate customized approval rule workflows.
  • Adapt Guided Buying settings for optimal user experience.
  • Manage new realm configurations based on organization needs.
  • Assess and refine post-implementation administrative tasks.

Description: This learning journey provides an in-depth functional overview of the SAP S/4HANA Manufacturing for Production Engineering and Operations (PEO) solution.
Learning_objectives:
• Learners will be able to effectively set up the basic PEO processes, including creating MBOM and shop floor routing for efficient production processes and following standard procedures to ensure consistency and adherence to industry best practices.
  • Learners will demonstrate advanced proficiency in complex routing setup for unitized products, using parameter effectivity, qualifications, buyoff, and tool tracking capabilities to enrich production operations meeting industry standards.
  • Learners will possess the skills to optimize production operations and engineering changes in PEO. They will be equipped to implement process enhancements, manage major assembly projects, and drive operational efficiency within the organization.
Title: Exploring SAP S/4HANA Manufacturing for Production Engineering and Operations (PEO)

Description: This learning journey equips you with the necessary knowledge to understand our SAP Sovereign Cloud strategy and to effectively present SAP Sovereign Cloud.
Title: Explaining SAP Sovereign Cloud
Learning_objectives:
After completing this learning journey, you will be able to:

  • Explain why cloud transformation matters, how data protection and sovereignty laws are on the rise and why SAP Sovereign Cloud offerings are a good answer to these developments. 
  • Describe how SAP Sovereign Cloud connects to SAP’s purpose and communicate why we are the right partner for our customers.
  • Explain digital sovereignty, how SAP Sovereign Cloud relates to SAP’s Cloud Portfolio and our four dimensions of sovereignty.
  • Summarize key parameters influencing SAP Sovereign Cloud availability and roadmap by country.
  • Explain why SAP Sovereign Cloud offerings are defined by each sovereign’s security regulations.
  • Explain that SAP Sovereign Cloud offerings are strongly affected by geopolitical and economic considerations.
  • Explain practical information and guidelines when considering promoting SAP Sovereign Cloud to our customers.

Description:
In this learning journey, you'll learn more about the value and capabilities of SAP Cloud ALM for Operations, which consists of features, functions, and processes for operating your cloud-centric and hybrid SAP solution landscapes. 

Starting with an overview, we'll explain monitoring and analysis, as well as Business Service Management and Event Management capabilities. We'll show you how SAP Cloud ALM for Operations provides you with a central entry point to ensure transparent integrations throughout your SAP solution landscapes, and how to manage your business processes. This is to ensure business continuity, increase operational efficiency by automating operational tasks, and avoid anomalies by proactive problem prediction. 

The learning journey also gives an overview on the different integration possibilities of SAP Cloud ALM for Operations to comprise an overall ALM process.
Title: Operating with SAP Cloud ALM
Learning_objectives:
This course will enable you to:

  • Get a detailed overview on all the capabilities, features and functions of SAP Cloud ALM for Operations.
  • Understand all use cases of SAP Cloud ALM for Operations, their application purpose, and current possibilities during the application usage.
  • Get a first insight and hands-on experience by using the SAP Cloud ALM for Operations demo system.
  • Learn about general integration possibilities of SAP Cloud ALM for Operations.

Description: This Learning Journey is your one-stop guide for getting started with everything you need to know. Whether you are a seasoned Enterprise Architect or just EA-curious, you will find a wealth of SAP Reference Architecture at your fingertips. The SAP Reference Architecture can help you accelerate your Enterprise Architecture Practice. It is based on the Framework, provided by the Open Group (TOGAF) and comprises two main elements: Reference Business Architecture, including Value Flow and BPMN Diagrams and the Reference Solution Architecture, including industry specific Business Capability Maps.
Title: Exploring SAP Reference Content as Enterprise Architect

Description: Learn SAP Business AI’s value, use cases, and ethical foundation for real-world business impact.
Title: Positioning SAP Business AI
Learning_objectives: After completing this learning journey, you’ll be able to identify key challenges, explain how SAP Business AI addresses them, and present strong value propositions. You’ll learn to tailor AI messaging to different roles by focusing on their specific needs and priorities. You’ll explore Joule’s capabilities, see how Joule agents work across SAP’s ecosystem—including SAP Business Suite, Knowledge Graph, and Business Data Cloud—and how they automate workflows and enhance decisions. You’ll understand the AI Foundation as SAP’s platform for scalable AI, and SAP Business AI supports both out-of-the-box and custom deployments across RISE with SAP and non-RISE environments. Additionally, the course reviews SAP's approach to integrating AI ethics within SAP Business AI features and solutions.

Description: After completing this learning journey, you will be able to understand and utilize Joule Agents to drive business transformation, enhance decision-making, and integrate AI capabilities.

Learning_objectives: After completing this learning journey, citizen developers will be able to build advanced apps that consume SAP backend data as well as create data models to hold extended data for SAP extensions. They will also get experience with collaboration tools so that they can share and work together with their teams on SAP Build Apps projects. Finally, developers will take a deep dive into the standard SAP Build Apps tooling, including exploring the marketplace for UI controls and flow functions, building new or extending existing UI controls and flow functions, and understanding the style and layout settings to create pixel-perfect UIs.

Starting from August 28.

This course offers a concise yet comprehensive introduction to SAP Integration Suite, covering the key capabilities, the importance of a defined enterprise-wide integration strategy, and how you can leverage AI to modernize your business landscape.
Title: Modernizing Integration with SAP Integration Suite
Learning_objectives:
After completing this course, business users will be able to:

  • Define and explain the importance of a clearly defined enterprise-wide integration strategy in the digital age. Accelerate the journey to the cloud by embracing a hybrid integration approach.
  • Utilize the different capabilities of SAP Integration Suite to integrate, automate, and transform business processes across SAP and third-party landscapes. Leverage a wide variety of integration approaches, intuitive tools, and prepackaged content provided by SAP Integration Suite for faster results and increased business agility.
  • Apply the power of SAP's enterprise-grade integration platform-as-a-service (iPaaS) to modernize, innovate, and quickly transform an enterprise into an intelligent and sustainable one.

Description: This learning journey provides comprehensive knowledge on how to administer the SAP Integration Suite, covering essential tasks for administrators, the setup process, management of various capabilities within the suite, and the responsibilities that come with this role.
Learning_objectives: After completing this learning journey, you will be able to set up and administer the SAP Integration Suite with confidence. You will gain a clear understanding of what the Integration Suite is, how to plan its usage, and how to manage user roles and authorizations. You will explore the suite’s core capabilities, with deep dives into API Management, Event Mesh, and Cloud Integration. You’ll also learn how to establish secure connectivity and monitor your integration scenarios effectively.
Title: Administering SAP Integration Suite

Description:
This course focuses on Edge Integration Cell, an optional hybrid integration runtime available in SAP Integration Suite. Edge Integration Cell allows you to manage APIs and run integration scenarios within your private landscape based on Red Hat OpenShift.  

In this course, you begin your journey by exploring the latest innovations and road map of SAP Integration Suite, helping you shape a future-ready integration strategy. You’ll gain a comprehensive understanding of Edge Integration Cell, leveraging a hybrid deployment model that allows you to design integrations and APIs in the cloud and deploy them in your private environment. The course also provides valuable insights into the OpenShift Container Platform and best practices.  

By the end, you'll be fully equipped to set up, deploy, and operate Edge Integration Cell on Red Hat OpenShift with confidence.
Title: Accelerating Hybrid Integrations with SAP Integration Suite on RedHat OpenShift
Learning_objectives:
After completing this course, learners will be able to: 

  • Define a future-ready hybrid integration strategy leveraging SAP Integration Suite. 
  • Understand the Edge Integration Cell concepts leveraging a hybrid deployment model. 
  • Enhance your knowledge about the OpenShift Container Platform. 
  • Develop the skills to set up, deploy, and run an Edge Integration Cell on Red Hat OpenShift.

Description:
This course focuses on Edge Integration Cell, an optional hybrid integration runtime available in SAP Integration Suite. Edge Integration Cell allows you to manage APIs and run integration scenarios within your private landscape based on SUSE Rancher Kubernetes Engine.

In this course, you begin your journey by exploring the latest innovations and road map of SAP Integration Suite, helping you shape a future-ready integration strategy. You’ll gain a comprehensive understanding of Edge Integration Cell, leveraging a hybrid deployment model that allows you to design integrations and APIs in the cloud and deploy them in your private environment. The course also provides valuable insights into Kubernetes, the SUSE Rancher stack, and best practices.

By the end, you'll be fully equipped to set up, deploy, and operate Edge Integration Cell on SUSE Rancher Kubernetes Engine with confidence.
Title: Accelerating Hybrid Integrations with SAP Integration Suite on SUSE Rancher
Learning_objectives:
After completing this course, learners will be able to:

  • Define a future-ready hybrid integration strategy leveraging SAP Integration Suite.
  • Understand the Edge Integration Cell concepts leveraging a hybrid deployment model.
  • Enhance your knowledge about Kubernetes and the SUSE Rancher stack.
  • Develop the skills to set up, deploy, and run an Edge Integration Cell on SUSE Rancher Kubernetes Engine.

This include configuring receipt types, enabling team receiving, and managing complex scenarios such as over- and under-receiving to support efficient inventory tracking and fulfillment.
Title: SAP Ariba Procurement: Configuring Receiving

Description: In this course, you will learn the foundational steps to configure a new SAP Ariba realm from the ground up. Topics include setting up core data elements, integrating with ERP systems, customizing fields and dashboards, and preparing the realm for testing and deployment across your organization.
Title: Configuring a New Realm

Description: This Technical Academy workshop uses eMobility data harvested from multiple different charging stations, to showcase how to derive meaningful purpose from your data. This is an End-to-End (E2E) workshop, going from raw data to graphic visualizations, which aims to provide participants with in-depth understanding of SAP Data Management and Analytic Solutions in the cloud.
Title: Insight to Action with SAP BTP Cloud Solutions (E2E)

Description:
As a part of financial risk mitigation strategies, businesses need to perform Credit risk analysis to determine creditworthiness of their customers. This involves analyzing customer’s credit history, income, loan amount, age, etc. to decide on loan application approval. However, without a comprehensive predictive analysis based on historical data, an accurate automated prediction of credit risk score is still a major challenge.

This workshop addresses the business challenge with the help of Machine Learning capabilities of SAP Data Intelligence. You will learn how to integrate the business data from disparate data sources like S3, MS-SQL, HANA; build ML Models in Python and HANA Cloud APL. You will learn how to build productive deployment or Inference pipelines to consume the ML models. Finally, you will learn using the ML model in an SAP AI Chatbot.
Title: Credit Risk Analysis assessment with SAP Data Intelligence

Description: This academy provides an overview of the data governance capabilities of SAP Data Intelligence Cloud. Business analysts can discover data, gain insight, enhance and enrich data using self-service data-preparation capabilities in SAP Data Intelligence. Furthermore, these exercises demonstrate how a data steward can define rules and monitor the quality of the data.
Title: Data Governance with SAP DI Cloud

Description: SAP HANA Cloud AutoML is an Application Function Library (AFL) which exposes the data mining capabilities of the Automated Analytics engine in SAP HANA Cloud through a set of functions. As a developer, you use these functions to develop a predictive modelling process that allows business analysts to answer simple questions on their customer datasets stored in SAP HANA Cloud. You can also use these functions through a set of stored procedures delivered as a part of SAP HANA Cloud APL
Title: Machine Learning with SAP HANA Cloud AutoML

Description: Learn the fundamentals of working with vectors using native SQL functions COSINE_SIMILARITY and L2DISTANCE in SAP HANA Cloud.
Title: Working with Vectors and Text Embeddings in SAP HANA Cloud

Description:
This academy gives you an overview of the data federation and storage management capability of SAP HANA Cloud.
You can easily connect with all data through virtual interactive access layer (virtualization) across different data sources: On-premise databases or big data cloud stores, remote data resources, structured or unstructured, SAP or non-SAP data sources. Simplified data management and streamlined access of all data in a single storage solution. Reduce data duplication with virtualization and SAP HANA smart data access. Easy replication of data option with SAP HANA smart data integration
Title: Data Federation and Storage Management with SAP HANA Cloud

Description: SAP Analytics Cloud Financial Planning integration with S/4HANA Cloud
Title: SAP Analytics Cloud Financial Planning integration with S/4HANA Cloud

Description: In this course, you will learn how to load and manage catalogs in SAP Ariba to enable efficient and guided purchasing. You will also prepare catalog files, understand catalog formats, and troubleshoot errors during the upload and validation process.

Description: This course teaches how to manage the data and attributes associated with catalog items in SAP Ariba. You will explore how to update item details, control visibility, assign attributes, and maintain catalog accuracy to support a seamless and user-friendly shopping experience.

Description:
The content is designed to present an end-to-end data modeling scenario and consists of multiple units. Participants will explore, how to use replication and federated data from several sources in SAP Datasphere (Data Acquisition Unit), create graphical views in the data layer, representing dimension and fact entities (Data Modeling Unit) and define a multi-dimensional model to provide data for analytic purposes to answer different business questions (Analytic Model Unit).
Then create an analytic story against the data model in SAP Datasphere (Visualization Unit).
Finally, the Catalog (Unit) unlocks the full potential of your data. Use it to map out a complete and connected view of all your data sources, build and apply standards and processes, and offer trusted self-service data discovery to all your users.
Title: Basic Trial - Datasphere Overview

Description:

Finally, the Catalog (Unit) unlocks the full potential of your data. Use it to map out a complete and connected view of all your data sources, build and apply standards and processes, and offer trusted self-service data discovery to all your users.

Description: This course provides a comprehensive overview of SAP's strategic direction, key components, and execution plans. We will cover the why, what, and how of our strategy, ensuring a clear understanding of our goals and ambitions. This introduction sets the stage for a deep dive into the various aspects of our strategy, highlighting the importance of each component and how they interconnect to drive SAP's success. By the end of this presentation, you will have a thorough understanding of our strategic vision and the steps we are taking to achieve our ambitious goals.
Title: Exploring SAP’s Strategy for 2025 for SAP Employees

LSC_product: SAP Integrated Business Planning for Supply Chain
Description: In this course, you will explore the essential features and functionalities of SAP Integrated Business Planning (IBP) for response and supply planning business processes using the time-series optimizer and finite heuristic. You will learn how to balancing supply with demand across various time horizons. This process helps businesses to create optimized supply plans that not only consider current demand but also take into account factors such as inventory levels, lead times, and production capacities. The result is a more resilient supply chain capable of responding effectively to changing market conditions, customer orders, or supply disruptions.
Title: Discovering Response & Supply for SAP IBP – time-series planning
Learning_objectives: After completing this course, learners will be able to describe the key business processes and explain the benefits of the time-series-planning in the SAP Integrated Business Planning (IBP) for response and supply planning business application.

Description: This learning journey will introduce you to all the important aspects of SAP Build Process Automation, from reusing existing content to building your own automations and processes.
Title: Creating Processes and Automations with SAP Build Process Automation
Learning_objectives: After completing this learning journey, citizen developers will be able to apply advanced process building features in SAP Build Process Automation. You will be able to describe automation use cases, build automation from scratch, and leverage a rich desktop ecosystem in your automations. Using APIs, you will discover how to integrate SAP Build Process Automation with other applications. You will also understand how to make use of existing SAP Build Process Automation content, be able to configure end-user access via SAP Build Work Zone, standard edition and SAP Task Center, and build insightful Process Visibility scenarios with custom process performance indicators.

Description: This learning journey provides an in-depth exploration of Localization as a Self-Service within SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition, focusing on customizing and extending localization features to meet specific business and regulatory requirements. It covers the essentials of adapting SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition for local compliance, including tax configurations, payment formats, and document compliance.
Title: Exploring Localization as a Self-Service with SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition
Learning_objectives: After completing this learning journey, you will be able to understand and apply the principles of Localization as a Self-Service in SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition, including extending SAP-delivered local versions and creating new customer-specific local versions to ensure compliance with local business, legal, and fiscal requirements.

LSC_product: SAP Integrated Business Planning for Supply Chain
Description: In this course, you will explore the essential features and functionalities of SAP Integrated Business Planning (IBP) for Sales and Operations Planning (S&OP). You will learn how to enhance supply chain management, optimize efficiency, and leverage advanced forecasting and planning techniques within SAP IBP. Join us on this educational journey to master SAP IBP tools and methodologies that will significantly improve your supply chain operations and decision-making capabilities.
Title: Discovering SAP IBP for S&OP
Learning_objectives: After completing this course, learners will be able to use SAP IBP tools to manage supply chain planning and forecasting, generate accurate demand forecasts, optimize supply and demand balance, and configure global parameters to meet organizational standards.

Description: This learning journey provides a comprehensive deep-dive into understanding and configuring the shop floor integration with SAP Digital Manufacturing to enable machine connectivity.
Title: Implementing Machine Integration in SAP Digital Manufacturing
Learning_objectives:
• Identify required software components for machine integration with SAP Digital Manufacturing and understand data flow between them.
  • Gain a common understanding of shop floor integration architecture and know which machine protocols can be used for communication.
  • Set up Shop Floor Systems in SAP Digital Manufacturing and map data tags of physical machines to SAP Digital Manufacturing Assets.
  • Understand how to use asset templates, set points, automatic triggers, and flexible indicators.
  • Learn the minimum requirements for an implementation approach for SAP Digital Manufacturing with shop floor integration.
  • Develop a problem-solving mindset for addressing integration challenges.
  • Stay updated with the latest information and know where to get help and support.

Description: This course provides the IT fundamentals of setting up and connecting the on-premise applications SAP Production Connector and SAP Cloud Connector required for machine connectivity with the cloud application SAP Digital Manufacturing.
Title: Configuring Machine Integration in SAP Digital Manufacturing
Learning_objectives:
• Understand the communication dynamics between the SAP Production Connector and related systems, including both the shop floor and SAP Digital Manufacturing.
  • Develop a common and comprehensive understanding of the SAP Production Connector, its functionalities, and its role within the integrated system.
  • Practice setting up Shop Floor Systems in SAP Digital Manufacturing to gain familiarity with the processes and procedures involved.
  • Understand the role and configuration of the SAP Cloud Connector for securely connecting on-premise systems with SAP Digital Manufacturing Cloud.
  • Stay updated with the latest information and know where to get help and support.

Description:
Welcome to your journey of continuous learning at SAP!

This course is the perfect follow-up to the SAP Now São Paulo on-site experience, where you explored innovative SAP solutions, customer success stories, and impactful demonstrations.

Through this interactive learning path, you’ll: 

  • Reflect on the core learnings from the event. 
  • Dive deeper into curated content tailored to your interests, focusing on topics such as Cloud Concepts, Business Suite Methodology, and AI Ethics.

This course is designed for professionals who want to build on their SAP Now experience and stay at the forefront of enterprise technology. Whether you’re a beginner or an experienced SAP user, there’s a resource waiting for you to explore!

Description: Discovering SAP Ariba Cross Solution Functionality is a learning journey designed to provide learners with a broad understanding of SAP Ariba's cross-solution features and functionalities. This curriculum explores general skills, best practices, and valuable resources, offering a well-rounded perspective on SAP Ariba's capabilities.
Title: Discovering SAP Ariba Cross-Solution Functionality
Learning_objectives:
• Explore the cross-solution features and functionalities within SAP Ariba.
  • Practice general skills required for effective utilization of SAP Ariba solutions.
  • Identify and apply best practices in various SAP Ariba solutions.
  • Utilize available resources for troubleshooting and enhancing SAP Ariba operations.

Learning_objectives: After completing this learning journey, business users will be able to describe the key functional areas of asset management, gain insights into selected business processes in asset modeling, asset health and performance management, maintenance operations, and specialized processes, and understand the integration between these areas.

  • Enhance integration between SAP Subscription Billing and EMS
  • Perform troubleshooting for EMS integrations

Description: The course is designed to give participants foundational knowledge and experience with SAPUI5. It is assumed that learners are already familiar with web technologies such as HTML and JavaScript. Description: This workbook shows how to expose the new SAP Generative AI Hub through the LangChain framework and demonstrates how to combine this with SAP HANA Cloud vector embeddings. The workbook ends with the creation of a leaflet map using the open-source python library - Folium.

In addition, the candidate has advanced knowledge in SAP Cloud ALM, Tricentis and related topics on business and solution transformation. This certification proves that the candidate has a deep overall understanding of the interplay of all these tools to achieve a business and solution transformation.

Description: To start learning the sourcing and procurement processes in SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition, this course will give you a high-level overview of the source-to-pay process and describe the foundation topics  organizational structure, and master data from a sourcing and procurement point of view.
Title: Describing the Foundations for Sourcing and Procurement

Description: This course will teach you how to carry out processes such as Self-Service Requisitioning, Requirements Processing, and Purchase Order Processing for consumable materials.
Title: Detailing Requisitioning and Consumable Purchasing

Description: This course will teach you the purchase order processing for the procurement of direct materials and several related functions, such as inbound delivery, down payments, automated invoice settlement, dunning reminders, batch and serial processing in purchasing.
Title: Detailing Procurement of Direct Materials

Description: You can improve the execution of the source-to-pay process by leveraging machine learning and artificial intelligence in SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition. In this course, you will learn how the embedded intelligence allows you to streamline and automate your procurement processes using flexible workflows, situation handling, and artificial intelligence. This course will also teach you how to use procurement analytics, including real-time reporting and monitoring and spend visibility, to get important information at a glance and an overview of your spending in the purchasing area so that you can plan.
Title: Detailing Intelligent Procurement and Procurement Analytics

Description: This course outlines the Service Purchasing and Recording process in SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition, which you can use to purchase services such as temporary labor, construction, maintenance, or professional services.
Title: Detailing Service Purchasing and Recording

Description: This course will teach you to create RFQs, contracts, and scheduling agreements to improve your procurement processes.
Title: Detailing Sourcing and Contract Management

Description: To increase efficiency, you can enhance your procurement activities using subcontracting and supplier consignment. In this course, you will learn how to procure materials using a subcontract order and send them to the subcontractor who produces the end product. The training also covers the supplier consignment process, in which the supplier provides materials and stores them on your premises, ensuring the availability of goods when needed.
Title: Detailing Subcontracting and Supplier Consignment

Description: The SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition system allows you to access all the sourcing and procurement-relevant documents and data using the apps via the SAP Fiori launchpad in the most convenient way. Nevertheless, if your business requires access to data externally from different applications, SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition provides several sourcing and procurement APIs that allow you to access related documents and data from the applications that you created. In this course, you will learn how to discover and use these APIs.
Title: Accessing Sourcing and Procurement Data

Description: Implement sourcing and procurement-specific business processes.
Title: Implementing SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition, Sourcing and Procurement
Learning_objectives:
After completing this learning journey, you will be able to 

  • explain and execute core implementation project tasks to deploy, adopt, and extend SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition. This includes building the implementation team, defining system landscapes, setting up systems and authorizations, gathering data for fit-to-standard workshops, configuring business processes with SAP Central Business Configuration, working with the SAP Fiori Launchpad, customizing authorizations, applying extensibility tools and concepts, setting up integration scenarios, migrating data, and testing configured processes with automation.
  • explain and execute the sourcing and procurement-specific solution processes in SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition. This includes fundamental topics such as master data, basic configuration, workflows, and situation handling from a procurement perspective and core procurement solution processes such as requisitioning, purchasing, sourcing and contract management.

Description: After completing this learning journey, the learner will be able to evaluate and apply clean core principles to ERP so that they can maximize business process agility, reduce adaptation efforts, and accelerate innovation.

Learning_objectives: After completing this learning journey, consultants and developers will be able to apply the clean core concept keeping an organization’s core ERP systems transparent, flexible, consistent, efficient, and cloud-compliant, so they can easily transition to the cloud. A clean core describes an up-to-date IT system with the latest releases, cloud-compliant extensions, and integrations, with optimal primary data quality and process design. The core describes the main aspects of an ERP system, including extensibility, processes, data integration, and operation.

Description: This course provides you with the essential knowledge and skills to implement the Taxability and Deductibility service for Concur Expense Professional Edition. The course also explains how to set up custom expense types, map key fields for accurate accounting, and ensure a clear user experience with detailed taxation summaries.

This course introduces business users to the basics of the legacy experience for Concur Travel, covering features needed to successfully book a trip. Concur Travel is designed to streamline and simplify business travel management and is built to make corporate travel smarter, safer, and more efficient.

Note: This course covers the legacy Concur Travel experience. It does not cover the new Concur Travel experience.

Description: This course explores the principles and concepts of artificial intelligence (AI). It addresses different types of AI, including machine learning and symbolic AI using board and computer games. Moreover, the course takes a closer look at the pitfalls and societal implications of AI. It also offers additional teaching materials for educators. Join this course to delve into the fascinating world of AI.

Description: This certification verifies that you possess the ability to perform an SAP project manager role. Project manager oversee the implementation of SAP solutions using the SAP Activate methodology, leverage SAP Cloud ALM for project management and monitoring, and facilitate Organizational Change Management to ensure smooth adoption and user acceptance throughout the project lifecycle.

Description: This learning journey will teach the learner how to create, manage, and monitor category-specific strategies to achieve their organization’s procurement goals.
Title: Introducing SAP Ariba Category Management Fundamentals
Learning_objectives: Upon the completion of this learning journey, participants will gain insight into how a Category Manager creates a category profile by classifying a product category, uploading company policies, laws, and regulations concerning that specific category, and adding team members and stakeholders that will assist with the execution of the strategy. Then, develop a strategy and plan, including category and market analysis, strategy and implementation, and approval. Finally, monitor the strategy execution to see if goals are met, initiatives are on target, and upcoming events are posted in the planning calendar.

Description: In this course, you will apply the machine learning workflow introduced in the enablement "Developing AI Models with the Python Machine Learning Client for SAP HANA". The steps from feature extraction to model evaluation are illustrated through the scenario of forecasting overnight stays in Switzerland. The course also demonstrates how to prepare data, configure the SAP HANA environment, and apply advanced forecasting techniques for both univariate and multivariate time series scenarios.
Title: Developing Time Series Models with the Python Machine Learning Client for SAP HANA

You’ll learn how to activate and configure the tools, how travelers set up their profiles to take advantage of these tools, and how they use them on a day-to-day basis.

Offline system simulations and live exercises have been included for a hands-on and practical learning experience. By the end of the course, SAP consultants will be well-equipped to handle real-world scenarios, having gained in-depth insights into the workings of SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition, Professional Services.

Description: This learning journey empowers IT professionals with the skills to configure and manage technical data integration across SAP Digital Manufacturing (DM) within key SAP Analytics tools. This includes enabling the embedded SAP Analytics Cloud, establishing a live connection to SAP Datasphere, configuring the OData interface with SAP Analytics Cloud, and integrating manufacturing data into SAP Signavio.
Title: Enabling Data Integrations within SAP Digital Manufacturing for Insights
Learning_objectives:
• Understand the Manufacturing Data Objects (MDOs) and the underlying data architecture in SAP Digital Manufacturing for Insights (DMi).
  • Enable the embedded SAP Analytics Cloud (eSAC) within SAP Digital Manufacturing.
  • Establish a Live Connection between SAP Digital Manufacturing and SAP Datasphere.
  • Utilize the OData service of SAP Digital Manufacturing for Insights.
  • Transfer manufacturing data via OData service to SAP Analytics Cloud for advanced analytics.
  • Transfer manufacturing data via OData service to SAP Signavio, leveraging its Value Accelerators for process optimization.

  • Build on analytics C4C
  • Prepare to go Live and change management

LSC_product: SAP Cloud for Customer core applications
Description: In this course you will learn about SAP Sales Cloud from a business user’s perspective. This will include sales business processes, including topics such as lead management, opportunity management, quotation management, sales contracts, Add ons and more.
Title: Discovering SAP Sales Cloud
Learning_objectives:
This course will prepare you to: 
•    Determine how SAP Sales Cloud aligns to the greater CX Portfolio and Sales Cycle.  
•    Recognize the basic features and functions of the User Interface 
•    Define the Functional capabilities of Lead Management 
•    Define the characteristics of a sales opportunity 
•    Examine Quotation Management capabilities to streamline sales 
•    Prepare Sales Contracts 
•    Determine key stages in the sales order process 
•    Employ activity management  
•    Plan and record site visits 
•    Plan and forecast sales 
•    Explore pricing options 
•    Explore SAP Sales Cloud Add ons 
•    Utilize reports and analytics in SAP Sales Cloud

LSC_product: SAP SuccessFactors Employee Central,SAP SuccessFactors Recruiting
Description: This overview of the provisioning process for SAP SuccessFactors systems covers customer communications sent by SAP teams regarding credentials to activate and access systems, how to initiate On-Demand system provisioning, where to find information for Solution Extensions for SuccessFactors (such as OpenText and DocuSign), and how to set up the Manage Provisioning Access tool to grant Partner Consultants access to the Provisioning back-end.
Title: Activating the System and Getting First Time Access (Provisioning) for SAP SuccessFactors HCM
LSC_product_subcategory: Cross Human Capital Management,Cross Human Capital Management

Description: This video explains how to manually update transaction statuses in OPF, such as correcting failed transactions after offline resolution, by demonstrating a specific example of changing a failed status to successful and adding relevant references for audit purposes.
Title: Manually Adjusting Transaction Statuses in Open Payment Framework for SAP Commerce Cloud

Description: This video demonstrates how to configure and add alternative payment methods like PayPal and Link in the Open Payment Framework (OPF). It provides guidance on their integration with Stripe and shows how OPF handles different payment functionalities during checkout.
Title: Configuring Alternative Payment Methods in Open Payment Framework for SAP Commerce Cloud

Description: This certification verifies that you possess the core skills required to explain and execute core implementation project tasks to deploy, adopt, and extend SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition. This certification is designed for implementation project members to prove their overall understanding and in-depth skills to participate in their role as members of a SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition implementation project.
Title: SAP Certified Associate - Implementation Consultant - SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition
Related_exams: Implementation Consultant - SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition

LSC_product: SAP Integration Suite, managed gateway for spend mgmt and SAP Business Network for SAP S/4HANA
Description: This advanced learning journey will provide insight into the key administrative activities, core aspects, capabilities, and configuration activities of various applications involved in the typical integration landscape for integrating SAP Business Network and SAP Ariba Applications such as SAP Ariba Buying and Invoicing, and SAP Ariba Sourcing with  SAP ERP Central Component (SAP ECC) and SAP S/4HANA using SAP Integration Suite, managed gateway for spend management and SAP Business Network.
Title: Administering SAP Integration Suite, managed gateway for spend management and SAP Business Network
Learning_objectives: After completing this learning journey, Business Analysts, Consultants, Solution Architects, and Administrators will have a thorough understanding of the required configuration objects, intricacies, and purpose of each configuration object, and will be able to successfully configure the integration landscape end-to-end using SAP Integration Suite, managed gateway for spend management and SAP Business Network.

Description:
This course is designed to immerse you in the SAP Integrated Business Planning (IBP) platform's essential features and master time series-based heuristics planning.

You will explore the core functionalities and capabilities of the SAP IBP platform. Learn how to navigate the system, configure key components, and leverage the integration and analytics tools to manage your planning processes more effectively.

Engage in hands-on exercises that give you practical experience configuring and using these powerful planning tools. You'll gain the skills needed to implement and manage effective planning strategies, driving improved accuracy and efficiency in your supply chain operations.
Learning_objectives: By the end of this course, you'll be proficient in using the SAP IBP platform for time series-based heuristics planning, equipped to boost your organization's planning processes and confidently make data-driven decisions. You'll discover how to set up and utilize time series data for accurate forecasting and planning in time series-based heuristics planning. You'll also understand how to configure planning operators and heuristics to optimize planning scenarios, ensuring efficient and reliable demand and supply balancing.
Title: Mastering the main features in infinite time-series Network Planning

Description: This course introduces SAP Business AI, exploring its strategic applications, technical requirements, and practical use cases in modern business settings. Participants will gain insights into SAP’s Business AI Strategy and its offerings for optimizing SAP S/4HANA Cloud, analyzing embedded AI use cases to understand their real-world applications and business impacts. The course provides guidance on utilizing tools like SAP Road Map Explorer for strategic planning. Additionally, learners will explore SAP Business AI Feature Catalog and Estimator, enhancing their knowledge of embedded AI capabilities to drive organizational growth and innovation.
Title: Introducing SAP Business AI for SAP S/4HANA Cloud
Implementing SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition

Description: This course offers a first overview of Enterprise Automation and how SAP Signavio, SAP Build, and SAP Integration Suite work together to optimize business processes.
Learning_objectives: After completing this course, business users, consultants, and developers will have gained a first idea of the capabilities and interplay of SAP’s automation tools, enabling them to understand how intelligent automation can improve efficiency and responsiveness in typical enterprise scenarios.
Title: Exploring Enterprise Automation with SAP

Description: In this enablement you will apply the machine learning workflow using the Python machine learning Client for SAP HANA, also known as hana-ml. You will look at the steps from feature extraction to model evaluation, using the California housing dataset as scenario.
Title: Developing Regression Models with the Python Machine Learning Client for SAP HANA

Description: This learning journey will give you an introduction into the Business Value and AI North Star (BVNS) approach and how it supports embedding real business transformation in CVJs leveraging SAP Signavio and VLM.
Title: Driving Business Value in RISE Customer Engagements with SAP Signavio and Value Lifecycle Manager

Description: This course is the first part of Exploring the Technical Essentials of SAP Emarsys, focusing on data inputs and integrations. Learners will acquire the essential technical skills to configure and use SAP Emarsys, implement different modules, manage and use data, and integrate with various systems.
Title: Implementing Data Inputs and Integrations in SAP Emarsys

Description: This course will guide you through the generic billing, invoicing and accounting processes in SAP S/4HANA Cloud for Contract Accounting and Invoicing, within the context of SAP Solutions for Quote to Cash Management public cloud (BRIM and CPQ).
Title: SAP S/4HANA Cloud for Contract Accounting & Invoicing
UI Development with SAP Fiori

Description: This course provides a clear introduction to Artificial Intelligence (AI), covering its history, core concepts and practical applications in everyday life and business. Learners will explore the role of data in AI, the spectrum of AI systems, from basic rule-based logic to advanced generative AI, as well as SAP’s approach to embedding intelligence into enterprise solutions. The course also emphasizes the responsible use of AI, including ethical considerations, risks, and sustainability, equipping learners to engage confidently with AI in a rapidly evolving digital landscape.
Title: Introducing AI Fundamentals

LSC_product: SAP S/4HANA Cloud,SAP S/4HANA,SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition,SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition
Description: This course is designed for specialists who are in charge of setting up the payment program and want to effectively manage and optimize the payment run process. Whether you are working with SAP S/4HANA on-premise or in the cloud, this course will be beneficial for you. You will learn how to enhance operational efficiency and improve financial processes within your company.
Title: Detailing the Configuration for the Payment Run
LSC_product_subcategory: Enterprise Resource Planning,Enterprise Resource Planning,Enterprise Resource Planning,Enterprise Resource Planning

Description: This course provides a comprehensive overview of SAP's strategic directions, key components, and execution plans for 2025. This introduction sets the stage for a deep dive into the various aspects of SAP's strategy, highlighting the importance of each component and how all interconnect to drive SAP's success.
Title: Exploring SAP's Strategy for 2025

Description:
This certification verifies that you possess the ability to perform low-code and no-code development with SAP Build. As low-code/no-code developer, you are able to build advanced apps and SAP extensions using SAP Build Apps, consume SAP backend data and build your own data models. You can create automations and processes with SAP Build Process Automation and integrate them with other applications using APIs. Finally, you are also able to design business sites and integrate apps in SAP Build Work Zone to enhance user engagement and streamline business processes.

 

The certification proves that you have an overall understanding and in‐depth skills to participate as a member of a project team.

 

Please note: To prepare for this certification, it is necessary to take the  Discovering SAP Business Technology Platform and Composing and automating with SAP Build the No-Code Way Learning Journeys in addition to the Learning Journeys displayed under "Recommended steps to prepare for the exam".
Title: SAP Certified Associate - Low-Code/No-Code Developer - SAP Build
Related_exams: SAP Certified Associate - Low-Code/No-Code Developer - SAP Build

Description: This course explains how to position SAP Spend Management solutions within the SAP Business Suite context.
Title: Positioning SAP Spend Management Solutions

LSC_product: SAP S/4HANA,SAP S/4HANA Cloud,SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition,SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition
Description: ​​As a business user or consultant looking to enhance your expertise in SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition, this course focuses on the advanced valuation processes essential for effective month-end close. By mastering these skills, you will contribute to the accuracy and compliance of financial operations within your organization.
Title: Detailing Advanced Valuation

Description: As a finance professional, you seek to gain expertise in validating financial balances within SAP S/4HANA Cloud. This course provides essential knowledge for configuring and executing balance validation processes, leveraging advanced features such as global hierarchies, custom fields, and authorization mechanisms. By completing this course, you will enhance your skills in ensuring accuracy and compliance during financial close periods.
Title: Detailing Balance Validation

Description: This course provides a high-level understanding of the concepts and capabilities of the SAP SuccessFactors Platform module. The core functionality and features are explained so that an organization can work with a consultant in planning and implementing an effective configuration. This project team orientation (PTO) is designed for major stakeholders within the organization who are responsible for making configuration and process decisions during the implementation of the module.
Title: SAP SuccessFactors Platform Project Team Orientation

LSC_product: SAP Integration Suite, managed gateway for spend management and SAP Business Network
Description: This certification verifies that you possess the core skills in the area of integrating SAP Ariba applications with each other and with other systems required for the implementation consultant profile and proves that you have an overall understanding and can implement the skills practically in projects to contribute to the success of the planning and implementation phases in a mentored role. Previous project experience is not necessarily a prerequisite to pass this certification.
Title: SAP Certified Associate - Implementation Consultant - Managed gateway for spend management and SAP Business Network

It proves that the candidate has an overall understanding and in-depth technical skills to participate as a member of a SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition implementation project team with a focus on Sourcing & Procurement in a mentored role.
Title: SAP Certified Associate - Implementation Consultant - SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition, Sourcing and Procurement
Related_exams: Implementation Consultant - SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition, Sourcing and Procurement

It is recommended as an entry-level qualification to participate in all SAP Ariba Supplier Management design and implementation projects.
