Description: This learning journey is designed for integration designers and developers with responsibilities for building integration from and to cloud applications.
Title: Developing with SAP Integration Suite
Learning_objectives: After completing this learning journey, you will be able to create an API and use the required tools, processes, and operations in SAP Integration Suite. You will also be equipped with the skills to manage APIs including Cloud Integration (Integration Flows), and to model processes.

Description:
This learning journey is a work in progress and courses will be released as they are developed.

Embark on a comprehensive procurement learning journey designed to equip learners with the essential skills and knowledge necessary for effective procurement management. This learning path consists of interconnected courses, each focusing on a critical aspect of the procurement process.​ Overall, these courses collectively equip participants with the essential skills and knowledge needed to navigate and excel in various stages of the procurement process, from requisition creation to procurement reporting.
Title: Introducing SAP Ariba Procurement Functionality
Learning_objectives: Upon completion of this learning journey, participants will be adept at navigating the entire procurement process seamlessly. Commencing with requisition creation and concluding with procurement reporting, learners will acquire the skills necessary to ensure precision, compliance, and efficiency in procurement management. Their newfound expertise will significantly contribute to enhancing the overall success of the organization's procurement function.​

LSC_product: SAP Integration Suite, managed gateway for spend mgmt and SAP Business Network for SAP S/4HANA
Description:
This Learning Journey is a work in process and will be expanded with additional courses as they are completed.  

This advanced learning journey will provide a comprehensive insight into the features and transactions supported by the Managed Gateway for Spend and Network solution and key configuration activities to be performed in the various applications involved in the typical integration landscape for integrating SAP Business Network and SAP Ariba Applications such as SAP Ariba Buying and Invoicing, and SAP Ariba Sourcing with SAP ERP Central Component (SAP ECC) and SAP S/4HANA using SAP Integration Suite, managed gateway for spend management and SAP Business Network.
Title: Exploring the features of SAP Integration Suite, managed gateway for spend management and SAP Business Network
Learning_objectives: After completing this learning journey, project team, key users, IT Professionals, Solution Architects, and Project Managers will have a thorough understanding of the required configuration activities, intricacies, and purpose of each configuration object, and will be able to successfully configure the integration of various transaction documents end-to-end using SAP Integration Suite, managed gateway for spend management and SAP Business Network.

Description: This course explains how to manage Concur Invoice Professional Edition and ensure a smooth, compliant invoice management experience.
Title: Getting Started with Concur Invoice Professional for Administrators

Description: Labor Management provides you with a series of functions that help you to plan labor times and resources in your warehouse more effectively, thereby making your warehouse more productive. You can compare and evaluate the performance of your warehouse employees based on engineered labor standards. This course explains how to configure Labor Management, how to configure employee data, how to set up activities and durations, how to plan and execute Labor Management, and how to evaluate employee performance and use Labor Management analytics.
Title: Configuring Labor Management in SAP EWM for SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition

Description: This course explains how SAP Spend Management solutions provide end-to-end solutions that address key priorities of Chief Purchasing Officers (CPOs).
Title: Discovering SAP Spend Management Solutions

Description: In this video, you will see how to configure a funding account for Concur Invoice Standard edition. Funding accounts are used to make payment to your vendors on your companies behalf based on approved invoices.
Title: Configuring a Funding Account for Invoice (Standard) in SAP Concur

LSC_product_category: Intelligent Spend Management,Intelligent Spend Management,Intelligent Spend Management
Description: Use the Text Customization feature to customize the text that appears at the top of your user’s profile page. This information is useful for your users as it is a means to provide them up-to-date instruction or policy changes that they need to be aware of.
Title: Using the Text Customization Feature in SAP Concur
LSC_product_subcategory: Travel and Expense,Travel and Expense,Travel and Expense

Description: Use the Vendor Manager tool to manage the list of approved vendors within the Invoice system. Using this tool, you can manage the list of vendors, import lists of approved vendors, manually match user-requested vendors to approved vendors, and assign a default expense type to vendors.
Title: Working with Vendor Manager in SAP Concur

Description: The Managing Card Programs feature is needed for Expense Pay to be able to make payment to the company cards on behalf of your company. This video will show you how to add as well as modify a card program to the payment service.
Title: Managing Company Card Programs in SAP Concur

Description: Use the Locations feature to modify the list of cities that is available to users when they create expense reports. This is important for Mileage, Taxation and Per Diems totals.
Title: Working with Locations in SAP Concur

Description: This course is for business users and consultants who want to learn how to navigate the system, manage purchasing and sales, handle inventory, set pricing strategies, run production and material requirements planning (MRP), and manage service processes. The training aims to equip learners with the skills to optimize business operations and enhance efficiency using SAP Business One.
Title: Managing Logistics in SAP Business One

Description: This course provides an overview of the core functionalities, features, and administration tasks associated with SAP SuccessFactors Learning Administration. This course is designed specifically for system administrators, however, other employees in an organization can benefit from the completion of the content, including end users, major stakeholders and managers.
Title: SAP SuccessFactors Learning Administration

Description: This learning journey will guide you through the configurations necessary to implement SAP SuccessFactors Learning.
Title: Configuring SAP SuccessFactors Learning
Learning_objectives: After completing this learning journey, you will be able to perform and configure the core functionalities within SAP SuccessFactors Learning and access the resources and support available to configure additional features. You will configure and administer the learning management system, create and manage learning content, set up learning programs, manage user access and permissions, and track and report on learning activities.
